174b1(mdo 'grel): gshegs pa mthong bas sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa rnams shes par gyur kyang/ mi zhum pa'i go cha 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' i go cha mi bzad pa zhes gsungs so/ /de bzhin du sbyin ba la sogs pa dang byang chub kyi phyogs dang skyes
174b2(mdo 'grel): bu chen po'i mtshan rnams la yang sbyar ro/ /'phags pa dkon mchog sprin las kyang/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems can mu rgod sems can gdul dka' bar rig ste/ de rnams kyi yi chad nas 'di lta bu'i gdul dka' ba'i sems can
174b3(mdo 'grel): 'di dag gis chog go zhes gzhi de las yongs su skyo zhing rgyab kyis phyogs par 'gyur te /gang na sems can 'di lta bu dag gi ming yang mi thos pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dag par smon lam ni 'debs so/ /sems can gyi don la ma phyoD
174b4(mdo 'grel): nga'i byang chub sems dpa' ni yongs su dag pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su yang skye bar mi 'gyur te /de la byang chub sems dpa' shes rab can ni 'di ltar sems can gyi khams thams cad na sems can gang rnams ngan pa brtson 'grus chung pa blun po glen
174b5(mdo 'grel): pa lug ltar lkug pa'i rang bzhin can yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ba' i chos can/ sems can gyi khams ma lus pa 'di las bsnyigs ba sangs rgyas thams cad dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spang bar gyur ba yod pa de dag bdag gi sangs
174b6(mdo 'grel): rgyas kyi zhing du 'dus par gyur la/ bdag gi de dag byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug tu bcug ste bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam du sems bskyed de /byang chub sems dpa' de ltar sems bskyed
174b7(mdo 'grel): pa re re la yang bdud kyi gnas thams cad rab tu g.yo'o/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyang de'i bsngag pa gsung bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so/ /de ltar re zhig bsod nams mngon par spol bar 'dod pas brtson pa brtan par bya'o/ /da ni bsam pa
175a1(mdo 'grel): brtan par bya ba brjod par bya ste /brtan par bya ba 'dis ci bya snyam du rtog pa bsal ba'i phyir/ 'phags pa chos yang dag par sdud pa'i mdo las gsungs pa/ bcom ldan 'das bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa ni chos
175a2(mdo 'grel): rnams kyi rtsa ba ste /gang la bsam pa ma mchis pa de la sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ring ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa la ni /gal te sangs rgyas ma? bzhugs na yang nam mkha' i dkyil dang rtsig pa dang shing
175a3(mdo 'grel): rnams la chos 'byung ngo/ /byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa la ni rang gi yid kyi spyod pa nyid las gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa 'byung ngo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bas na byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa phun sum tshogs par bgyi'o/ /
175a4(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste /dper na gang la rkang pa mchis pa de la 'gro ba mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du gang la bsam pa mchis pa de las sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/
175a5(mdo 'grel): yan lag gi dam pa mgo mchis pa de la 'tsho ba mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du bsam pa gang la mchis pa de la sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste /dper na gang la 'tsho ba mchis de la rnyed pa mchis so/ /
175a6(mdo 'grel): bcoM ldan 'das de bzhin tu gang la bsam pa mchis pa la sangs rgyas kyi rnyed pa mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste /dper na zhugs shing mchis na zhugs 'bar gyi /zhugs shing ma mchis na zhugs mi 'bar ro/ /bcom ldan 'das
175a7(mdo 'grel): de bzhin du bsam pa mchis pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de la sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams 'bar gyi /bsam pa ma mchis pa la mi 'bar ro/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste /dper na sprin chags na char 'bab kyi sprin ma chags na char mi 'bab
175b1(mdo 'grel): po/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du bsam pa mchis na sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams 'byung gi bsam pa ma mchis na mi 'byung ngo/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste /dper na zhugs shing gang rtsa ba nyams pa de las me tog dang 'bras bu rnams mi 'byung
175b2(mdo 'grel): ngo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du gang bsam pa log par zhugs pa de las dge ba'i chos thams cad mi 'byung ngo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tshol bas rang gi bsam pa shin tu bzung ba dang shin
175b3(mdo 'grel): du srung ba dang shin tu sbyang bar bgyi'o zhes bya ba'o/ /bsam pa zhes bya ba 'di ji lta bu zhe na/ 'phags pa blo gros mi zang ba'i mdo las /bsam pa de yang ma byas pas na bcos ma ma yin no/ /g.yo med pas na byas pa ma yin no/ /rab tu
175b4(mdo 'grel): rtogs pas na g.ye med pa'o/ /sgyu med pas na rab tu rtogs pa'o/ /dag pas na sgyu med? pa'o/ /dra de pas na dag pa'o/ /gya gyu med pas na drang ba'o/ /gsal bas na gya gyu med pa'o/ /mi mnyam pa med pas na gsal ba'o/ /sra bas na mi mnyam
175b5(mdo 'grel): pa med pa'o/ /mi phyed pas na sra ba'o/ /mkhrang bas na mi phyed pa'o/ /mi g.yo bas na mkhrang ba'o/ /mi gnas pas na mi g.yo ba'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o/ /yon tan ltag pa thob bar bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa ni ltag pa'i bsam pa zhes bya'o/ /de nyid las
175b6(mdo 'grel): ji skad du/ bye brag tu 'gro ba'i phyir rgyal ba'i ltag ba'i bsaM pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa dang/ yang ltag pa'i bsam pa zhes bya ba ni 'byung po rnams la nges pa'o/ /sems can thams cad la byams pa'o/ /'phags pa rnams la phan par sems pa'o/ /
175b7(mdo 'grel): 'phags pa ma yin pa la snying rje pa'o/ /bla ma la rim gro byed pa'o/ /dpung? gnyen med pa rnams la dbung gnyen no/ /skyabs pa med pa rnams la skyabs so/ /gling med pa rnams la gling ngo/ /mgon med pa rnams la mgon no/ /grogs med pa
176a1(mdo 'grel): pa rnams la grogs so/ /gya gyu can rnams la drang ba'o/ /dmu rgod rnams la gsal pa'o/ /g.yon can rnams la g.yo med pa'o/ /sgyu can rnams la sgyu med pa'o/ /byas pa mi gzo ba rnams la byas pa gzo pa'o/ /'khu ba
176a2(mdo 'grel): rnams la byas par 'tshor ba'o/ /mi phan pa rnams la phan 'dogs pa'o/ /log par zhugs pa la bden pa'o/ /pho theg can la nga rgyal med pa'o/ /leD par byas pa rnams la mi smod pa'o/ /gzhan gyi 'khrul pa la mi rtsod pa'o/ /log
176a3(mdo 'grel): par zhugs pa rnams la kun tu srung pa'o/ /thabs kyi dge ba spyod pa thams cad la nyes par mi lta ba'o/ /sbyin pa'i gnas rnams la rim gro byed pa'o/ /bstan pa la mthun par 'dzin pa'o zhes bya ba sogs pa lta bu'o/ /de ltar brtson pa dang
176a4(mdo 'grel): bsam brtan par byas nas /snying rje mdun du gzhag nas su/ /dge ba spel la nan tan bya/ /chos yang dag par sdud pa'i mdo las ji skad gsungs pa lta bu ste /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs
176a5(mdo 'grel): dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas chos shin tu mang po la bslab par mi bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas chos gcig rab tu bzung zhing rab tu rtogs par bgyis na/ bcom
176a6(mdo 'grel): ldan 'das sangs rgyas gyi chos thams cad de'i lag mthil du mchis pa lags so/ /chos gcig po de gang zhe na /'di lta ste/ snying rje chen po'o/ /bcom ldan 'das snying rje chen pos ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad byang chub sems dpa' 
176a7(mdo 'grel): rnams kyi lag mthil du mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste /dper na 'khor los sgyur pa'i rgyal po'i 'khor lo rin po che gang du mchi ba der dpung gi tshogs thams cad mcha'i/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems
176b1(mdo 'grel): dpa' i snying rje chen po gang du mchi ba der sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mchi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste /dper na gdugs shar na sems can rnams kyi bya ba thams cad shin tu mang bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du snying rje
176b2(mdo 'grel): chen po gang du shar bar gyur pa der byang chub byed pa'i chos kyi bya ba gzhan rnams kyang shin tu mang bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste /dper yid kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i dbang po thams cad ni rang gi yul 'dzin pa la 'jebs par
176b3(mdo 'grel): 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du snying rje chen pos byin gyis brlabs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i chos rnams rang gi bya ba la rab tu 'jebs par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste /dper na srog gi dbang ngo? na? chiS na dbang po gzhan rnams 'byung
176b4(mdo 'grel): par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du snying rje chen po mchis na /byang chub byed pa'i chos gzhan rnams kyang 'byung bar 'gyur zhes bya ba'o/ /'phags pa blo gros mi zad pa'i mdo las kyang/ btsun pa shA radwA ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ dper na dbuD
176b5(mdo 'grel): 'byung ba dang rdub pa ni skyes bu'i srog gi dpang po'i sngon du 'gro ba'o/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' theg pa chen po bsgrub pa'i snying rje chen po yang sngon du 'gro ba'o/ /de bzhin du sbyar te /'di lta ste /dper na tshong dpon nam khyim bdag
176b6(mdo 'grel): bu gcig pa la snying thag pa nas sdug bar 'dzin pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen po la gnas pa yang sems can thams cad la snying thag pa nas sdug par 'dzin pa yin no zhes gsungs so/ /'di ji ltar bsgom par bya zhe na/
176b7(mdo 'grel): rang gi sngon myong ba dang myong bar 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal dang 'jig pa rnam pa du ma rang gi shin tu mi 'dod pa bsgoms te/ byams pa dang ldan pas sdug pa la sogs pa byams pa bzhin du bsgom par bya ba 'am /da ltar byung ba'i sdug bsngal gyi nyen pa
176b8(mdo 'grel): 177a
176b9(mdo 'grel): rnams dang sdug bsngal chen po'i rgya mtsho 'khor ba yun ring po dus tshigs med na sdug bsngal dang ldan pa rnams la bsgom par bya'o/ /'phags pas bcu pa las ji skad gsungs pa lta bu ste /de 'di snyam du sems
176b10(mdo 'grel): te/ kye ma'o byis pa so so'i skye bo 'di dag ni mi shes pa rmongs pa dag ste / de dag gi lus grangs med pa 'gags pa 'gag par 'phyur zhing 'gags par 'gyur te /de ltar 'chi yang lus la yid 'byung ba mi skyed cing/ sdug bsngal gyi 'khrul
176b11(mdo 'grel): 'khor je bas je 'phel du byed /'khor ba'i rgyud las mi ldog phung po'i gnas mi 'dor/ khams kyi sprul dag gis skyo bar mi 'gyur /dga' ba'i 'dod chags kyi ldongs pa rtogs par mi byed /skye mched kyi grong stong pa la mi lta/ ngar 'dzin
176b12(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ mir 'dzin pa'i phra rgyas mi spong /nga rgyal dang lta ba'i zug rngu mi 'byin /'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug gi me lce 'bar bzhi bar mi byed/ ma rig pa'i mun pa mi sel / srid pa'i rgya mtsho mi skems /stobs bcu'i ded dpon yongs su
176b13(mdo 'grel): mi tshol zhing bdud kyi bsam pa thibs po'i rdzas su song pa ste /'khor ba'i rgya mtsho rnam par rtog rnam pa sna tshogs kyi chu srin 'dzin khris dkrugs pas yongs su g.yengs pa ngo mtshar che ste /ma la bdag gi sems can de ltar sdug bsngal gyis
176b14(mdo 'grel): nyam thag pa/ mgon med pa/ dpung med pa/ skyabs med pa/ gnas med pa/ gzhi med pa /rten med pa /lod bar gyur pa /ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs dad spris g.yogs pa /mun pas zil gyis non pa /de dag gi don
176b15(mdo 'grel): du gcig pu gnyis su med par gyur nas / bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs gsag par bya pa rnam pa ji lta bus sems can de dag shin tu rnam par dag pa 'thob par 'gyur ba nas /stobs bcu'i stobs kyi ye shes chags par
177b16(mdo 'grel): @177b
177b17(mdo 'grel): med pa'i bar gyi mthar thug pa 'thob par 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshiD bsags par bya'o zhes bya'o/ /yang de nyid las gsungs pa/ kye ma'o sems can 'di dag ni 'khor ba'i mya ngan gyi lam du zhugs pa/ kye ma'o
177b18(mdo 'grel): sems can 'di dag ni dmyal ba dang dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi g.yangs la mngon du phyogs pa / lta ba ngan pa'i dra ba nyam nga bar zhugs pa gti mug thibs? pos kun nas g.yogs pa/ log pa'i lam du zhugs pa/ ldongs
177b19(mdo 'grel): par gyur pa / yongs su 'dren pa med ba zhes bya ba nas /de bzhin du sbyar te /'khor ba rgyun gyis 'das pa /sred pa'i klung du zhugs pa / shugs drag pos bdas te / blta ba'i mthu med 'dod pa dang gnod sems dang rnam par 'tsho ba'i
177b20(mdo 'grel): rnam par rtog pa mang po'i rjes su zhugs pa /'jig tshogS la lta ba chu'i srin pos zin pa /'dod pa thibs po'i klong du zhugs pa/ dga' ba can dang 'dod chags kyi dkyil du kun tu thogs pa / nga'i snyam pa'i nga rgyal gyi thang la 'khyam pa/ dpung
177b21(mdo 'grel): gnyen med pa /skye mched kyi grong nas ma 'phags pa /sgrol ba la mkhas pa dang bral bar gyur pa yin gyis/ de dag bdag gi snying rje chen po dang dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs kyis ston te/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i gling 'che ba med pa rdul med pa
177b22(mdo 'grel): 'jigs pa dang skrag pa thams cad med pa la rab tu dgod par bya'o/ /kye ma sems can 'di dag ni sdug bsngal dang yid mi bde ba dang 'khrug pa med pa /sdug pa dang mi sdug par 'brel ba /mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang bcas pa'i rjes su rgyu
177b23(mdo 'grel): ba/ sred pa'i sgrog tu bcug pa /khams gsum pa'i ma rig pa'i thibs pos kun nas khebs pa yin gyis /de dag bdag gi khams gsum pa'i gnas thams cad las bden pa /mya ngan las 'das pa la rab tu dgod par bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs
178a1(mdo 'grel): pa'o/ /de ltar brtson pa dang bsam pa dang snying rje gcig gi gcig brtan par byas pa de dag gi bsod nams mngon par spel ba rtsom mo/ /de la re zhig bzang po spyod pa'i chog bzhin/ /phyag 'tshal la sogs gus par bya//
178a2(mdo 'grel): drag shul can gyis zhus pa las/ nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du gtsang ba dang gos gtsang ma bgos te / phung po gsum pa bklag par bya'o zhes gsungs so/ /de la phung po gsum ni sdig pa bshegs pa dang/ bsod nams kyi rjes su yi rang
178a3(mdo 'grel): ba dang/ sangs rgyas la bskul ba zhes bya ba ste bsod nams kyi phung po yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de la phyag 'tshal ba ni sdig pa bshags pa'i nang du 'dus te sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal nas sdig pa gshegs pa zhes nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa las
178a4(mdo 'grel): bstan pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol ba gdab pa ni bskul ba don gcig pa'i phyir ro/ /mchod pa ni 'byor pa med pa'i phyir mi rtag pas ma smos so/ /yid dang dag gi ni mdo sde gzhan las grags pa'i phyir ma bshad do/ /tshig gsum ni gtso bo yin par shes
178a5(mdo 'grel): par bya'o/ /de la phyags tshal ba ni sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo zhes pa lta bu ste / tshigs su bcad pa bzhi dang / ji ltar ston pa'i bstod pa dang/ bzang bo spyod pa la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa rnams kyis so/ /mchod pa ni 'phaD
178a6(mdo 'grel): pa dkon mchog sprin gyi mdo las ji skad gsungs pa lta bu ste /rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' me tog gi rnam ba 'am 'bras bu'i rnam pa nga yir bya ba med pa yongs su bzung ba med pa gang yin pa de rnams nyin lan gsum mtshan lan
178a7(mdo 'grel): gsum sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la 'bul lo/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o/ /de bdug pa'i shing dam spos kyi shing dam rin po che'i shing dam dpag gsam
178b1(mdo 'grel): gyi shing ngam me tog gi shing ngam 'bras bu'i shing nga yir bya ba med pa yongs su bzung ba med pa gang yin pa de lta bu de dag kyang nyid lan gsum mtshan lan gsum sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la 'bul lo zhes bya'o/ /dam tshig gsum
178b2(mdo 'grel): bkod pa'i rgyal po las kyang thang las skyes pa'i rin po che'i ri rnams dang chu las skyes pa'i rin po che'i ri rnams dang thang las skyes pa'i rin po che la sogs pa phyogs bcu na rnam par gnas pa ? yid bya ba med pa yongs su bzung ba med pa rnams 'bul
178b3(mdo 'grel): zhes gsungs so/ /phyogs 'dis sman thams cad dang bcud kyis len thams cad dang chu thams cad dang/ /ba na ma tho ba med pa'i chu'i dkyil 'khor thams cad dang gser gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams chags pa rnams na ro
178b4(mdo 'grel): dang reg pa mchog phun sum tshogs pa'i sa zhag dang bdud rtsi'i sbu gu dang ma smos ma btab pa'i 'bras sA lu dang byang gi sgra mi snyan gling dang 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dag pa rnams na yod pa mchog tu nyams dga' pa'i longs spyod rnams 'bul lo/ /'phaD
178b5(mdo 'grel): pa dkon mchog sprin las 'di skad du/ de mdo sde rnams las mchod pa dang rim gro bya brgya chen po rgya che ba/ gang yin pa de lta bu dag nyan cing/ de dag snying thag pa nas lhag pa'i bsam pa mchog gis sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams
178b6(mdo 'grel): la yongs su bsngo'o zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin du mchod pa dang rim gro sna tshogs bya ba rjes su sems so zhes gsungs so/ /bshags pa ni sngar brjod pa nyid do/ /'phags pa blo gros mi zad pa'i mdo las ni bdag dang gzhan gyi sdig pa bshags pa ni
178b7(mdo 'grel): bsod nams kyi tshogs su brjod do/ /rjes su yi rang ba ni bzang po spyod pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'am /zla ba sgron ma'i rjes su yi rang ba'i le'u las so/ /gsol ba gdab pa ni bzang po spyod pa nyid kyis so/ /yongs su bsngo ba ni mdza' dag bzang po spyod pa nyid du
179a1(mdo 'grel): rdzogs pa 'am /rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi yongs su bsngo pa yang yin par blta'o/ /yang na ba bcu? pa las gsungs pa'i smon lam chen po rnams te /'di lta ste /sangs rgyas ma lus pa la mchod pa dang/ rim gro lhag ma med pa /
179a2(mdo 'grel): mdza' dag bya ba'i phyir rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa /mos pa rgya chen pos rnam par dag pa chos kyis dbyangs kyis klas par rgya che pa /nam mkha' i khams kyis mthas gtugs pa / phyi? ma'i mdza' i mur thug pa/ bskal pa
179a3(mdo 'grel): bgrad par sangs rgyas 'byung ba bgrangs pa thams cad la mchod pa dang rim gro chen po bya ba rgyun mi 'chad pa'i smon lam chen po dang po mngon par bsgrub po/ /'di lta ste /de bzhin gshegs la thams cad kyis gsungs pa'i chos kyis
179a4(mdo 'grel): tshul yang dag par bzung ba dang/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub yang dag par yongs su bzung ba dang/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bstan pa yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir /chos kyi dbyings kyi mdza' klas par rgya che
179a5(mdo 'grel): ba/ nam mkha' i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa /phyi ma'i mdza' i mung thug pa/ bskal pa bgrang bar sangs rgyas 'byung ba bgrad ba thams cad kyis dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung ba rgyun mi 'chad pa'i smon lam chen po gnyis pa mngon par
179a6(mdo 'grel): bsgrub po/ /'di lta ste /'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam ma lus pa thams cad du sangs rgyas 'byung ba thams cad kyi dga' ldan gyi pho brang na bzhugs pa thog mar mdzad de /'pho ba dang gshegs pa dang/ lhums na bzhugs pa dang/ /
179a7(mdo 'grel): bltams pa dang/ gzhon nu rol pa dang/ btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na bzhugs pa dad/ mngon par 'byung ba dang /dka' bskyod pa dang/ byang chub kyi snying por gshegs pa dang/ bdud 'dul ba dang/ mngon par rdzogs par
179b1(mdo 'grel): byang chub pa dang/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor pa dang/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po ston pa'i drung du 'gro zhing mchod pa dang chos kyi yang dag par bsdu ba'i sbyor ba sngon du 'gro bas thams cad dus gcig tu bsgrub pa'i phyir/ chos
179b2(mdo 'grel): kyi dbyings kyi mthas klas par rgya? che ba/ nam mkha' i khams kyi mdza' gtugs pa/ phyi ma'i mdza' i mur thug pa/ bskal pa bgrangs par sangs rgyas 'byung ba thams cad kyi gan du 'gro ba rgyun mi 'chad pa'i smon lam chen po mngon par bsgrub bo//
179b3(mdo 'grel): 'di lta ste / byang chub sems dpa' i spyod pa thams cad shin tu rgyas pa / che ba tshad med pa /tha mi dad pa / pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyis bsdus pa /sa yongs su spyod pa /yan lag dang ? nye ba'i yan lag tu bcaS
179b4(mdo 'grel): pa bsgrub pa dang/ mtshan nyid 'dra ba dang/ mi 'dra ba dang/ 'dra ba dang/ rgyas pa dang bcas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i spyod par gyur pa'i sa'i lam thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du ston pas pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su spang bar bya ba'i gdams
179b5(mdo 'grel): dag dang rjes su bstan pa rab tu sbyin pas brtan pa'i sems bskyed pa mngon par sgrub pa'i phyir/ chos kyi dbyings kyis klas par rgya che ba / nam mkha' i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa /phyi ma'i mdza' i mur thug pa/ bskal pa bgrang par spyod pa /bgrad
179b6(mdo 'grel): ba thams cad du rgyun mi 'chang par mngon bsgrub pa'i smon lam chen po bzhi pa mngon par bsgrub po/ /'di lta ste /sems can gyi khaMs ma lus pa thams cad zugs can dang/ gzugs med dang/ 'du shes can dang/ 'du shes med pa dang/
179b7(mdo 'grel): 'du shes med 'du shes med min dang /sgo de las skyes pa dang/ mngal nas skyes pa dang /drod gsher las skyes pa dang /rdzus te skyes pa dang /khams gsum du gtogs pa/ 'gro ba drug tu 'dus pa /skye ba thams cad du gtogs pa/
180a1(mdo 'grel): ming dang gzugs kyis bsdus pa'i sems can ma lus pa thams cad yongs su smin par bya bar sangs rgyas kyi chos la gzud pa dang 'gro ba bgrangs pa thams cad gcad pa dang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rab tu dgong
180a2(mdo 'grel): pa'i phyir /chos kyi dbyings kyi klas par rgya che pa / nam mkha' i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa / phyi ma'i mdza' i mur thug pa / bskal pa bgrang bar sems can gyis khams bgrang ba thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba rgyun mi 'chad pa'i
180a3(mdo 'grel): smon lam chen po lnga ba mngon par bsgrub po/ /'di lta ste /'jig rten gyi khams shin tu rgyas pa dang/ tha gru che ba dang / tshad med pa dang / phra ba dang / rags pa dang / snel zhi dang /spyi'u tshugs dang /ngos phyal ba dang/ 'jug
180a4(mdo 'grel): pa'i khyim can dang/ /mig 'phrul ltar rnam par phye ba dang / phyogs bcu rnam pa tha dad pa rnam par 'byed pa la 'jug pa lam lus pa ye shes kyi khong du chud par bya zhing mngon du 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir /chos kyi dbyings kyi klas par rgyu che ba nam
180a5(mdo 'grel): mkha' i khams kyis mthas gtugs pa / phyi ma'i mdza' i mur thug pa / bskal pa bgrang ba 'jig rten gyi khams bgrangs pa thams cad du 'jug pa rgyun mi 'chad pa'i smon lam chen po drug pa mngon par bsgrub po/ 'di lta ste/ ? zhing gcig
180a6(mdo 'grel): dang/ zhing gcig zhing thaMs cad? du yang dag par gzhol bar bya ba yongs su sbyong ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa dag 'od dang rnam par bkod pa'i rgyan gyis rab tu brgyan pa dang/ yongs su dag pa'i lam dang ldan pas nyon mongs pa thams cad bsal
180a7(mdo 'grel): ba dang/ /sems can ye shes kyi 'byung gnas tshad med pas rab tu gang ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi yul rgya chen po la yang dag par gzhol ba dang / sems can gyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par/ stan cing shin tu tshim par bya ba'i
180b1(mdo 'grel): phyir/ /chos kyi dbyings kyis klas par rgya che ba/ nam mkha' i khams kyis mthas gtugs pa /phyi ma'i mdza' i mur thug pa / bskal pa bgrangs par sangs rgyas kyi zhing bgrangs pa thams cad yongs su sbyod ba rgyun mi 'chad pa'i smon lam chen po bdun pa
180b2(mdo 'grel): mngon par bsgrub bo/ /'di lta ste /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang bsam pa dang sbyor ba gcig par bya ba dang /'gran zla med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bsag par bya ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang dmigs pa gcig pas mnyam pa nyid
180b3(mdo 'grel): du bya ba dang / rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang 'grogs shing mi 'bral bar bya ba dang/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba ci dgar bstan par bya ba dang/ rang gi sems bskyed par de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu ye shes kyi khongs du chud
180b4(mdo 'grel): bar bya ba dang/ ma nyams shing rjes su 'gro ba'i mngon par shes pa rab tu thob par bya ba dang /'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rnam par rgyu bar bya ba dang /'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du snang ba thob par bya ba dang skye ba thams cad du rang
180b5(mdo 'grel): gi lus rjes su 'gro bar bya ba dang /theg pa chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan par bya ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' i spyod pa spyad par bya ba'i phyir/ chos kyi dbyings kyis klas par rgya che ba /nam mkha' i khams kyis mthas gtugs pa / phyi ma'i mdza' i
180b6(mdo 'grel): mur thug pa / bskal pa bgrangs par spyod pa bgrangs pa thams cad du theg pa chen po la 'dzud pa rgyun mi 'chad pa'i smon lam chen po brgyad pa mngon par bsgrub po/ /'di lta ste /phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo la yang dag par gnas pa'i byang chub sems
180b7(mdo 'grel): dpa' i spyod pa spyad par bya ba dang/ lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las don yod par bya ba dang /mthong ma thag tu sangs rgyas kyi chos nges par thob par bya ba dang/ dbyangs brjod ma thag tu ye shes khong du chud par bya ba dang/ dad par gyur ma thag tu nyon mongs
180b8(mdo 'grel): 181a
180b9(mdo 'grel): pa ldog par bya ba dang /sman gyi rgyal po chen po lta bu'i lus thob par bya ba dang/ /yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i lus thob par bya ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spyod pa spyad pa'i phyir /chos kyi dbyings kyis
180b10(mdo 'grel): klas par rgya che ba / nam mkha' i khams kyis mthas gtugs pa / phyi ma'i mdza' i mur thug pa / bskal pa bgrangs par spyod pa bgrangs pa thams cad don yod par rgyun mi 'chad pa'i smon lam chen po dgu pa mngon par sgrub bo/ /'di lta ste/ 'jig
180b11(mdo 'grel): rten gyi khams thams cad du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par bya ba dang / skra'i khyon gcig las ma 'das pa'i nang du byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad du skye ba dang/ byis pa'i lam gcig
180b12(mdo 'grel): dang tha dad par byis pa'i lam thams cad du skye ba dang / byang chub kyi snying por gshegs pa dang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po bstan par bya ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi yul chen po mthu dang ye shes kyi rjes su
180b13(mdo 'grel): 'gro bas sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du /sangs rgyas 'byung par ngal ba la rtogs par byed zhi bar byed thob par byed cing bstan par bya ba dang / gcig mngon du yang dag par rtogs pas chos kyi dbyings thams
180b14(mdo 'grel): cad mya ngan las 'das pas rgyas par bya ba dang / dbyangs gcig brjod pas sems can thams cad kyi sems tshim par bya ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po bstan kyang spyod pa'i stobs rgyun mi gcad pa dang/ ye shes chen
180b15(mdo 'grel): pos chos thams cad 'byung bar byed pa bstan par bya ba dang /chos shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul dang sgyu ma'i mngon par shes pas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par bya ba'i phyir/ chos kyi dbyings kyi klas par rgya che ba nam mkha' i khams kyi mthas
181b16(mdo 'grel): @181b
181b17(mdo 'grel): gtugs ba/ phyi ma'i mdza' i mur thug pa / bskal ba bgrang bar mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa bgrad pa thaMs cad du theg pa chen po mngon par sgrub ba rgyun mi 'chad pa'i smon lam chen po brtsu po mngon par bsgrub ste/
181b18(mdo 'grel): smon lam bcu po 'di dag mngon par bsgrub po zhes bya ba'o/ /'di bsgom pa'i tshe thams cad la yang yongs su bsngo'o zhes bya ba sbyar ro/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rnam par thar pa las gsungs pa de yang
181b19(mdo 'grel): 'di ltar bya ste /dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di sems can thams cad g.yang sa'i 'jigs pa dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/ /sems can thams cad kyi rgyun las byung ba'i 'jigs pa rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang/ sems can thams cad
181b20(mdo 'grel): kyi rmongs ba'i 'jigs pa bzlog pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/ /sems can thams cad kyi bcing ba'i 'jigs pa gcad pa dang/ sems can thams cad kyi srog 'chad par byed pa'i 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang/ sems can thams cad
181b21(mdo 'grel): kyi yo byad dang bral ba'i 'jigs pa bsal ba dang/ sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho ba med pa'i 'jigs pa nye bar zhi bar bya ba dang/ sems can thams cad kyi tshigs su bcad pa med pa'i 'jigs pa las shin tu bzla ba'i phyir yongs su
181b22(mdo 'grel): bsngo'o/ /seMs can thamS cad 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa nye bar zhi bar bya ba dang/ sems can thams cad 'khor gyi nang du bag tsha pa'i 'jigs pa dang bral par bya ba dang /sems can thams cad 'chi pa'i 'jigs pa las shing tu zlog pa dang/ sems
181b23(mdo 'grel): can thams cad ngan 'gro'i 'jigs pa las rnam par bzlog par bya ba dang/ sems can thams cad yang pa'i 'gro ba mun pa mun nag can bzlog pa la snang bar bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/ /sems can thams cad ris mi mthun pa dang phrad
182a1(mdo 'grel): pa'i 'jigs pa dang shin tu bral bar bya ba dang/ sems can thams cad kyi sdug pa dang bral ba'i 'jigs pa 'gag pa dang/ sems can thams cad kyi mi sdug pa dang 'grogs pa'i 'jigs pa bsal ba dang/ sems
182a2(mdo 'grel): can thams cad lus la yongs su gnod pa'i 'jigs pa dang bral bar bya ba dang/ sems can thams cad sems las yongs su gnod pa'i 'jigs pa las thar bar bya ba dang/ sems can thams cad sdug bsngal dang yid mi bde ba dang
182a3(mdo 'grel): 'khrug pa las yang dag par bzla ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o zhes bya ba'o/ /mdor na bzang po spyod pa las tshigs su gcad pa gnyis 'byung ba 'di ni yongs su bsngo ba bla na med pa ste /'jam dpal dpa' bo ji ltar mkhyen pa dang/ /kun tu
182a4(mdo 'grel): bzang po des kyang de bzhin te/ /de dag gi ni rjes su bdag slob cing/ /dge ba 'di dag thams cad yongs su bsngo'o/ /dus gsum gshegs pa rgyal ba thams cad kyis/ /bsngo ba gang la mchog tu bsngags pa nges/ /bdag gi dge ba 'di
182a5(mdo 'grel): dag thams cad kyang/ /bzang po spyod pa mchog phyir bsngo bar bgyi zhes 'byung pa'o/ /bslab pa kun las btus pa las le'u bcu drug pa'o// //bam po bcu gsum pa'o/ /phyag 'tshal pa la sogs pa bshad
182a6(mdo 'grel): pa nges bsod nams 'phel bar gyur bar ci mngon zhe na /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi mdo las shes te /de las 'di skad du /ngas ni gang dag bstan pa yi/ /mi khom brgyad po de dag spong/ /sangs rgyas 'byung ba rab
182a7(mdo 'grel): mdzes pa /mnyes par byed 'di dal ba gcig /mdog ldan gzugs ni phun sum tshogs/ /mtshan gyis legs par brgyan pa dang/ /mthu dang stobs dang ldan par 'gyur/ /de lo can du de mi 'gyur /de ni phyug cing nor cher
182b1(mdo 'grel): 'gyur/ /bsod nams ldan zhing rdzi ba med/ /'jig rten sgron ma mnyes byas nas/ /yang dang yang du bsti stang byed/ /tshong dpon khyim dang rgyas pa dang/ /phyug po rnams su skye bar 'gyur/ /dpa' zhing sbyin pa'i bdag por 'gyur/ /
182b2(mdo 'grel): lhug par gtong zhing ser sna med/ /ris bskor rgya mtsho tshun chad kyis/ /sa kun la ni de brten cing/ /de ni mnga' bdag gling gzhi yi/ /dbang phyug rgyal po chos ldan 'gyur/ /'khor los sgyur ba rdzu 'phrul che/ /rin chen bdun dang ldan par
182b3(mdo 'grel): 'gyur/ /rgyal srid gnas nas sangs rgyas la/ /yang dang yang du bsti stang byed/ /'di nas shi 'phos mtho ris su/ /song nas sangs rgyas bstan la dad/ /lhun po'i steng gi dbang phyug pho/ /lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'gyur/ /'jig rten mgon
182b4(mdo 'grel): gyi mchod rten la/ /mi gang bskor ba byed pa yi/ /bsngags pa bskal pa bye bar yang/ /brjod pas zad par bya mi nus/ /su zhig byang chub sems bskyed nas/ /ston pa'i mchod rten phyag 'tshal ba/ /de ni bskal pa bye bar yang/ /nam yang
182b5(mdo 'grel): long zhing mtheng mi 'gyur/ /mchod rten bskor ba byas nas ni/ /brtson 'grus brtan zhing mthu brtan la/ /brtan zhing rnam par gnon brtan dang/ /de ni myur du mkhas par 'gyur/ /gang zhig sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong la/ /
182b6(mdo 'grel): bskal pa bye ba gzhal byas bsti? stang byas pa bas/ /gang zhig phyi ma mi zad bskal pa 'di la ni / mchod rten phyag 'tshal de'i bsod nams shin tu che/ /sangs rgyas dam pa sbyin gnas mtshungs pa med gyur pa/ /spyod pa dam pa spyad nas khyad
182b7(mdo 'grel): par bsnyes gyur pa /mi yi khyu mchog de la 'dir ni mchod byas na/ /rnam par smin pa dam pa mtshungs med rang bzhin 'gyur/ /mi yis nang nas shi 'phos nas/ /sum cu gsum du 'gro bar 'gyur/ /der ni rin chen sna tshogs kyis//
183a1(mdo 'grel): gzhal med khang pa thob par 'gyur/ /mchod rten phreng ba 'dir phul na/ /khang bzang dag dang khang brtsegs pa/ /lha yi bu mos bsnyen pa rnams/ /sum cu rtsa gsum spyod par 'gyur/ /yan lag brgyad ldan chus
183a2(mdo 'grel): gang zhig /gser gyi bye ma bdal gyur pa/ /baiDUrya dang shel dag gi /lha'i rdzing bu thob par 'gyur/ /der ni lha'i dga' spyad nas/ /mkhas pas tshe tshad rdzogs par 'gyur/ /lha yi 'jig rten shi 'phos nas/ /mi nang longs spyod chen por
183a3(mdo 'grel): 'gyur/ /mchod rten phreng ba 'bul byed pa/ /tshe rabs bye ba stong rnams dang/ /khrag khrig dag ni brgya bgrang pa/ /kun tu bkur bsti byas par 'gyur/ /mchod rten phreng ba 'bul byed pa/ /de ni 'khor los sgyur rgyal 'gyur/ /brgya byin lha yi
183a4(mdo 'grel): dbang phyug 'gyur/ /tshangs pa'i 'jig rten tshangs par 'gyur/ /'jig rten mgon po skyob pa la/ /dar gyi dbul ba phul byas na/ /lha yi dag dang mi rnaMs kyi/ /don rnaMs thaMs cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /'jig rten mgon po skyob pa la/ /phred pa'i
183a5(mdo 'grel): khang pa byas nas ni/ /de yi g.yog 'khor mi phyed cing/ rgyal po 'byor pa chen por 'gyur/ /'phags pa rnams kyi gang spangs pa/ /sdig pa'i las ni spong bar byed/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi bshad pa yi/ /dge ba'i las la rten par
183a6(mdo 'grel): byed/ /lha 'am 'on te klu rnams sam/ /'jig rten dag na gang ma las pa/ /de dag dga' zhing mgu pa dang/ /bsti stang byas shing bsngags par 'gyur/ /brtan pa de ni gar skyes par/ /bsod nams gzi yis shin tu brjid/ /yul 'khor dag
183a7(mdo 'grel): dang grong khyer dang/ /rigs der bsti stang byas par 'gyur/ /gang gi spos chud yungs 'bru tsi blangs te/ /bcom ldan mchod rten la ni bdug byed pa/ /de yi phan yon brjod kyis sems dang zhing/ /sdug dang dri ma spangs la mnyan par gyis/ /de ni
183b1(mdo 'grel): bsod nams ldan zhing phyogs kun rgyu/ /nad med gyur cing blo brtan bag yod ldan/ /spyod pa rnam par spyod tshe mya ngan 'dul/ /skye bo mang po dga' zhing yid du 'ong/ /rgyal srid thob nas rgyal mchog bku 'gyur mthu chen rab mkhas 'khor los
183b2(mdo 'grel): sgyur 'gyur te/ /gser gyi mdog ldan mtshon gyi go cha can/ /'jig rten kun na yid 'ong rdzi ldan thob/ /bcom ldan mchod rten gos kyis dkris? byas na/ /de ni btsas ma thag tu gos mchog thob/ /lha yi khyad 'phags dar gos rab bzang rnyed/
183b3(mdo 'grel): btsas ma thag tu de lus shin tu bde/ /gang zhig gos kyis bcom ldan mchog rten dang/ /'dren pa mtshungs med rnams la mchod byed pa/ /de 'dir mtshungs pa med pa'i lus 'thob ste/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan gyi me tog rgyas/ /bcom ldan
183b4(mdo 'grel): mchod rten gos kyis dkris byas na/ /lag mthil nas ni mu tig phred mdzas pa/ /sna tshogs dag dang seng ge'i phreng ba dang/ /gser skud rab mdzes bskal pa mdza' yas 'byung/ /'jig rten sangs rgyas 'gyur zhes mos bskyed de/ /bcom ldan
183b5(mdo 'grel): mchod rten ba dan phul byas na/ /de ni skye bo mang po'i mchod 'os 'gyur/ /byang chub spyod mchog dam pa zhi ba spyod/ /rdul bsal sems can mchog la rgyal mtshan phul/ /ring por mi thogs nor mang rnyed par 'gyur/ /shes rab mdza' yas
183b6(mdo 'grel): mdzod ni mang ldan 'ong/ /sems chung mi 'gyur dman pa'i seMs mi 'gyur/ /de ni gzhan la gnod pa'i sems mi skyed/ /sems ni rab dang rtag tu bag yod ldan/ /de la me dang dug dang mtshon mi tshugs/ /skye bo tshogs chen gyis ni blta bar 'gyur/
183b7(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas mchod rten mar me gcig phul na/ /'di nas bzung ste srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar/ /sangs rgyas zhing ni 'dzam gling gser gyis gang/ /de 'dra'i dpal de zad par bya mi nus/ /bcom ldan mchod rten mar me phul byas na/ /de yi lus ni
184a1(mdo 'grel): mdog dan yong mi 'gyur/ /gzugs mchog sra zhing lag pa gzu ba 'dra/ /snang ba thob nas 'jig rten kun tu rgyu/ /gal te khrag khrig brgya stong sangs rgyas zhing/ /yungs 'bru dag gis byur bur gang gyur pa/ /bgrang ?
184a2(mdo 'grel): ni gzhal zhing brjod par nus/ /bde gshegs mar me gcig phul de lta min/ /rgyan kyi brgyan pa'i gzugs mdzes blta sdug pa/ /su zhig bcom ldan mchod rten 'bul byed pa/ /de 'dir lus ni mtshungs pa med 'gyur te/ /gang gis
184a3(mdo 'grel): rgyal ba'i sku ni rab 'bar ba/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan gyis bgos par 'gyur/ khyad par 'phags pa'i gzugs dang gser 'dra dang/ /'dzam gling gser ltar rab mdzes lta na sdug /mtshan gyi me tog rgyas pas mngon du gang/ /mngon
184a4(mdo 'grel): par shes pa 'thob cing dbang cher grags/ /byang chub spyod mchog dam pa zhi pa yod/ /de ni nam yang longs spyod 'grib mi 'gyur/ /lhas kyang bsti stang bya zhing mchod par 'os/ /brtan pa 'dod pa'i longs spyod gzhar mi dga' / /tshul
184a5(mdo 'grel): khrims rnam dgar ba mkhas tshangs par spyod/ /yi dam bcas nas nags 'dab nyid du song/ /mngon shes 'thob cing khyad par 'thob par 'gyur/ /bcom ldan mchod rten rnams la gdugs 'bul ba/ /ji lta bur yang byang chub
184a6(mdo 'grel): sems mi 'dor/ /byams la gnas shing mi dman sems su 'gyur/ /de yi shes pa nams kyang nyams pa med/ /rol mo sgra yis mi mchog mchod byed na/ /mya ngan med cing dbang ldan rgyal por 'ong/ /mi yi 'jig rten yid 'ong
184a7(mdo 'grel): sgra ldan 'gyur/ /de sgra yan lag tshang zhing dag pa 'ong/ /bcom ldan mchod rten rol mo sgra byas na/ /shes bzhin ldan zhing mig ni rnam dag 'gyur/ /rna ba rnam par dag cing sems kyang dag / sna'i dbang po mchog dang ldan par 'gyur//
184b1(mdo 'grel): de yi lce ni rab mdzes blta na sdug /thog mar rab mnyen mdzes shing sgra yid 'ong/ /dper na lha yi rin chen byi ru 'dra/ /sgra skad yan lag bya ba dpag med 'byin/ /bcom ldan mchod rten rol mo sgra byas na/ /nams kyang sbrul du mi 'gyur lce mong?
184b2(mdo 'grel): min/ /zhar pa sgur po ya yo can mi 'gyur/ /lus ni khyad par 'phags shing shin tu mdzes/ /bcom ldan mchod rten rol mo sgra byas na/ /lha 'am klu 'am mi'am? lto 'phye che/ /su yang de la ma dang skyed mi 'gyur/ /dbugs phyin thob
184b3(mdo 'grel): nas 'jig rten kun du rgyu/ /bcom ldan mya ngan las 'das pa'i mchod rten phyags/ /bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du/ /yan lag ma smad khyad 'phags lus thob cing/ /mdzes la mtshan gyis go cher byas par 'gyur/ bcom ldan
184b4(mdo 'grel): mya ngan 'das pa'i mchod rten phyags/ /lha yi tsan dan khyad 'phags rab mdzes pa'i/ /gzhal med khang mchog yid 'ong dri ldan 'thob/ /de ni de la nam yang sred mi skyed/ /rgyal ba'i mchod rten spos byug phul byas na/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
184b5(mdo 'grel): bstan pa 'jig 'gyur tshe/ /dzam+bu gling du skye bar mi 'gyur zhing/ /de ni de tshe mtho ris bdag por 'gyur/ /rgyal ba'i mchod rten spos byug phul byas na/ /dri mi zhim dang mi gtsang smad pa rnam/ /rtag tu spong zhing tshul khrims phung
184b6(mdo 'grel): por gnas/ /de ni rtag tu tshangs spyod mchog 'di spyod/ /rgyal ba'i mchod rten spos byug phul byas na/ /'di nas shi 'phos mtho ris lta dbang 'gyur/ /ring por mi thogs don stong rnams la rtog / lha rnams la ni rgya chen don kyang
184b7(mdo 'grel): byed/ /rgyal pa'i mchod rten spos byug phul byas na/ /khyad 'phags tshig ldan sgra dbyangs yid 'ong 'gyur/ /skye bo mang po'i yid 'ong dga' zhing bkur/ /de yi kha bzhin rtag tu gsal bar 'gyur/ /rgyal ba'i mchod rten spos byug
184b8(mdo 'grel): 185a
184b9(mdo 'grel): phul byas na/ /de ni ngan song sa rnams ma lus spong/ /de bzhin gshegs pa nye ba 'thob par 'gyur/ /dad pa thob cing rtag tu bde ba dga' / /bcom ldan mchod rten pa rgya bsal byas na/ /de ni mi khom brgyad po
184b10(mdo 'grel): kun spong zhing/ /de ni de la 'gyur de ni khyad par 'phags/ /de ni sangs rgyas mtshungs med mchod pa byed/ /bcom ldan mchod rten ba rgya bsal byas na/ /bag yod blo gros brtan la dpa' bor 'gyur/ /'dod pa'i yon tan dag la dga' 
184b11(mdo 'grel): mi bskyed/ /mi dman sems kyis mngon par 'byung bar 'gyur/ /bcom ldan mchod rten brgya bsal byas na/ /de ni nams kyang byang chub sems mi 'dor/ /tshul khrims skyon med shin tu bsdams par 'gyur/ /rnam dag 'dod chagS
184b12(mdo 'grel): bral ba'i chos kyang 'thob/ /bcom ldan mchod rten ba rgya bsal byas na/ /de ni mdog ngan dus rnams rtag tu spong/ /'chal ba'i shes rab ma lus rnam par spong/ /shes rab rgya chen gyur nas spyod la gnas/ /bcom ldan mchod rten
184b13(mdo 'grel): ba rgya bsal byas na/ /kha zas gtsang ma dag kyang rnyed 'gyur zhing/ /khyad 'phags kha dog ldan zhing blta sdug pa/ /reg dang rab mdzes gos dang nor rnams 'thob/ /ngang pa'i shugs bskyed bcom ldan mchod rten la /me tog skam
184b14(mdo 'grel): bo nyal nyil phyags byas na/ /'dod pa smad pa sdug bsngal byed pa spong/ /stobs bcu mnga' ba'i ded dphon mnyes par byed/ /mchod rten me tog rnying pa su 'phyag pa/ /de ni mdzes shing rnam dag lus su 'gyur/ /skye bo mang pos mchod
184b15(mdo 'grel): 'os blta 'os 'gyur/ /de la rgyal po gnod par sems mi 'gyur/ /bcom ldan mchod rten dag la sngar bas mis/ /me tog phul ba skam po phyags byas na/ /ngan song sa'i lam ngan thams cad gcod/ /byang chub sems dpa' tshul
185b16(mdo 'grel): @185b
185b17(mdo 'grel): khims phung por gnas/ /mchod rten me tog ring pa su 'phyag pa/ /bag yod mya ngan rnams dang skyon rnams spong/ /nad rnams du ma ma lus rnam par spong/ /bskal pa mdza' yas rnams su dbugs 'byin 'thob/ /mchod rten me tog rnying pa
185b18(mdo 'grel): su 'phyag pa/ /sbyin gnas mtshungs med sems rgyas 'thob par 'od/ /mtshungs med thob cing lha mis mchod 'os 'gyur/ /rnam dag lus ldan rgyan gyis brgyan par 'gyur/ /lha yi me tog rab mdzas man dA ra/ /mtshungs med pa
185b19(mdo 'grel): ta la yang su 'bul dang/ /mchod rten me tog nyal nyil su 'phyag pa/ /de dag rnam smin 'dra ste mchog tu 'gyur/ /'jig rten sangs rgyas 'gyur byar mos bskyed de/ /ston pa'i mchod rten thal sbyar phyag 'tshal ba/ /'jig rten dag na
185b20(mdo 'grel): bla mar bskur bsti bya/ /de ni mdzes shing blta na sdug par 'gyur/ /de 'dir rgyal srid thob nas lha klu mi/ /lto 'phye che dang 'jig rten thams cad 'dud/ /stong gi 'jig rten khams kun rgyas par 'gyur/ /dbang phyug nyid du dbang thob rgyal srid
185b21(mdo 'grel): bsten/ /de yi yul la sems can gang gnas pa/ /de kun sangs rgyas ye shes rdzogs par 'god/ /des ni ngan song sa yang rnaM par spong/ /de dag rnams kyis don mchog dam pa byed/ /bsod nams blo gros drag ldan mchod 'os 'gyur/ /dbu/
185b22(mdo 'grel): phyin thob nas 'jig rten kun du rgyu/ /de yi g.yog 'khor yid 'ong sgra skad ldan/ /bsam pa ji bzhin de dag dga' ba skyed/ /gsal snyan ngag gi sems can go bar byed/ /de srog dbang phyug sus kyang phan mi byed/ /skye bo tshogs chen
185b23(mdo 'grel): dag gis blta 'os 'gyur/ /de yi g.yog kyang sgra dbyangs yan lag dag/ sangs rgyas mchod rten thal sbyar phyag 'tshal ba/ /sbyin dang snyan pa smra dang don dpyod dang/ don mthun pa dag skye bo mang la byed/ /spyos shing brgyad kyang khro ba'i
186a1(mdo 'grel): dngos mi skyed/ /sangs rgyas mchod rten thal sbyar phyag 'tshal ba/ /mtho ris 'jig rten gnas shing lha dbang 'gyur/ /mir gyur na yang mi yi rgyal po 'od/ /de ni nam yang yongs su nyams mi 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas mchod
186a2(mdo 'grel): rten thal sbyar phyag 'tshal ba/ /de ni nam yang ngan song phyis mi ltung/ /'jig rten 'dir de rtag tu 'dod pa spong/ /nor can nang na phyug cing nor mang 'gyur/ /yon tan ldan la chig gcig su smra ba/ /de ni nam yang mi rigs bsngags
186a3(mdo 'grel): mi spyad/ /mi yi 'jig ten gnas min spyod mi 'gyur/ /de la sems can mi dom dga' bar 'gyur zhes gsungs so/ /snying rje chen po pad+ma dkar po'i mdo las kyang/ /kun dga' bo nga 'dug pa la mngon sum du bsti stang byed pa dang bla
186a4(mdo 'grel): mar byed pa nas mchod par byed pa'i bar lta zhog/ gang nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas ring bsrel yungs 'bru tsam la bsti stang byed pa lta yang zhog /nga yi phyir mchod rten byas pa la gang bsti stang byed pa lta yang zhog ste/ kun dga' 
186a5(mdo 'grel): po gang dag kha cig sangs rgyas la dmigs nas tha na sangs rgyas la dmigs pa'i sems kyis me tog gcig nam mkha' la 'dor na/ bsod nams kyi phung po de'i rnam par smin ba de thams cad kyis 'bras bu mya ngan las 'das pa yin te//
186a6(mdo 'grel): tha ma mya ngan las 'das par nga? smra'o/ /kun dga' bo gang dag kha cig sangs rgyas la dmigs nas tha na sangs rgyas la dmigs pa'i sems kyis me tog gcig nam mkha' la 'dor na/ de'i rnam par smin pa gang yin pa de ni/ kun dga' 
186a7(mdo 'grel): bo gal te sems can 'ga' zhig bskal pa gcig tu 'khor ba ji srid par kun tu brgyug cing 'khor yang/ 'khor ba'i sngon gyi mdza' mi shes pa bzhin du bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du byas pa do'i mdza' 
186b1(mdo 'grel): de ni brgya byin nyid rnams kyi rnyed par sla ba ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo 'di ltar sangs rgyas la phul ba'i yen ni 'khor ba na spyod pa'i bde ba thams cad kyi mthar gtug par sla ba ma yin te/ gzhan du na dge ba'i rtsa ba de'i 'bras
186b2(mdo 'grel): bu mya ngan las 'das pa nyid yin pas tha ma mya ngan las 'da' bar nga smra'o/ /kun 'ga' bo gang dag kha cig mngon du bsti stang byed pa lta yang zhog /gang nga'i sku gdung dang ring bsrel yungs 'bru tsam la sku gdung gi mchod pa byed pa lta yang zhog/
186b3(mdo 'grel): gang da'i phyir mchod rten byas pa rnams la bsti stang byed pa lta yab zhog /gang sangs rgyas la dmigs nas than me tog gcig nam mkha' la 'dor ba lta yang zhog ste/ kun dga' bo gal te sems can mya ngan las 'da' ba' i skal pa med pa zhig
186b4(mdo 'grel): gi sangs rgyas la dmigs nas me tog gcig nam mkha' la 'dor na yang kun dga' bo dge bI 'bras bu de yang mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'bras bu yin te /mya ngan las 'das pas klas par dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthas gtugs par bsmra'o zhes gsungS
186b5(mdo 'grel): so/ /klu'i rgyal bo rgya mtshos zhus pa chen po las kyang/ klu'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' chos brgyad dang ldan na rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par sangs rgyas dang 'phrad bar 'thob bo/ /brgyad gang zhe na/ sems can sangs rgyas kyi gzugs
186b6(mdo 'grel): la lta ba yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa la rim gro byed pa dang/ rgyun mi 'chad par de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsngags pa brjod pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs byed pa dang/ sems can thams
186b7(mdo 'grel): cad de bzhin gshegs pa blta ba yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgra sgrags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der smon lam 'debs pa dang/ rgyun zhum pa med pa dang/ rgyun rgya chen por gyur
187a1(mdo 'grel): nas sangs rgyas kyi ye shes chol ba'o zhes gsungs so/ /bsod nams 'phel bar 'dod pa la sangs rgyas dang 'phrang ba ci dgos she na/ de'i mdza' ni thams cad mkhyen pa ma yin pas mi shes te/ 'phags pa sdong po bkod
187a2(mdo 'grel): pa las ji skad bsngags pa lta bu'o/ /bskal pa bye ba phrag brgyar yang/ /sangs rgyas sgra ni rab dkon na/ /the tshom thams cad gcod pa'i mchog/ mthong bar 'gyur ba smos ci dgos/ /chos kun rtogs par thugs chud cing/ /'jig
187a3(mdo 'grel): rten gsum gyi bsod nams stegs/ /sems can thams cad rnam sbyor ba/ /'jig rten sgron ma mthong ba legs/ /bsod nams che las grub pa'i zhing/ /ye shes dkyil 'khor rab shar ba/ /'jig rten dpag med snang bar mdzad//
187a4(mdo 'grel): bsod nams phung po rnam par 'phel/ /sdug bsngal dra ba gcod mdzad cing/ /ye shes phung po sbyor ba yi/ /rgyal ba gang gi mnyes byas pa/ /de dag ngan 'gro'i 'jigs pa med/ /rkang gnyis dam pa mthong na ni/ /sems rgya chen po skyed
187a5(mdo 'grel): 'gyur zhing/ /shes rab stobs ni 'od gsal ba/ /grangs med pa yang skye bar 'gyur zhes gsungs so/ /yang de nyid las/ sems can kun gyis don gyi phyir/ /brtan zhing thugs rje che ldan pa/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor ba/ /de bzhin
187a6(mdo 'grel): gshegs pa rnams kyang 'byung/ /don kun rtsam pa'i sangs rgyas la/ /bskal pa bye ba phrag brgyar yang/ /lus can dag ni thams cad kyis/ /lan du phan gdags ji ltar nus/ /ngan song gsum po mi bzad du/ /bskal ba bye
187a7(mdo 'grel): par bsreg sla yi/ /chags pa thams cad rnam bzlog pa/ /ston pa mi mthong de lta min/ /'jig rten ji snyed thams cad kyis/ ngan song 'gro ba so so der/ /shin tu yun ring gnas sla yi/ sangs rgyas mi thos de lta min/ /ci yi
187b1(mdo 'grel): phyir na ngan song du/ /yun ring gnas par 'dod ce na/ /gang phyir rgyal ba'i dbang po dag/ mthong na ye shes 'phel phyir ro/ /'jig rten dbang phyag rgyal mthong na/ /sdug bsngal thams cad rgyun chad 'gyur/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyod yul gyi
187b2(mdo 'grel): ye shes la yang 'jug par 'gyur/ /mi mchog sangs rgyas mthong na ni/ /sgrib pa thams cad zad par 'gyur/ /gang gis byang chub 'thob 'gyur ba'i/ /bsod nams dpag tu med pa 'phel zhes gsungs so/ /bsod nams 'phel bar bya ba la sangs rgyas dang
187b3(mdo 'grel): 'phrad pa ni de ltar dgos pa yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku gzugs tsam mthong ba yang de tsam du 'bras bu dpag tu med na/ rang gi ngo bo mthong ba lta smos kyang ci dgos/ /dang ba'i stobs bskyed pa la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya'i mdo
187b4(mdo 'grel): las/ /'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gi/ bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du 'jig rten gyi ? thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi rang sangs rgyas dag la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin pa dang
187b5(mdo 'grel): de bzhin lha'i gos rnams sbyin pha byin pa bas/ /'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis sangs rgyas ri mor bris pa 'am gzugs su byas pa mthong na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par skye na/ thal
187b6(mdo 'grel): mo sbyar ba 'am me tog gam bdug pa 'am spos sam mar me 'bul ba lta ci smos te/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par bskyed ngo zhes gsungs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' i sde snod las kyang/ bsod nams spel ba'i thabs su gsungs
187b7(mdo 'grel): te/ gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten 'phyag pa de smon lam rnam par dag pa mchog bzhi 'thob ste /bzhi gang zhe na /gzugs la smon lam rnam par dag pa mchog dang/ mnyam par bzhag pa brtan pa la smon lam rnam par dag pa
188a1(mdo 'grel): mchog dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba la smon lam rnam par dag pa mchog dang/ mtshan phun sum tshogs pa la smon lam rnam par dag pa mchog ces bya ba'o/ /yang de nyid las/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
188a2(mdo 'grel): mchod rten rnams la me tog 'bul ba 'am spos ris 'dri na ma tshang ba med pa brgyad 'thob ste /brgyad gang zhe na/ gzugs mchod ba med par 'gyur ba dang/ longs spyod ma tshang ba med pa dang/ g.yog 'khor ma tshang ba med pa
188a3(mdo 'grel): dang/ tshul khrims mtshang ba med pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin ma tshang ba med pa dang/ thos pa mtshang ba med pa dang/ shes rab mtshang ba med pa dang/ smon lam mtshang ba med pa zhes gsungs so/ /rin po che'i phung po'i mdo las kyang/ gang
188a4(mdo 'grel): dag srid pa gsum du gtogs pa'i sems can de dag thams cad so so nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten 'phang du 'di lta ste/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab lta bu byed la de la yang so so nas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma rnyed kyis bskl par bsti
188a5(mdo 'grel): stang bya ba thams cad kyi bsti stang byed pa bas byang chub sems dpa' gang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral bas me tog gcig 'dor na/ de ni bsod nams kyi phung po snga ma bas bsod nams ches ming du bskyed do zhes gsungs so/ /yang de nyid las/ stong gsum
188a6(mdo 'grel): gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs par gyur la/ thams cad 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal srid dang ldan par gyur te/ 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal
188a7(mdo 'grel): po re res kyang mar me'i snod rgya mtsho chen po tsam byas te/ ri rab tsam gyi mar me'i snying pos mar me bus la/ so so nas de lta bu'i mar me'i mchod pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten rnams la mchod pa bas/ byang chub sems dpa' 
188b1(mdo 'grel): khyim gyi gnas nas 'byung ba gang gi mar me'i snying po 'bru mar gyis bskus te de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du 'dzin na/ ras 'bru mar gyis bskus ba'i mar me 'di la snga ma'i mar me phul ba des brgya'i char yang mi phod pa nas
188b2(mdo 'grel): rgyu'i bar du yang mi bzod do/ /'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po de dag gi sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la bde bar sbyar ba thams cad phu dud byed pa bas /byang chub sems dpa' khyim gyi gnas nas mngon par byung ba gang
188b3(mdo 'grel): gis bsod snyoms blangs te/ lhung bzod du chung pa de gzhan dag dang bgo bsha' byas te za na de ni de bas ches mang zhing ches rin che'o/ /gang yang rgyal po chen po de dag gis ri rab tsam gyi gos kyi phung po sangs rgyas la sogs
188b4(mdo 'grel): pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la phul ba bas/ byang chub sems dpa' 'khyim gyi gnas nas byung ba gang gi phyi rol du byung ste/ sangs rgyas la sogs pa theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun dang/ de bzhin
188b5(mdo 'grel): gshegs pa'i mchod rten la chos gos gsum phul na/ dge slong gi chos gos byin pa 'dis gos byin pa snga ma de zil gyis non par 'gyur ro/ /yang rgyal po de dag re res dzam+bu'i gling thams cad me tog gis mdzes par byas te/ de bzhin
188b6(mdo 'grel): gshegs pa'i mchod rten la phul ba bas/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim gyi gnas nas byung ba gang gi tha na de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la me tog gcig phul na sbyin pa 'di la sbyin pa snga ma nges brgya'i char yang mi phod pa nas rgyu'i bar du yang
188b7(mdo 'grel): mi phod do zhes gsungs so/ /mthar gyis yang dag 'phags kyi le'u las kyang bstan te/ phan yon bzang po bzhi po 'di dag mthong nas byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa la spro bar 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ bdag gi 
188b8(mdo 'grel): 189a
188b9(mdo 'grel): sbyin gnas kyi mchog la mchod pa byas par 'gyur ba dang/ bdag mthong nas gzhan dag kyang de bzhin du slob par 'gyur ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pas byang chub kyi sems brtan par 'gyur
188b10(mdo 'grel): ba dang/ mngon sum du mthong bas skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba sogs par 'gyur ba ste/ bzhi po de dag go zhes so/ /'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang rim gro byed pa bla na med pa ste/ blo gros
188b11(mdo 'grel): rgya mtshos zhus pa'i mdo las ji skad du/ blo gros rgya mtsho gsum po 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang rim gro byed pa bla na med pa'o/ /gsum gang zhe na/ gang byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang/ gang dam pa'i chos yongs su
188b12(mdo 'grel): 'dzin pa dang/ gang sems can rnams la snying rje chen po bskyed pa'o zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o/ /'phags pa dkon mchog sprin las kyang bstan te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bcu dang ldan na mngal gyi dri mas mi gos
188b13(mdo 'grel): par skye'o/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs byed pa dang/ mchod rten zhig pa 'chos pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten dag la spos kyi byug pa 'bul ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs
188b14(mdo 'grel): pa'i sku gzugs dag la khrus kyi spos chu 'bul ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten dag la phyag dar dang skyang nul bya ba 'bul ba dang/ pha ma la lus kyi rim gro byed pa dang/ mkhan po dang slob dpon dag la lus kyi rim gro byed pa dang/ tshangS
188b15(mdo 'grel): pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams la lus kyi rim gro byed pa dang/ de yang zang zing med pa'i sems kyis te zang zing dang bcas pas ma yin pa dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang de ltar/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad mngal gyi dri?
