189b17(mdo 'grel): mas ma gos par skye bar gyur cig ces yongs su bsngo zhing de yang bsam pa thag pa nas sems pa ste /rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag go zhes bya'o/ /rjes su yi rang ba'i phan yon ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gsungs te/ gang theg pa
189b18(mdo 'grel): la dang po zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sems bskyed pa de la rjes su yi rang bar bgyid/ byang chub sems dpa' i spyad pa spyod pa rnams kyi sems bskyed pa de la rjes su yi rang bar bgyid/ byang chub sems dpa' 
189b19(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa rnams kyang phyir mi ldog pa'i chos nyid la rjes su yi rang bar bgyis na/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de bsod nams kyi phung po ji snyed cig bskyed par 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa
189b20(mdo 'grel): dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /ko shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ni srang tshad kyis gzhal bas tshad gzung bar nus kyi /kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' 
189b21(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' chen po'i rjes su yi rang ba'i mdo las skyes pa'i sems bskyed pa de dag gi bsod nams ni tshad gzung bar mi nus so/ /de skad ces bka' stsal ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das la lta'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//
189b22(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan 'das sems can gang dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar gzung ste /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas ba'i bar la rjes su yi rang ba
189b23(mdo 'grel): las skyes ba'i bsod nams 'di ltar dpag tu med do zhes bya ba mi nyan pa dang ma 'tshal ba dad rjes su yi rang bar mi bgyid pa dang mi sems pa de dag ni bdud kyis byin gyis brlabs pa lags so/ /sems can de dag bdud kyi phyogs su 'gyur ba lags so//
190a1(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' i theg la pa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa 'am nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'i rigs kyi bu mo gang dag gis sems bskyed ba la rjes su yi
190a2(mdo 'grel): rang ba de dag gi myur du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes bar byed bar 'gyur gyi mi mnyes par byed par mi 'gyur ro/ /de ltar rjes su yi rang ba'i mod las skyes ba'i sems
190a3(mdo 'grel): bskyed ba'i dge ba'i rtsa bde dag gis gang dang gang du skye ba de dang der/ phu dud du bya bar 'gyur bla mar bya bar 'gyur ri mor bya bar 'gyur/ mchod bar bya bar 'gyur rjed bar 'gyur gsol bar 'gyur ro/ /de dag ni yid du mi
190a4(mdo 'grel): 'ong ba'i gzugs rnams mthong bar mi 'gyur/ de dag ni yid du mi 'ong ba'i sgra rnams thos par mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du dri dang ro rnams ma yin zhing reg bya rnams reg bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de dag ni ngan song du skye bar mi
190a5(mdo 'grel): 'gyur bar shes par bya'o/ /de dag ni mtho ris su skye bar shes par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar sems can de dag gis sems can grangs med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba sems can de dag
190a6(mdo 'grel): thams cad la bde ba skyed pa dag la rjes su yi rang ba'i phyir te/ de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sems can grangs med pa dpag tu med bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba' i bar
190a7(mdo 'grel): du byed par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'o/ /yang de nyid las /rab 'byor stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed na sems can gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pI
190b1(mdo 'grel): byang chub la gnas par gyur la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gnas nas kyang bskal ba gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du dmigs pa'i 'du shes kyis/ bsam gtan bzhi ba la snyoms par 'jug pa bas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
190b2(mdo 'grel): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dang thabs mkhas pas zin pa gang gis/ 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul khrims dang ting nge 'dzin dang/ shes rab dang rnam
190b3(mdo 'grel): bar grol ba dang rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims dang ting 'dzin dang/ shes rab dang/ rnam par krol bI ye shes mthong ba'i thung po dang/ nyan thos kyi tshul khrims dang/ ting nge 'dzin
190b4(mdo 'grel): dang/ shes rab dang/ rnam bar gol ba dang/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po thams cad gcig tu bsdus te bzlums shing gzhal la /ma lus ba la rjes su yi rang ba'i mchog gi rjes su yi rang ba dang/ gtso bo dang dam pa dang rab
190b5(mdo 'grel): dang phul dang gya nom ba dang bla ma dang bla na med pa dang bla ma'i bla ma dang mnyam pa med pa dang/ mi mnyaM pa dang mnyam pa dad dpe zla med pas rjes su yi rang la rjes su yi rang ba'i mdo la skyes ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
190b6(mdo 'grel): byang chub tu yongs su bsngo na/ rab 'byor rjes su yi rang ba'i mdo las skyes pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po 'di la/ byang chub sems dpa' dmigs pa can gyis /bsam gtan bzhi'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa snga ma des
190b7(mdo 'grel): brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas rgyu'i bar du yang mi bzod do zhes gsungs so/ /tshul 'di nyid ni yongs su bsngo ba la yang gsungs so/ /gsol ba gdab pa'i phan yon ni drag shul can gyis zhus pa las /chos yongs su bzung
191a1(mdo 'grel): bar bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhal du med grangs med pa rnams su tshe yongs su bsgyur ro zhes gsungs so/ /bslab pa kun las btus pa las phyag 'tshal ba la sogs pa'i phan yon gyi le'u ste bcu
191a2(mdo 'grel): bdun pa'o// //bzang po spyod pa la sogs pa'i tshul gyis bsod nams 'phel bar bshad zin to/ /'di yang 'di'i rgyu gzhan yin te/ dad pa la sogs rtag tu bsgom pa gang yin pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs
191a3(mdo 'grel): pa'i gsang ba'i mdo las ji skad gsungs pa lta bu ste /rgyal po chen po chos bzhi po 'di dag ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams yongs su mi nyams shing khyad par du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ rgyal po chen po dad
191a4(mdo 'grel): pa ni yongs su mi nyams shing khyad par du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /dad pa gang zhe na/ dad pa gang gis 'phags pa'i drung du nye bar 'gri ba dang mi bya ba mi byed ba'o/ /rgyal po chen po gus pa ni khyad par du 'gro bar 'gyur ba ste/ gus
191a5(mdo 'grel): ba gang gis 'phags pa rnams kyis legs par bshad pa rnams gus par nyan pa dang rna blags te chos nyan pa'o/ /rgyal po chen po nga rgyal med ba ni khyad par du 'gro bar 'gyur ba ste /nga rgyal med pa gang gi 'phags pa rnams la
191a6(mdo 'grel): mngon par 'dud pa dang rab tu 'dud pa la phyag 'tshal ba'o/ /rgyal po chen po brtson 'grus ni khyad par du 'gro bar 'gyur ba ste/ brtson 'grus gang gang gis yang ba dang sems yang ba 'thob pa dang bya ba thams cad kyang nyamS
191a7(mdo 'grel): 'og tu chud par byed pa ste/ rgyal po chen po chos bzhi po 'di dag ni theg ? po la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams yongs su mnyams shing khyad par tu 'gro bar 'gyur zhes bya ba ste/ dad pa la sogs pa 'di dag la rtag tu goms par
191b1(mdo 'grel): bya'o/ /yang na dad ba la sogs pa gzhan dag la ste /'phags pa blo gros mi zad ba'i mdo las ji skad du/ btsun pa shA radwA ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang po lnga rnams mi zad pa ste/ de? la dbang po lnga gang zhe na /gang
191b2(mdo 'grel): 'di dad pa'i dbang po dang/ brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang/ dran pa'i dbang po dang/ ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang/ shes rab kyi dbang po'o/ /de la dad pa'i dbang po gang zhe na/ dad pa gang gi chos bzhi la dad pa ste /bzhi gang zhe
191b3(mdo 'grel): na/ 'di lta ste /'khor ba na sbyod pa'i 'jig rten pa'i yang dag pa'i lta ba la dad pa ste /de las kyi rnam par smin pa la rton pa yin /dag ba 'am sdig pa'i las gang dang gang byas pa de dang de'i rnam par smin pa myong bar 'gyur ro snyam ste
191b4(mdo 'grel): srog gi phyir yang sdig ba'i las mi byed pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' i spyod pa la dad pa ste/ spyod pa de la zhugs nas kyang theg pa gzhan la 'dod pa mi bskyed pa dang/ chos thams cad la don dam pa des pa'i don zab mo/ /rten
191b5(mdo 'grel): cing 'brel bar 'byung ba bdag med pa sems can med pa srog med pa gso ba med pa gang zag med bar rnam par dpyod pa dang/ stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa'i mtshan nyid du dad pa ste/ lta bar gyur pa thamS
191b6(mdo 'grel): cad bag la nyal bar mi byed pa dang/ stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la dad pa ste/ dad pa'i phyir the tshom dang nem nur dang bral bas sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag yang dag par sgrub ste 'di ni
191b7(mdo 'grel): dad pa'i dbang po zhes bya'o/ /de la brtson 'grus kyi dbang po gang zhe na/ chos gang la dad pa'i dbang po dad par gyur ba'i chos de dag brtson 'grus kyi dbang bos yang dag par sgrub pa ste/ 'di ni brtson 'grus kyi dbang po zhes bya'o/ /
192a1(mdo 'grel): de la dran ba'i dbang po gang zhe na /chos gang brtson 'grus kyi dbang pos yang dag par bsgrub ba'i chos de dag dran pa'i dbang pos chad mi gson te/ 'di ni dran pa'i dbang po zhes bya'o/ /de la ting nge
192a2(mdo 'grel): 'dzin gyi dbang po gang zhe na/ dran pa'i dbang pos chos gang chud mi gson pa'i choS de dag ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang pos rtse gcig tu byed de/ 'di ni ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po zhes bya'o/ /de la shes rab kyi dbang po gang zhe na/
192a3(mdo 'grel): chos gang ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang pos rtse gcig tu byas pa'i chos de dag shes rab kyi dbang pos rab tu rtog cing shin tu rtog par byed de /gang chos de dag dang de dag la gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog par shes shing so sor rang gis
192a4(mdo 'grel): shes pa de ni shes rab kyi dbang po zhes bya'o/ /de ltar na dbang po lnga po 'di dag ni lhan gcig tu 'grogs shing rjes su 'brel pa ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /lung bstan pa'i sar yang
192a5(mdo 'grel): gzhog go zhes gsungs ba bzhin no/ /dad pa la sogs pa'i stobs rnams la yang rtag tu goms par bya ste /'phags pa gtsug na rin po che'i mdo las ji skad du /rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' i stobs kyi spyod
192a6(mdo 'grel): pa yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ gang dbang po de dag gis nye bar brtan nas bdud thams cad kyi mi rji bar 'gyur ba dang/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa gnyis kyi mi 'phrog par 'gyur ba dang/ theg pa chen po
192a7(mdo 'grel): 'di las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba dang/ nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis mi thub par 'gyur ba dang/ sngon gyi dam bcas pa la brtan bar 'gyur ba dang/ sems kyi stobs shin tu brtan par 'gyur ba dang/ lus kyi stobs dang
192b1(mdo 'grel): ldan bar 'gyur ba dang/ dbang po rnams sbed par 'gyur ba dang/ dgra rnams kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ba dang/ /phyir rgol ba thams cad kyis mi bskyod par 'gyur ba'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa bzhin no/ /de ltar de zhig bsod
192b2(mdo 'grel): nams spel ba'i phyir/ /dad pa la sogs rtag tu bsgoms/ /gzhan yang byams dang zhes bya ba ni/ /zla ba sgron ma'i mdo las ji skad du/ bye ba khrag khrig dkris pa'i zhing dag na/ /mchod pa rnam mang dpag med ji snyed pa/ /skyes
192b3(mdo 'grel): mchog rnams la de yis rtag mchod pas/ /byams pa'i sems kyi grangs dang char mi phod ces gsungs pa lta bu'o/ /gzhan yang sangs rgyas sogs dran bya/ /sangs rgyas la sogs pa rjes su dran pa de yang gang zhe na/ 'phags pa
192b4(mdo 'grel): yul 'khor skyong gi mdo las bsngags pa ste /mtshan mchog ldan pa dri med zla ba'i zhal/ /gser mdog 'dra ba khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdul bral khyod 'dra srid pa gsum mchis/ /mnyam med mkhyen can khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
192b5(mdo 'grel): rgyal ba'i dbu skra 'jam mdzes ? zhing bzang/ /khyod kyi gtsug tor 'di na ri rgyal bzhin/ /gtsug gtor mi mthong khyod dang mtshungs ma mchis/ /thub pa khyod kyi smin mtshams mdzod spus mdzes/ /kun da zla ba kha bdud ltar dkar//
192b6(mdo 'grel): thugs rje gang gis 'gro ba 'di gzigs pa/ /spyan mchog bzang po utpal sngon po 'dra/ /rgyal ba dri med spyan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ljag yangs srab la zangs kyi mdog 'dra ba/ /de yis rang gi zhal gyi gdod yang khebs/ /chos
192b7(mdo 'grel): gsungs pas ni 'gro ba 'dul bar bgyi/ /'jam snum gsum ldan khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tshems bzang shin tu brtan pa rdo rje 'dra/ /bcu dang sum cu snyoms shing thags bzang ba/ /'dzum pa mdzad pas 'gro ba 'dul bar bgyid// 
192b8(mdo 'grel): 193a
192b9(mdo 'grel): bden gtam snyan pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rgyal ba khyod kyi gzugs dang mtshungs ma mchis/ /'od kyi zhing brgya dag kyang snang bar bgyid/ /'jig rten na ni tshangs dbang skyong de dag/ bcom ldan khyod kyi 'od
192b10(mdo 'grel): kyi dri la du brlag /e Ne'i byin pa mnyam med bcom ldan 'das/ /glang po'i rgyal po rma bya seng+ge'i stabs/ /bcom ldan gnya' shing gang du gzigs shing gshegs/ /sa dang ri dang dam pa g.yo bar mdzad/ /bcom ldan 'das
192b11(mdo 'grel): sku mtshan gyi brgyan pa ste/ khyod kyi pags pa 'jam zhing gser mdog 'dra/ /'gro ba gzugs 'di lta bas ngoms mi 'gyur/ /khyod ni mtshungs pa ma mchis gzugs dang ldan/ /khyod sngon bskal pa brgyar ni dka' 
192b12(mdo 'grel): thub spyad/ /khyod gtong dul dang sbyin pa kun la dgyes/ /sems can kun la thugs rje byams thugs ldan/ /mchog tu thugs rje can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /khyod ni sbyin dang tshul khrims rtag tu dgyes/ /khyod ni
192b13(mdo 'grel): bzod dang brtson 'grus dges rab brtan/ /khyod ni bsam gtan shes rab 'od gzis mnga' / /mtshungs med ye shes mnga' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /khyod ni smra ba ngan pa'i tshogs can 'joms/ /khyod ni seng+ge lta bur
192b14(mdo 'grel): 'khor du sgrogs/ /khyod ni sman pa'i rgyal po dri gsum sel/ /mchog tu dga' mdzad khyed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thub pa sku gsung thugs ni rnam par dag /pad+ma chu ltar srid pa gsum mi gos/ /khyod ni tshangs
192b15(mdo 'grel): dbyangs ka la bing ka'i skad/ /srid gsum pha rol phyin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /khyod kyi 'gro 'di sgyu ma lta bu dang/ /gar la lta dang rmi lam 'dra ba dang/ /bdag med sems can med cing srog 'gro med/ /chos rnams smig
193b16(mdo 'grel): @193b
193b17(mdo 'grel): rgyu chu zla 'dra bar mkhyen/ /stong pa zhi ba skye ba med pa'i tshul/ /ma shes pas na 'gro ba 'khyams 'gyur te/ thugs rjes thabs tshul rigs pa brgya dag gi/ de dag rnams ni 'dzud par mdzad pa lags/ /'dod chags la sogs nad
193b18(mdo 'grel): mang brgya dag gis/ /skrag par 'gyur ba'i 'gro la rtag gzigs te/ /bde gshegs sems can brgya dag yongs 'grol cing/ /zla med dman pa lta bu rnam par rgyu/ /skye dang rga dang 'chi dang mya ngan non/ /sdug dang bral dang smre
193b19(mdo 'grel): sngags 'don pa brgyas/ /rtag tu na ba'i 'gro ba gzigs nas ni/ /thub pa thugs rjes yongs su 'grel cing rgyu/ /dud 'gro yi dags dmyal ba'i 'gro rnams su/ /'gro kun shing rta'i 'phang lo bzhin du 'khor/ /glen pa dmigs bu ma
193b20(mdo 'grel): mchis mgon ma mchis/ /de la lam gyi dam bstan mdzad pa/ /gtso bo mtshungs pa med pas gang bstan pa/ /'phags lam de nyid gang dag sngon chad kyi/ /chos kyi dbang phyug 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa/ /rgyal ba de dag rnams kyis
193b21(mdo 'grel): rab tu gsungs/ /'jam zhing mnyen la yid du 'ong ba'i mchog /tshangs las lhag par mchog tu dga' bgyid pa/ /dri za mi ci lta yi bu mo mchog /sgra de zil gyi mnan nas gsung mdzad pa/ /bden dang drad ba mi zad thabs
193b22(mdo 'grel): tshul gyis/ /yongs spyad yon tan mdza' yas ldan pa'i gsung/ /de thos sems can khrag khrig brgya dag dang/ /thag pa gsum gyis zhi bar mchi bar bgyid/ /khyod la mchod bas lha yi bde ba ni/ /rnam pa mang dang de bzhin mi
193b23(mdo 'grel): yi 'thob/ /mi yi bdag po 'gro la phan bgyid pa/ /phyug cing nor che 'byor pa chen por 'gyur/ /mtshungs med khyod la dad pa bskyed pa ni/ /gling bzhi bdag po 'khor lo sgyur ba mchog /'gro la dge ba bcu po kun byed ba/ /rin chen
194a1(mdo 'grel): rab bzang bdun ldan thob bar 'gyur/ /rgyal ba khyod la mchod pa bgyes pas ni/ /tshangs pa brgya byin 'jig rten bdag po dang/ /yongs su dga' ldan lha yi bdag po dang/ /gzhan 'phrul dbang dang 'thab
194a2(mdo 'grel): bral rab dgar 'gyur/ /'gro ba sdug bsngal rnam mang sel mdzad ba/ /mnyam med khyod la mchod dang mthong ba dang/ /thos pa 'ang de ltar 'bras bu mchis 'gas te/ /gnas mchog rga shi med pa 'thob par 'gyur/ /bcom
194a3(mdo 'grel): ldan lam la mkhas shing lam khyen pa/ /'jig rten 'di ni ngan pa'i lam las zlog /bcom ldan 'gro ba dag ni 'phags pa'i lam/ /bde ba zhi ba rdul dang bral la 'gong /bsod nams gter khyod bsod nams don
194a4(mdo 'grel): gnyer ba'i/ /bsod nams bgyi ba rtag tu mi bas te / byang chub dam pa ma thob bar du ni/ /bskal pa bye ba mang po bas mi 'gyur/ /gzhan 'phrul 'dra ba rtag tu dga' bgyid pa/ /yongs su dag cing mdzes pa thob par
194a5(mdo 'grel): 'gyur/ /dam pa'i zhing du lus dang ngag yid kyis/ /sems can dag ni rnam par dag par 'gyur/ /rgyal ba mchod pa'i mi yis 'di la sogs/ /yon tan rnam pa du ma thob par 'gyur/ /mtho ris thar pa'i mi yi bde ba
194a6(mdo 'grel): dang/ /'gro ba kun gyi bsod nams gter thob 'gyur/ /khyod kyi brjod dang grags pa rgya chen po/ /phyogs rnams kun gyi zhing mang brgyar yang mchis/ /rgyal ba khyod kyi sngags pa'i phreng ba ni/ /bde bar gshegs rnams 'khor
194a7(mdo 'grel): du rtag par sgrogs/ /rims nad bral zhing 'gro ba thar mdzad pa/ /mthong na dga' ba thugs rje mchog ldan pa/ /bcom ldan dbang po zhi bzhi dgyes pa/ /mi mchog dam ba khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag gi rgyal ba khyod kyi
194b1(mdo 'grel): gsungs thos nas/ /mngon par shes pa lnga thob mkha' la gnas/ /dpa' bo bde gshegs mtshungs par bdag 'gyur te/ /dri med chos ni 'gro la rnam par dbye/ /lha dang mi dang klu mchod bde bar gshegs/ /yon tan kun gyi mthar phyin
194b2(mdo 'grel): de bstod pas/ /bsod nams rgya chen gang sgrubs gyur pa 'dis/ /'gro ba sangs rgyas go 'phang thob par shog ces bya'o/ /yang na chos yang dag par sdud pa'i mdo las gsungs pa ste /gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni
194b3(mdo 'grel): bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs chen po mnga' ba byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po'i spyod yul can /sems can gyi phung po chen po'i skyabs su gyur pa /mgon du gyur pa /sman pa chen po gzugs rngu? 'byin pa /sems can thams cad
194b4(mdo 'grel): la sems snyoms pa /rtag tu ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul pa / 'khor ba dang mya ngan 'das 'das pa las rnam par grol pa nas/ sems can thams cad kyi pha ma lta bur gyur pa /dgra zin la sems snyoms pa'i bar du'o/ /de bzhin
194b5(mdo 'grel): du sbyar te /'jig rten thams cad zil gyis non pa /'jig rten thams cad kyi snang bar gyur ba /rnal 'byor chen po la rnal 'byor pa /bsam gtan pa'i spyod yul ba /rnam par grol ba phun sum tshogs pa/ bdag nyid che ba/
194b6(mdo 'grel): skye ba chen po'i zham 'bring ba dang ldan pa /skye bo khyad par can gyi zham 'bring ba dang ldan pa/ lta ba dang nyan pa dang brten pa dang bsnyen bkur byed pa mi zlogs pa/ bdag bde ba la mi lta ba /gzhan gyi sdug bsngal zhi bar /byed pa la
194b7(mdo 'grel): dgyes pa/ chos la gzhol ba/ chos kyi nor can/ chos kyi zan can /chos kyi sman can /chos kyi gter can /chos kyi dbang phyug /chos ki bdag po? /chos kyi sbyin bdag /rtag tu gtong ba la mngon par dgyes pa/ /rtag tu bag
195a1(mdo 'grel): yod pa/ rtag tu dben pa la mngon par dgyes pa/ thams cad du stegs dang zam par gyur pa/ rgyal po'i lam chen po dang 'dra ba /nyi ma chen po dang 'dra ba/ tshangs pa chen po dang 'dra ba/ ye shes chen po'i
195a2(mdo 'grel): rdo rje 'chang ba /chos chen pos dbugs 'byin pa/ gzugs blta bas mi ngoms pa mthong bas mi doms pa ste / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag de ltar rjes su dran no/ /de dag de ltar rjes su dran pas de dag gi yon tan
195a3(mdo 'grel): yongs su sgrub pa'i phyir sbyor ro/ /dran pa nye bar 'jog go/ brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ /de'i phyir sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa zhes bya ste /'di ni byang chub sems dpa' i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa nye bar gzhag pa zhes bya'o/ /'di nyid las
195a4(mdo 'grel): chos rjes su dran pa gsungs pa /'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te /gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag ni yon tan mdza' yas mu med pa ste /bdag ni chos las skyes pa/ chos kyi bgo skal la spyod
195a5(mdo 'grel): ba/ chos kyi sprul pa/ chos kyi bdag por gyur pa /chos las byung ba /chos kyi spyod yul /chos la rton pa /chos kyis grub pa ste /gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po de dag
195a6(mdo 'grel): kyang/ chos las skyes ba/ chos las rnyed pa chos kyi grub pa'o/ /gang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa bzhi po de dag kyang chos las skyes pa chos las rnyed pa chos kyi
195a7(mdo 'grel): grub pa'o/ /gang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad po de dag kyang chos las skyes pa chos las rnyed pa chos kyi grub pa'o/ /gang 'jig rten pa dang/ /'jig rten las 'das pa'i bde ba'i yo byad de dag
195b1(mdo 'grel): kyang chos las skyes pa chos las rnyed pa chos kyis grub pa'o/ /de bas na sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tshol bas chos gtso bor bya'o/ /chos spyod yul ba dang/ chos la rton pa dang/ chos la gzhol ba dang/ chos snying por byed pa dang/ chos
195b2(mdo 'grel): dang rjes su mthun pa'i chos bsgrub par bya'o snyam pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' i chos rjes su dran pa dran pa nye bar gzhag pa zhes bya'o/ /gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te /chos ni sems can thams cad la mnyam
195b3(mdo 'grel): par 'jug pas chos ni tha ma dang 'bring dang rab mthong nas 'jug pa ma yin te /de ltar bdag gis kyang chos dang 'dra pa'i sems su bya'o/ /chos ni phyogs su ma lhung bas chos ni dor blta zhing/ 'jug pa ma yin te /de ltar bdag giS
195b4(mdo 'grel): kyang chos dang 'dra ba'i sems su bya'o/ /chos ni dus chad pa med pa / 'di mthong pa rang la yod pa rang gis rig pas chos ni dus la lta zhing 'jug pa ma yin te / de ltar bdag gis kyang chos dang 'dra ba'i sems su bya'o/ /chos ni mtho
195b5(mdo 'grel): dman med pas chos ni rgya che ba la 'jug pa ma yin dman pa la 'jug pa ma yin te /de ltar bdag gis kyang chos dang mthun pa'i sems su bya'o/ /chos ni mchog dang tha ma dang bral bas chos ni rnam par dag pa la 'jug pa yang ma
195b6(mdo 'grel): yin nyams pa la 'jug pa yang ma yin te/ de ltar bdag gis kyang chos dang 'dra ba'i sems su bya'o/ /chos ni zhing dang zhing ma yin pa'i lta ba dang bral bas chos ni 'phags pa la 'jug pa yang ma yin so so'i skye bo la 'jug
195b7(mdo 'grel): pa yang ma yin te/ de ltar bdag gis kyang chos dang 'dra ba'i sems su bya'o/ /chos ni rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par 'jug pas chos ni nyin mo 'jug pa ma yin mtshan mo 'jug pa ma yin mtshan mo 'jug la nyin mo mi 'jug pa ma yin
196a1(mdo 'grel): te/ de ltar bdag gis kyang chos dang 'dra ba'i sems su bya'o/ /chos ni gang la yang nam yang sdod pa ma yin pas chos ni 'dul ba'i dus las kyang mi 'da' ste /de ltar bdag gis kyang chos dang 'dra ba'i
196a2(mdo 'grel): sems su bya'o/ chos ni thams cad du 'dod pa med pas chos ni sdang ba rnams la zhe 'gras pa yang med dad pa rnams la rjes su chags pa yang med de /de ltar bdag gis kyang chos dang 'dra ba'i sems su bya'o/ /chos ni bri ba yang
196a3(mdo 'grel): ma yin gang pa yang ma yin te dpag tu med grangs med pas nam mkha' ltar 'bri ba yang ma yin 'phel ba yang ma yin te/ de ltar bdag gis kyang chos dang 'dra ba'i sems su bya'o/ /chos ni sems can rnams kyis bsrung ba ma
196a4(mdo 'grel): yin gyi chos kyis sems can rnams bsrung ste/ de ltar bdag gis kyang chos dang 'dra ba'i sems su bya'o/ /ches ni skyabs yongs su tshol ba ma yin pas chos ni 'jig rten thams cad kyi skyabs yin te/ de ltar bdag gis
196a5(mdo 'grel): kyang chos dang 'dra ba'i sems su bya'o/ /chos ni thogs pa med pa'i mtshan nyid pas chos ni gang la yang thogs pa med de/ de ltar bdag gis kyang chos dang 'dra ba'i sems su bya'o/ /chos ni bag la nyal med pas bag la nyal mi 'jug? ste /de ltar
196a6(mdo 'grel): bdag gis kyang chos dang 'dra ba'i sems su bya'o/ /chos ni rtag tu rnam par mi rtog pas chos ni 'khor bas 'jigs skrag pa yang ma yin mya ngan las 'das pa la rjes su chags par yang ma yin te/ /de ltar bdag gis kyang chos dang
196a7(mdo 'grel): 'dra ba'i sems su bya'o snyam mo/ /de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos ltar dran pa nye bar 'jog pas de'i phyir chos rjes su dran pa zhes bya ste /rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa zhes bya'o zhes so/ /
196b1(mdo 'grel): de nyid las gsungs pa/ dge 'dun ni chos smra ba /chos spyod pa /chos sems pa /chos kyi zhing/ chos 'dzin pa/ chos la rton pa /chos la mchod pa/ chos kyi bya ba byed pa/ chos spyod yul pa/ chos spyod pa phun sum tshogs pa/
196b2(mdo 'grel): rang bzhin gyis drang ba/ rang bzhin gyi dag pa /snying rje'i chos can /snying rje dang ldan pa/ rtag tu dben pa'i spyod yul ba /rtag tu chos la gzhol ba /rtag tu dkar bo spyod pa'o snyam mo zhes bya la sogs pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems
196b3(mdo 'grel): dpa' i dge 'dun rjes su dran pa ni 'di lta bu yin te /dge 'dun gyi yon tan yang dag pa gang yin pa de dag bdag gi /bdag dang sems can thams cad la sgrub par bya'o snyam pa ste /'phags pa dri ma med par grags pas bstan pa laS/
196b4(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' i yon tan ji skad du 'byung ba de lta bur dge 'dun rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya'o/ /sems can kun gyi gzugs dang ni/ /skad dang dbyangs su gang brjod pa/ /byang chub sems dpa' mkhas rnams kyis/ /skad cig
196b5(mdo 'grel): gcig la ston par byed/ /sgyu ma'i chos kyi rnam rtsen pa/ /de dag sems can smin bya'i phyir/ /rga ba dang ni na bar 'gyur/ /bdag nyid shi bar rab tu ston/ /sa rnams rab tu tshig bar ni/ /bskal pas bsreg par kun ston te/ /seMs
196b6(mdo 'grel): can rtag par 'du shes pa/ /mi rtag par ni rab bstan to/ /sems can bye ba stong rnams kyang/ /yul gcig tu ni mgron du gnyer/ /thams cad khyim du zan byin te/ /thams cad byang chub phyir bsngo'o/ /sngags dang rig pa ci
196b7(mdo 'grel): yod dang/ /gzo gnas rnam pa mang po dag / thams cad kyi yang pha rol phyin/ /sems can thams cad bde thob byed/ /'jig rten ya mtshan ji snyed pa/ /de dag kun tu rab byung nas/ /lta ba tha dad ugyur pa yi/ /sems can rnams 
196b8(mdo 'grel): 197a
196b9(mdo 'grel): ni yongs su 'grel/ /zla ba 'am nyi mar de 'gyur de/ /brgya byin tshangs pa skye dgu dbang/ /chu dang me yang rab 'gyur te/ /sa dang rlung du 'ang de bzhin no/ /nang gyi bskal ba bar ma la/ /de ni rtsi mchog dam par
196b10(mdo 'grel): 'gyur/ /des ni sems can rnam grol zhing/ /nad rnams med cing bde bar 'gyur/ /mu ge'i bskal pa bar ma la/ /zas dang skom du bsgyur nas su/ /bkres shing skom pa med byas te/ /srog chags rnams la chos ston to/ /mtshon
196b11(mdo 'grel): gyi bskal pa bar ma la/ /de dag byams pa sgom gyur te/ /sems can bye ba brgya mang po/ /gnod sems med la 'dzud par byed/ /g.yul chen 'dres pa'i nang du ni/ /de dag phyogs lam mnyam par 'gyur/ /byang chub sems
196b12(mdo 'grel): dpa' stobs chen rnams/ /'dum zhing 'du bar dga' bar byed/ /sangs rgyas zhing ni ji snyed pa/ /bsam gyis mi khyab dmyal bar yang/ /sems can rnams la phan bya'i? phyir/ /bsam bzhin du ni der 'gro'o/ /ji snyed dud 'gro'i
196b13(mdo 'grel): skye gnas kyi/ /'gro bar rab tu bstan pa ni/ /thams cad du yang chos ston te/ /de phyir rnam par 'dren ces bya/ /'dod pa'i longs spyod rnams kyang ston/ /bsam gtan pa la bsam gtan ston/ /bdud rnams rab tu 'jomS
196b14(mdo 'grel): byed cing/ /de dag glags su 'gyur mi byed/ /me dbus na ni pad+ma ltar/ /byung ma myong ba de ston te/ /de bzhin 'dod dang bsam gtan yang/ /byung ma myong bde ston to/ /bsams bzhin smad 'chong rnams su sgyur/ /skyes pa
196b15(mdo 'grel): rnams ni bsdu ba'i phyir/ /'dod chags lcags kyus drangs nas su/ /de dag sangs rgyas ye shes 'god/ /sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir/ /grong mi dang ni ded dpon dang/ /mdun na 'don dang blon po dang/ /blon po chen
197b16(mdo 'grel): @197b
197b17(mdo 'grel): por rtag tu 'gyur/ /sems can dbul bo rnams la ni/ /zad mi shes pa'i gter du gyur/ /gang la sbyin pa byin pa yang/ /de dag byang chub sems bskyed gtsud/ /da rgyal khengs pa'i sems can la/ /de dag mtshan chen mchog gyur te/ /
197b18(mdo 'grel): nga rgyal kun kyang bcom nas su/ /bla med byang chub chol du bcud/ /'jigs skrag sems can rnams la ni/ /rtag tu de yi mdun na 'dug /de dag mi 'jigs byin nas kyang/ /byang chub tu ni smin par byed/ /de dag lnga sngon shes pa yis/ /
197b19(mdo 'grel): drang srong tshangs par spyod gyur te/ /bzod dang des dang tshul khrims dang/ /sdom pa la ni sems can 'god/ /rim gro lhur byed sems can rnams/ /'jigs pa med pas 'dir mthong nas/ /bran dang g.yog tu shin tu 'gyur/ /slob
197b20(mdo 'grel): mar yang ni nye bar 'gro / yan lag gang du gang rnams kyis/ /sems can chos la dgar gyur pa/ /thabs chen shin tu bslabs pa dag /bya ba dag ni thams cad ston/ /de dag bslab pa mdza' yas shing/ /spyod yul rnams kyang
197b21(mdo 'grel): mdza' yas te/ /ye shes mdza' yas rdzogs pas na/ /srog chags mdza' yas grol bar byed/ /bskal pa dag ni bye ba dang/ /bskal ba bye ba phrag brgyar ni/ /bcom ldan sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang/ /de yi yon tan mdza' brjod
197b22(mdo 'grel): bka' zhes bya'o// bslab pa kun las btus pa las// //bam po bcu bzhi pa ste tha ma'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' i yon tan rnams ni/ dkon mchog ta la'i gzungs las ji skad gsungs pa de ltar yang bsgom par
197b23(mdo 'grel): bya ste/ me tog phal cher me tog bla re dang/ /me tog bkod pa'i 'od zer rab bkye ste/ /me tog sna tshogs kun tu bkram byas shing/ /bdag nyid chen po de dag rgyal ba mchod/ /bdug pa phal cher bdug pa'i bla re dang/ /bdug pa
198a1(mdo 'grel): bkod pa'i 'od zer rab bkye ste/ bdug pa sna tshogs kun du bkram byas shing/ /bdag nyid chen po de dag rgyal ba mchod/ /phal cher spos dang spos kyi bla re dang/ /spos kyi bkod pa'i 'od zer rab bgyi? ste//
198a2(mdo 'grel): sna tshogs spos rnams kun tu bkram byas shing/ /bdag nyid chen po de dag rgyal ba mchod/ /phreng ba phal cher phreng ba'i bla re dang/ /phreng ba bkod pa'i 'od zer rab bkye ste/ /phreng ba sna tshogs kun du bkram byas shing/ /bdag
198a3(mdo 'grel): nyid chen po de dag rgyal ba mchod/ /phye ma phal cher phye ma'i bla re dang/ /phye ma bkod pa'i 'od zer rab bkye ste/ /phye ma sna tshogs kun du bkram byas shing/ /bdag nyid chen po de dag rgyal ba mchod/ /na bza' phal cher na
198a4(mdo 'grel): bza' i bla re dang/ /na bza' bkod pa'i 'od zer rab bkye ste/ /na bza' sna tshogs kun tu bkram byas sheng/ /bdag nyid chen po de dag rgyal ba mchod/ /phal cher gdugs dang gdugs kyi bla re dang/ /gdugs kyi bkod ba'i
198a5(mdo 'grel): 'od zer rab bkye ste/ /sna tshogs gdugs rnams kun du bkram byas shing/ /bdag nyid chen po de dag rgyal ba mchod/ /rin chen phal cher rin chen bla re dang/ /rin chen bkod pa'i 'od zer rab bkye ste/ /rin chen sna tshogs
198a6(mdo 'grel): kun tu bkram byas shing/ /bdag nyid chen po de dag rgyal ba mchod/ /pad+ma phal cher pad+ma'i bla re dang/ /pad+ma bkod ba'i 'od zer rab bkye ste/ /pad+ma sna tshogs kun du bkram byas shing/ /bdag nyid chen po de dag rgyal ba mchod/ /
198a7(mdo 'grel): rgyan phreng phal cher rgyan phreng bla re dang/ /rgyan phreng bkod pa'i 'od zer rab bkye ste/ /rgyan phreng sna tshogs kun tu bkram byas shing/ /bdag nyid chen po de dag rgyal ba mchod/ /rgyal mtshan mchog bkod 'od zer rab
198b1(mdo 'grel): bkye zhing/ /de dag rgyal mtshan dkar dmar ser po dang/ /sngo dang rgyal mtshan bkod pa sna tshogs pa/ /du mas rgyal ba'i zhing rnams rgyan par byed/ /nor bu'i dra ba sna tshogs bkod pa'i gdugs/ /dar gyi lnga ldi ba don? rab
198b2(mdo 'grel): sbyangs shing/ /dril g.yer dra ba rgyal ba'i gsung sgregs pa/ /de bzhin gshegs kyi dbul de dag 'dzin/ /yag pa'i mthil nas mchod pa bsam yas rnams/ /rgyal ba gcig la mchod pa byed pa ltar/ /rgyal ba ma lus
198b3(mdo 'grel): kun la 'ang de bzhin te/ /drang srong ting 'dzin rnam 'phral 'di 'dra'o/ /de dag 'gro ba sdud pa'i ye shes kyis/ /rnam par 'phrul dang ting 'dzin mchog bsgrubs shing/ /bya ba dag dang bsnyen bkur kun gyi bsgo/ /thabs
198b4(mdo 'grel): stong dag gis sems can 'dul bar byed/ /kha gcig de bzhin gshegs pa mchod sgo dang/ /sbyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab gtong sgo dang/ /sbyangs pa'i yon tan tshul khrims kun sgo dang/ /bzod pa mi zad mi 'khrug sgo dag
198b5(mdo 'grel): dang/ /kha cig brtul zhugs dka' thub brtson sgo dang/ /bsam gtan rab tu zhi bar gnas sgo dang/ /don la rnam nges shes rab sgo rnams dang/ /spyod pa kun ldan thabs kyi sgo dag dang/ /tshangs ba'i gnas pa dag dang mngon
198b6(mdo 'grel): shes sgo/ /bsdu ba'i dngos pos phan par 'dod sgo dang/ /bsod nams bsags dang ye shes sgo dag dang/ /bden dang rten dang rnam thar sgo dag dang/ /kha cig stobs dang dbang po lam sgo dang/ /nyan thos theg bas
198b7(mdo 'grel): rnam par grol sgo dang/ /rkyen gyi theg pas rnam par dag sgo dang/ /theg pa mchog gi rnam par 'phrul sgo dang/ /kha cig mi rtag nyid dang sdug bsngal sgo/ /kha cig bdag med srog med sgo dag dang/ /mi sdug 'du shes 'dod
199a1(mdo 'grel): chags bral sgo dang/ /zhi 'gog ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo yis 'dul/ /'gro ba spyod pa'i sgo rnams ji snyed ba/ /de snyed chos kyi sgo la rab zhugs te/ /de dag kun du rnam thar sgo dag nas/ /bsam pa ji bzhin 'jig
199a2(mdo 'grel): rten sems can 'dul/ /gang dag kun tu rnam thar sgo dag nas/ /bsam bzhin 'jig rten sems can 'dul byed pa/ /de dag sus kyang mtshan mar gzung mi nus/ /ting 'dzin rnam par 'phrul pa de dra'o/ /de dag dga' bI
199a3(mdo 'grel): bkod pa'i ting 'dzin mchog /'gro ba thams cad yongs smin mthun byed pa/ /dga' bde spro ba rab dga' kun ldan rnams/ /bsams shing bstan nas sems can 'dul bar byed/ /gang du la nyes 'jig rten yo byad gang//
199a4(mdo 'grel): bde byed thams cad rab tu dkon gyur ba/ /der ni kun gyi bsam bzhin bya ba yis/ /sbyin pa sbyin zhing 'gro ba'i don rnams byed/ /de dag zas skom mchog dang po mchog dang/ /gos dang bgo ba rin chen sna tshogs dang/ /rgyal
199a5(mdo 'grel): srid nor dang bdag phangs yongs gtong bas/ /sbyin la mos pa'i 'gro ba 'dul bar byed/ /brtan pa de dag mchog tu lus spras shing/ /gos dang rgyan mchog bgos shing brgyan byas te/ /phreng bas brgyan cing spos kyi bskus
199a6(mdo 'grel): pa yis/ /gzugs rnams bstan pas sems can 'dul bar byed/ /mthong na dga' tshim rab tu dga' rnams la/ /blo mchog de dag mchog tu gzugs bzang ba/ /gzugs kyi dam pa yongs su sten byed cing/ /gzugs la mos
199a7(mdo 'grel): pa'i sems can 'dul bar byed/ /de dag ka la bing ka'i sgra snyan dang/ /khu byug kun la ngang pa'i sgra skad dang/ /rnga dang tshangs dang mi 'am ci yi sgras/ /mos pa kun la de bzhin chos kyang ston/ /stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi gang
199b1(mdo 'grel): yin pas/ /rgyal ba gang dag 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa'i/ /chos kyi bye brag sgo mo de dag gis/ /bsam ba ji bzhin 'jig rten sems can 'dul/ /de dag bde dang sdug bsngal grogs kyang byed/ /don dang gnod pa'i grogs kyang de
199b2(mdo 'grel): bzhin byed/ /bya ba kun la grogs su 'gyur byas shing/ /grogs kyi sgo nas sems can 'dul bar byed/ /sdug bsngal gnod pa 'dus byas skyon rnam la/ /grogs kyi don du de dag bzod byed cing/ /'gro ba kun la phan don bde don tu/ /de
199b3(mdo 'grel): dag grogs don gnod pa dang du len/ /gang na sngon byung med cing chos med de/ /dgon par 'gro dang thar pa mi dmigs pa/ /der ni rgyal srid 'byor pa rab spangs te/ /zhi ba'i yid kyis gnas med mngon par 'byung/ /de dag khyim dang
199b4(mdo 'grel): 'ching dang sred pa'i gnas/ /'gro ba thams cad yongs su dgrol ba'i rgyur/ /'dod pa'i dga' ba kun la mi gnas par/ /mngon par byung zhing thar pa rab tu brjod/ /de dag spyod pa bcu rnams rjod byed cing/ /skyes chen rnams
199b5(mdo 'grel): kyi chos spyod gang yin dang/ drang srong rnams kyi spyod kun ma lus par/ /yongs su brjod cing 'gro ba'i don rnaMs byed/ /gang na sems can dpag med tshe ldan zhing/ /bde dang ldan la nyon mongs chung yod pa/ /der ni rga bas nyen cing
199b6(mdo 'grel): nad bu can/ /bdag la dbang med 'chi ba'i dbang gyur ston/ /'dod chags 'bar zhing zhe sdang rab 'bar la/ /'jig rten gti mug me chen rab 'bar zhing/ /rga dang na dang 'chi ba rab 'bar ba'i/ /'jig rten bstan
199b7(mdo 'grel): gnas sems can 'dul bar byed/ /de dag sangs rgyas stobs bcu brtson bzhi dang/ /chos kyi khyad par bco brgyad rnams kyis kyang/ /sangs rgyas che ba'i bdag nyid rjod byed cing/ /sangs rgyas yon tan rnams kyis 'gro don
200a1(mdo 'grel): byed /de dag kun brjod rdzu 'phrul rjes bstan pas/ /gzugs kyi byin rlabs stobs kyis thams cad du /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul ston byed cing/ /rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pas sems can 'dul//
200a2(mdo 'grel): de dag thabs tshul rnam pa sna tshogs kyis/ /'jig rten rgyu zhing 'gro ba'i don rnams byed/ /'jig rten mi chags chu la pad+ma bzhin/ /dga' zhing dad par byed la rnam par rgyu/ /de dag snyan dngags mkhan rgyal snyan dngags sbyor/ /
200a3(mdo 'grel): gar mkhan rnga mkhan gyad dang rol mo mkhan/ /bzhugs mdzes rgyan phreng thogs shing gar byed dang/ sgyu ma mkhan po gzugs mang kun tu ston/ /grong pa grong dpon kha lo bsgyur bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin ded dpon tshong dpon
200a4(mdo 'grel): khyim bdag 'gyur/ /rgyal po blon po mdun 'don pho nya dang/ /sman pa 'jigs med bstan bcos chog mkhan/ /de dag dgon par ljon zhing chen por 'gyur/ /sman dang rin chen mi zad gter rnams dang/ /yid bzhin
200a5(mdo 'grel): nor bu 'dod sbyin sdong po dang/ /lam gol dong pa rnams la lam ston 'gyur/ /'jig rten byung nas mi ring shes gyur cig /sems can las kyi tshul rnams mi shes pa/ /de dag kun la rmongs chos tshong thabs dang/ /sna tshogs
200a6(mdo 'grel): bzo rnams 'jig rten rjod bar byed/ /'tshe med gnod pa med pa'i sbyor ba gang/ /sems can bde byed mkhas pas rab bsngags pa/ /rig stobs sman dang bstan bcos sna tshogs kun/ /drang srong de dag rnams kyis rab tu brjod
200a7(mdo 'grel): gang la lhar bcas 'jig rten mos 'gyur ba/ /drang srong spyod mchog dam pa gang yin dang/ /brtul zhugs dka' spyad dka' thub spyod kun kyang/ /mkhas pas de dag rnams kyis rab tu brjod/ /de dag spyod can kun rgyu mu stegs can
200b1(mdo 'grel): gdung ba go'u tam dang mi smrar spyod/ /gcer bu gos med lhur len dge sbyong la/ /mu stegs can gyi slob dpon mkhas par ston/ /de dag kun tu 'tsho ba'i chos 'dzin dang/ /bla na yod dang bla na med rnams dang/ /ral pa rir dang
200b2(mdo 'grel): gzhon nu'i brtul zhugs can/ /de dag tu yang slob dpon 'gyur ba yin/ /nyi ma'i rjes lta dka' thub lnga ldan dang/ /khyi dang pa lang brtul zhugs ri dags spyod/ /gle'u can dang mu stegs sum cu pa/ /de dag tu yang de dag slob
200b3(mdo 'grel): dpon 'gyur/ /lhag pa'i shes la 'jug pa dga' rnams dang/ /mu stegs nye rig yul du rgyu rnams su/ /rtsa ba 'bras bu chu spyad gyur nas kyang/ /bsam yas chos la de dag dam pa mchog /cog bur 'dug dang gcig pur rgyu ba
200b4(mdo 'grel): dang/ /tsher ma rtswa dang thal bar nyal ba dang/ /gang dag gtun shing mal can gnas pa dang/ /de dag tu yang de dag slob dpon 'gyur/ /phyi rol mu stegs can rnams ji snyed pa/ /de dag bsam pa mos brtogs byas shing//
200b5(mdo 'grel): bsnyen dka' mi bzad drag shul dka' thub kyis/ /mu stegs can gyi sdug bsngal spang bar 'dul/ /'jig rten lta bas 'khrugs pa shes byas nas/ /lta ba ngan la gnas pa'i mu stegs can/ /kun la phra ba'i gzhi dang thabs
200b6(mdo 'grel): tshul gyis/ /de dag rnams la bden pa ston par byed/ /la lar 'gro lding ba yi sngags kyi gzhi/ /shin tu gsang ba'i gzhi yis bden pa ston/ /la la dag la gsal zhing drang tshig gis/ /la la dag la lha yi gsang tshigs
200b7(mdo 'grel): gis/ /la la dgra la yi ge dbye tshig dang/ /don la rnam nges rdo rje gsod? rnams dang/ /rgol ba 'dul bar shes pa'i tshig rnams dang/ /bstan bcos thub med thar pa'i tshigs rnams kyis/ la la dag la mi skad tshig rnams dang/ /kun 
200b8(mdo 'grel): 201a
200b9(mdo 'grel): la 'jug pa 'dis tshig tshig rnams kyis/ /la la dag la lha yis nges tshig dang/ /klu yi nges tshig gnod sbyin nges tshig gis/ /la lar srin po 'byung po sha za dang/ /dri za grul bum lto 'phye 'phye tshig dang//
200b10(mdo 'grel): mi ci lha min mkha' lding tshig rnams kyis/ /bden pa bstan cing thar par 'dren par byed/ /de dag bden dang nges tshig tshul shes te/ /de ltar rgyal ba'i chos rnams ma lus pa'i/ /chos nyid bsam byas tshig lam shes par ston//
200b11(mdo 'grel): de dag ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul de 'dra'o/ /de dag 'gro bde mchog gi ting nge 'dzin/ /'gro ba kun la mngon par sgrub byed cing/ /'od zer bsam kyis mi khyab rab kye ste/ 'od zer bkye nas sems can 'dul bar byed/ /mthong na legs pa'i 'od zer rab
200b12(mdo 'grel): gtong zhing/ /sems can ji snyed 'od zer de shes pa/ /de dag mthong legs don med ma yin te/ /bla na med pa'i ye shes mchog gi rgyu/ /mi rnams kun la sangs rgyas yongs bstan cing/ /chos kyang yongs su bstan de
200b13(mdo 'grel): lam bstan cing/ /rgyal ba'i sku gzugs mchod rten bstan byas pas/ /des na mthong legs 'od zer grub par 'gyur/ /lha yi 'od zer zil gyis gnon pa'o/ /'od zer 'od byed ces bya rab gtong zhing/ /rdul dang mun pa
200b14(mdo 'grel): thams cad bsal byas te/ /'jig rten phan pa'i 'od de rab tu snang/ /sems can gang dag 'od des bskul byas pa/ /de dag rgyal pa mchod phyir sgron ma 'dzin/ /de dag rgyal ba mchod phyir sgron ma bzung bas/ /'jig rten sgo? nas? mdzad pa'i rgyal bar 'gyur//
200b15(mdo 'grel): 'bru mar mar mi mar gyi mar me dang/ rtswa shing 'dam bu 'od ma'i sgron ma dang/ spos dang bcud len rin chen sgron ma dang/ /rgyal ba rnams la phul nas 'od byed thob/ /sgrol zhes bya ba'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing/ /sems can gang dag 'od
201b16(mdo 'grel): @201b
201b17(mdo 'grel): des bskul byas la/ /de dag sred spangs sred pa'i rgya mtsho las/ /sems can sgrol ba'i don du go cha gyon/ /gang dag sred spangs sred pa'i rgya mtsho las/ /sems can sgrol ba'i don du go gyon pa/ /de dag chu bo bzhi las rab tu sgrol/ /mya
201b18(mdo 'grel): ngan med pa'i bde ba'i grong khyer ston/ /stegs dang zam pa du ma byas pa dang/ /chu klung lam la sgrol pa'i gru byin te/ /'dus byas sun phyung zhi ba bsngags byas pas/ /des na sgrol ba'i 'od zer grub par gyur/ /skom pa sel
201b19(mdo 'grel): ba'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing/ /sems can gang dag 'od des bskul byas pa/ /'dod pa'i yon tan skom pa rab spangs shing/ /chos la mos pa'i re ni don du gnyel ba/ /'dod pa'i yon tan skem pa rab spangs te/ /chos mos ro la
201b20(mdo 'grel): don du gnyer gyur pas/ /bdud rtsi'i char pa 'bebs pa'i sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /'jig rten skom pa'i sred pa rnam par srel/ /rdzing dang khron pa chu klung chu rdo dang/ /mtsho rnams byang chub don du byed btsud de/ /'dod pa smad
201b21(mdo 'grel): cing bsam gtan bsngags byas pas/ /des na skom pa sel ba grub par 'gyur/ /dga' bar byed pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing/ /sems can gang dag 'od des bskul byas pa/ /dga' bas rgyas shing byang chub mchog don
201b22(mdo 'grel): du/ /rang 'byung 'gyur bar bya zhes sems bskyed do/ /thugs rje ldan pa'i sku gzugs mtshan brgyan pa/ /pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa rnams byas shing/ /rtag tu sangs rgyas yon tan rnams brjod pa/ /des na dga' 
201b23(mdo 'grel): byed 'od zer grub par 'gyur/ /mgu bar byed pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing/ /sems can gang dag 'os des bskul byas pa/ /rtag tu sangs rgyas la ni dga' mgu zhing/ /chos la dga' mgu dge 'dun dga' mgu'o/ /de
202a1(mdo 'grel): dag rtag tu sangs rgyas dga' mgu zhing/ /chos la dga' mgu dge 'dun dga' mgu nas/ /sangs rgyas chos dang 'phags ba'i tshogs rnams dang/ /rtag tu 'grogs thob bzod la bla med 'thob/ /sangs
202a2(mdo 'grel): rgyas rjes dran chos dang tshogs mchog la/ /sems can mang po bskul cing dran byas te/ /byang chub sems kyi yon tan rab brjod pas/ /des na mgu byed 'od zer grub par 'gyur/ /bsod nams bsags pa'i 'od zer rab gtong
202a3(mdo 'grel): zhing/ /sems can gang dag 'od des bskul byas pa/ /bla na med ba'i byang chub don gnyer cing/ /sbyin pa sna tshogs du ma sbyin par byed /gtan pa med pa'i mchod sbyin de byed tshe /blo rab rnams kyi bsam pa rdzogs byed de//
202a4(mdo 'grel): bsam pa thams cad sbyin pa byin byas pas/ /bsod nams bsags pa'i 'od zer grub par gyur/ /ye shes ldan pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing/ /sems can gang dag 'od des bskul byas pa/ /chos gcig sgo mo nas ni du ma yi/ /chos
202a5(mdo 'grel): kyi sgo rnams yud kyi khong du chud/ /chos kyi dbye ba sems can 'dzin btsud de/ /don la nges pa'i ye shes rnam phye zhing/ /chos kyi tshig don brjod pa byas pa na/ /des na ye shes ldan pa'i 'od zer 'grub/ shes rab sgron ma'i 'od zer rab
202a6(mdo 'grel): gtong zhing/ /sems can gang dag 'od des bskul byas pa/ /stong pa bdag med ma skyes ma byung zhing/ /rang bzhin med pa'i chos la rab tu 'jug /bdag po med chos stong pa byed med pa/ /sgyu ma smig rgyu chu zla mtshungs 'dra zhing/ /rmi
202a7(mdo 'grel): lam mtshungs la gzugs brnyan 'dra ba dang/ bstan pas shes rab sgron ma de grub po/ /chos kyi rnam 'phrul 'od zer rab gtong zhing/ /sems can gang dag 'od des bskul byas pa/ /mi zad mdzod kyis gzungs ni thob gyur nas/ /de
202b1(mdo 'grel): bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi mdzod kyang 'dzin/ /chos 'dzin rnams la yongs su phan btags te/ /drang srong rnams la chos kyis bsrung byas shing/ /'gro ba chos kyi rjes su gzung byas bas/ /chos kyi rnam 'phrul 'od zer grub par gyur/ /gtong
202b2(mdo 'grel): dang ldan pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing/ /sems can 'jungs pa gang dag des bskul bas/ /longs spyod mi brtag mi brtan shes gyur nas/ /de dag rtag tu gtong la dga' mos 'gyur/ /ma dul gdul dka' i sems can ser sna can/ /nor
202b3(mdo 'grel): rnams rmi lam sprin dang 'dra shes nas/ /dga' ba'i yid kyis sbyin pa spel byas pas/ /des na gtong dang ldan pa'i 'od grub bo/ /yongs su gdung med 'od zer rab gtong zhing/ /khrims 'chal sems can gang dag des bskul ba/ /tshul khrims
202b4(mdo 'grel): rnam par dag la gnas gyur nas/ /rang byung 'gyur bar bya zhes sems bskyed do/ /dge ba'i las lam yongs su dag pa dang/ /tshul khrims la yang sems can mang 'dzud cing/ /byang chub sems kyang yang dag 'dzin bcug pas/ /yongs
202b5(mdo 'grel): gdud med pa'i 'od zer de grub po/ /bzod pa bkod pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing/ /mi bzod sems can gang dag des bskul ba/ /khro dang tha bar rgyal yongs spongs shing/ /de ni rtag tu bzod mos dga' bar 'gyur/ /sdig ldan rnams
202b6(mdo 'grel): kyis nyes byas bzod byas te/ /byang chub don du 'khrug pa ma byas shing/ /bzod pa'i yon tan rtag tu bsngags brjod pas/ /des na bzod pa bkod pa'i 'od grub po/ /brtun par ldan pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing/ /le lo'i sems can
202b7(mdo 'grel): gang dag des bskul ba/ /rigs par brtson pa dkon mchog gsum rnams la/ /sbyor ba skyo med mchod pa byed par 'gyur/ /rigs par brtson la dkon mchog gsum rnams la/ /sbyor ba skyo ba med pas mchod byas nas/ /de dag
203a1(mdo 'grel): bdud bzhi'i lam las rab 'das te/ /byang chub bla med myur du reg par 'gyur/ /sems can mang po brtson 'grus 'dzin bcug ste/ /dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa rab byas nas/ /zad pa'i dus na dam chos
203a2(mdo 'grel): yongs bzung bas/ /des na brtun par ldan pa'i 'od thob po/ /zhi bar byed pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing/ /rnam 'khrugs sems can ji snyed des bskul ba/ de dag chags med sdang med rmongs med cing/ /rtogs par gyur nas mnyam
203a3(mdo 'grel): gzhag sems su 'gyur/ /sdig pa'i grogs po skyon ldan skyon can dang/ /'dre ba yongs su rnam par spangs byas te/ /dgon par rab zhi bsam gtan rab brjod pas/ /des na zhi bar byed pa'i 'od grub po/ /shes rab bkod pa'i 'od
203a4(mdo 'grel): zer rab gtong zhing/ /shes 'tshal sems can ji snyed des bskul pa/ /bden dang rten dang rnam thar tshul rnams dang/ /dbang po shes pa rtogs par khong chud 'gyur/ /nyi ma'i sgrol ma'i ting 'dzin thob gyur nas/ /shes rab snang bar
203a5(mdo 'grel): mdzad pa'i rgyal bar 'gyur/ /rgyal srid nor dang bdag phangs yongs btang ste/ byang chub don du chos gang btsal byas pa/ /chos de gus par byas nas rab bshad pas/ /shes rab bkod pa'i 'od zer de grub po/ /sangs rgyas ldan pa'i

203a7(mdo 'grel): 'phrul mdza' yas brjod byas shing/ /sangs rgyas stobs dang rdzu 'phrul rab brjod pas/ /des na sangs rgyas ldan pa'i 'od grub po/ /mi 'jigs sbyin pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing/ /'jigs gnyen sems can gang la des reg pa//
203b1(mdo 'grel): 'byung po bza' dang gsad brdeg bcing ba dang/ /nad 'go 'jigs pa kun las thar par 'gyur/ /mi 'jigs sbyin pas sems can gang bskyabs dang/ /srog chags gsod las bzlog par byas pa dang/ /'jigs pa skyabs tshol rnams
203b2(mdo 'grel): la skyabs byas pas/ /mi 'jigs sbyin pa'i 'od zer de grub bo/ /bde ba kun byed 'od zer rab gtong zhing/ /nad pa na ba gang dag des rig pa/ /rnam pa kun du nad kyi sdug bsngal thar/ /bsam gtan ting 'dzin bde ba rnams kyang 'thob/ /nad
203b3(mdo 'grel): gsos 'bras bu sman dang rtsa ba dang/ /rin chen bcud len spos dang byug pa dang/ /bu ram sbrang rtsi 'o ma mar dag dang/ /'bru mar zas skom byin pa de thob po/ /sangs rgyas ston pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing/ /tshe zad tha mer gang dag des

203b5(mdo 'grel): rgyas skyabs su btang brjod pas/ /sangs rgyas ston pa'i 'od zer de thob bo/ /chos rab brjod pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing/ /sems can gang dag 'od des bskul byas pa/ /chos nyan klog cing yi ger 'dri bar byed/ /de dag rtag tu chos la
203b6(mdo 'grel): dga' mos 'gyur/ /chos kyi mu ge byung tshe chos brjod de/ /chos tshol rnams gyi bsam pa rdzogs byas shing/ /'dun pa bskyed de chos la brtson gyis zhes/ /brjod pas chos rab brjod pa de thob bo/ /sangs rgyas sras rnams yongs su bskul
203b7(mdo 'grel): ba'i phyir/ /dbyangs dang ldan pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing/ /'jig rten gsum na sgra rgyun ji snyed pa/ /kun kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung du thos/ /gsang bstod sgra yi drang srong che bstod de/ /rgyal ba'i gsung sgra don du sil snyan
204a1(mdo 'grel): dang/ sgra chen dril bu sbyin rnams 'gro kun la/ /rab tu bsngags pas dbyangs ldan 'od grub po/ /'chi med sbyin ba'i 'od zer rab stong zhing/ /sems can gang dag 'od des bskul byas pa/ /bag med spyod pa thams cad
204a2(mdo 'grel): rab spangs te/ /yon tan kun la brtson pa nyams su len/ /'dus byas rtag tu bde ba med pa ste/ /sdug bsngal che ba du mas yongs su gang/ /'gog pa rtag tu bde zhing zhi spyod ces/ /brjod pas 'chi med sbyin pa de thob bo/ /khyad par
204a3(mdo 'grel): ldan pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing/ /sems can gang dag 'od des bskul byas pa/ /rgyal ba rnams kyi tshul khrims khyad par dang/ /ting 'dzin khyad par shes rab khyad par thob/ /thub chen rgyal po khrims kyis/ mchog gyur
204a4(mdo 'grel): cing/ /ting 'dzin mchog dang shes rab mchog gyur ces/ /byang chub don du bstod cing bsngags brjod pas/ /des na khyad par ldan pa'i 'od grub bo/ /rin chen bkod pa'i 'od zer rab gtod zhing/ /sems can gang dag 'od des
204a5(mdo 'grel): bskul byas pa/ /rin chen mi zad gter rnams thob gyur nas/ /drang srong che la rin chen dam pas mchod/ /rgyal dang rgyal ba'i mchod rten rin chen phul/ /skye bo nyon mongs rin chen rnams kyis bsdus/ /rgyal ba rnams la rin chen
204a6(mdo 'grel): rab phul bas/ /rin chen bkod pa'i 'od zer grub par 'gyur/ /spos rab snang ba'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing/ /sems can gang dag 'od des bskul byas pas/ /mi la med spos yid 'od tshor gyur nas/ /sangs rgyas yon tan rnams la nges
204a7(mdo 'grel): par 'gyur/ /mi dang lha yi spos dang byug pa yis/ /mi yi gtsol? mchod pa rab byas te/ /spos las rgyal ba'i gzugs dang mchod rten dag /byas pas spos rab snang ba de grub bo/ /sna tshogs bkod pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing/ /rgyal
204b1(mdo 'grel): mtshan pa dan gdugs mchog sna tshogs dang/ /sil snyan bsgrags shing spos kyi bdug pa yis/ /pho brang dam pa mdzes byas me tog bkram/ /sil snyan dag gis rgyal ba rnams bsu zhing/ /me tog bdag pa bdug spos phye ma dang//
204b2(mdo 'grel): rgyal mtshan pa dan gdugs mchog rnams kyis mchod/ /des na sna tshogs bkod pa grub par gyur/ /shin du dang byed 'od zer rab gtong zhing/ /sa rnams lag mthil bzhin du gnas par byed/ /mchod rten drang song gnas rnams sbyang byas
204b3(mdo 'grel): pas/ /des na shin tu dang byed 'od grub bo/ /sprin dang ldan pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing/ /spos kyi char 'bebs sprin rnams kun tu gnas/ /mchod rten 'khor sar spos kyis chus btab pas/ /sprin dang ldan pa'i 'od de rab tu 'thob/ /lha ba
204b4(mdo 'grel): lhub bkod pa'i 'od zer rab gtod zhing/ bag cing bu gos gyon rgyan dang ldan par 'gyur/ /gos dang bgo ba rgyan phyed sna tshogs dag /sbyin pa byas pas lhab lhub bkod pa grub/ /ro mchog ldan pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing/ /bkres ba kha
204b5(mdo 'grel): zas ro mchog thob par 'gyur/ /zas dang skom dang re mchog sna tshogs rnams/ /byin pas ro mchog ldan pa'i 'od grub ba/ /ner rnams ston pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing/ /dbul po dag gis rin chen gter rnams 'thob/ /dkon mchog
204b6(mdo 'grel): gsum la gter gzhi mi zad pa/ /dbul ba byas pas nor ston 'od thob po/ /mig rnam spyod pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing/ /de tshe long bas sna tshogs gzugs rnams mthong/ /rgyal ba dag dang rgyal ba'i mchod rten la/ /mar me phul
204b7(mdo 'grel): bas mig sbyod 'od zer grub/ /rna ba rnam skyed 'od zer rab gtong zhing/ /rna ba nyams pas sgra mang thos par 'gyur/ /rgyal ba rnams dang rgyal ba'i mchod rten la/ /sil snyan phul bas sna sbyong 'od grub po//

204b15(mdo 'grel): pha ma la/ /ro mchog thams cad bul ba'i 'od de yin/ /reg rnam spyod ba'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing/ /reg na rtsub ba 'jam zhing bde bar 'gyur/ /mdung thung rtse gsum ral gri mnga' chen chang/ /phreng ba 'jam pa pad+ma ud+pal?

205b23(mdo 'grel): nyi ma mi mthong yang/ /de med ma yin 'jig rten kun du 'chang/ /mig dang ldan pas shar bar shes gyur nas/ /kun kyang rang rang so so'i las la 'jug /de bzhin skye chen 'od zer de dag kun/ /rab tu byung yang log pas nyen gyur cing//
206a1(mdo 'grel): mos nyams phal ba rnams kyis mi mthong ste/ /blo gros yangs ba rnams la de dag mos/ /dper rgyan nor bu gzhon pa gzhal med khang/ /bcud kyis len dang rin chen byug pa spos/ /de dag skye bo che la yod mod kyi//
206a2(mdo 'grel): phongs par gyur ba rnams la de dag med/ /de bzhin skyes chen 'od zer de dag kun/ /de dag yod kyang log pas nyen gyur cing/ /mos pa nyams pa rnaM kyis mi mthong ste/ /blo gros yangs pa rnams la de dag mod/ /gang dag 'od zer dbye ba 'di
206a3(mdo 'grel): thos nas/ /dad cing mos la dang ba skyes gyur nas/ /bdag ni yon tan cher rgyud mi 'gyur zhes/ /de dag nog dang som nyi mi bskyed do/ /de dag g.yog 'khor bkod ba rnam 'phrul ba/ /ting 'dzin dam pa mngon par grub byed
206a4(mdo 'grel): cing/ /phyogs bcu kun du ngo zla med rnams kyi/ /zham ring sangs rgyas spas rnams ston par byed/ /'ong bkod de dag pad+ma sna tshogs ba /stong gsum tshad tsam byin gyis brlabs byas nas/ /skyil krung bcas pa'i lus kyis kun
206a5(mdo 'grel): khyab ste/ /ting 'dzin rnam par 'phrul pa 'di 'dra'o/ /de dag zhing bcu'i rdul snyed pad+ma gzhan/ /'khor dang bcas pas byin gyis brlabs byas shing/ /sangs rgyas sras kyi thams cad yongs su bskor/ /de dag ting 'dzin
206a6(mdo 'grel): ting 'dzin med par gnas/ /drang song de yis sems can gang dag rnams/ /yongs su smin byas sangs rgyas legs pa sgrubs pas/ /de dag pad+ma chen po de bskor cing/ /kun kyang thal mo sbyar nas lta zhing 'khod/ /gang dag ting 'dzin gnaS
206a7(mdo 'grel): par rab zhugs pa/ /skyes chen rnams kyi chos nyid 'di yin te/ rang gis slob mas kun kyang yongs bskor nas/ /skar ma'i tshogs kyis zla ba bskor ba bzhin/ /de dag ji ltar phyogs cig rab 'jug cing/ /zham ring sangs
206b1(mdo 'grel): rgyas sras rnams ston byed pa/ /de bzhin phyogs rnams ma lus kun tu ston/ /ting 'dzin rnam par 'phrul pa 'di 'dra'o/ /de dag phyogs kyi dra ba khyab gnas ba'i/ /ting 'dzin dam pa mngon par sgrub byed cing/ /kha cig mnyam gzhag
206b2(mdo 'grel): kha cig ldang bar yang/ /phyogs rnams kun du rang gi lus ston to/ /de dag shar gyi phyogs su mnyam bzhag cing/ /nub kyi phyogs nas dpa' bo rnam par ldang/ /nub kyi phyogs su mnyam par bzhag /gyur cing//
206b3(mdo 'grel): /bdag nyid chen po shar gyi phyogs nas ldang/ /de bzhin phyogs bcu rnams su rab tu 'jug /gzhan gyi phyogs su mnyam par bzhag gyur la/ /ye shes yon tan phyug po gzhan nas ldang/ /drang srong ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul
206b4(mdo 'grel): 'di 'dra'o/ /shar phyogs sangs rgyas zhing rnams gang yin pa/ /grangs med ma lus dag na rang byung ba/ /de dag spyan sngar zhe pas drung de ngag rnams/ /zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas par snang/ /phyogs der mnyam par bzhag pa brtan byas nas//
206b5(mdo 'grel): dpa' po nub kyi zhing rnams mi lus par/ /rnam par ldang zhing mngon sum rgyal kun la/ /mchod pa du ma rab tu yan par snang/ /nub phyogs sangs rgyas zhing rnams gang yin pa/ /grangs med ma lus dag na zhugs sangs rgyas/ /de dag
206b6(mdo 'grel): spyan sngar zhabs drung de dag rnams/ /zhi ba ting nge 'dzin la gnas par snang/ /phyogs der mnyam par bzhag pa brtan byas nas /dpa' bo shar gyi zhing rnams ma? lus par/ /rnam par ldang zhing mngon sum rgyal kun la /mchod pa
206b7(mdo 'grel): du ma rab tu byed par sung?/ /de bzhin phyogs bcu dag gi zhing rnams su/ /phyogs rnams ma lus kun du brtan la 'jug /kha cig mnyam gzhag kha cig langs gyur cing/ /'jig rten sgron ma rnams la mchod byed snang/ /de dag mig gi
207a1(mdo 'grel): lam la mnyam gzhag cing/ /gzugs kyi lam nas bdag nyid chen po ldang/ /gzugs rnams bsam gyis mi khyab ston pa na/ /de la lhar bcas 'jig rten rmongs par 'gyur/ /gzugs kyi lam
207a2(mdo 'grel): la mnyam par bzhag gyur la/ /mig ni ma skyes ma byung rang bzhin te/ /stong pa byed pa med par rab ston cing/ /mig gi lam nas dran ldan rnams par ldang/ /de dag rna ba'i lam la mnyam gzhag cing/ /sgra yi lam nas bdag nyid
207a3(mdo 'grel): chen po ldang/ /gang la lhar bcas 'jig rten rmong 'gyur ba/ /sgra dang skad rnams kun la rab tu zhugs/ /sgra yi laM la mnyam par gzhag gyur cing/ /rna ba ma skyes ma byung rang bzhin te/ /stong pa byed pa med par rab ston cing//
207a4(mdo 'grel): rna ba'i lam nas dran ldan rnam par ldang/ /de dag sna yi lam la mnyam gzhag cing/ /dri yi lam nas bdag nyid chen bo ldang/ /gang du ltar bcas 'jig rten rmongs 'gyur ba/ /dri mchog dam pa 'jug par rab tu zhugs
207a5(mdo 'grel): dri yi lam la mnyam par bzhag gyur cing/ /sna ni ma skyes ma byung rang bzhin te/ /stong pa byed pa med par rab ston cing/ /sna yi lam nas dran ldan rnam par ldang/ /de dag lce yi lam la mnyam gzhag cing/ /re mchog kun gyi lam
207a6(mdo 'grel): nas rnam par ldang/ /gang du lhar bcas 'jig rten rmongs gyur ba/ /bdag nyid chen po ro mchog rnams la zhugs/ /ro mchogs rnams la mnyam par bzhag gyur cing/ /lce ni ma skyes ma byung rang bzhin te/ /stong pa byed pa med
207a7(mdo 'grel): par rab ston cing/ /lce'i? lam nas dran ldan rnam par ldang/ /de dag lus kyi lam la mnyam gzhag cing/ /reg pa'i lam nas bdag nyid chen po ldang/ /gang du ltang bcas 'jig rten rmongs gyur pa/ /'jig rten bde ba bskyed pa'i
207b1(mdo 'grel): reg la bzhugs/ /reg pa'i lam la mnyam par bzhag gyur cing/ /lus ni ma skyes ma byung rang bzhin te/ stong pa byed pa med par rab ston cing/ /lus kyi lam nas dran ldan rnam par ldang/ /de dag sems kyi lam la mnyam gzhag cing/ /
207b2(mdo 'grel): chos kyi la mnas bdag nyid chen po ldang/ /gang du lhar bcas 'jig rten rmongs gyur pa/ /chos la gnas par 'jug pa rab tu zhugs/ /chos kyi lam la mnyam par bzhag gyur cing/ /sems ni ma skyes ma byung rang bzhin te/ /ston pa byed
207b3(mdo 'grel): pa med par rab ston cing/ /sems kyi lam nas dran ldan rnam par ldang/ /de dag byis pa'i lus la mnyam gzhag cing/ /lang tsho shugs la gnas pa rnams las ldang/ /lang tsho shugs la gnas la rnams la mnyam gzhag cing/ /rgas
207b4(mdo 'grel): shing 'khogs pa'i lus las rnam par ldang/ /rgas shing 'khogs pa'i lus la mnyam gzhag cing/ /dad pa'i dge bsnyen ma yi lus las ldang/ /dge bsnyen ma yi lus las mnyam gzhag cing/ dad pa'i dge bsnyen? lus laS rnam ldang par/ /dad pa'i dge bsnyen
207b5(mdo 'grel): lus las mnyam zhag cing/ /dge slong ma yi lus las rnam par ldang/ /dge slong ma yi lus la mnyam zhag cing/ /dge slong mang du thos pa'i lus las ldang/ /dge slong mang thos lus la mnyam gzhag cing/ /slob dang mi slob lus las rnam par ldang/
207b6(mdo 'grel): slong dang mi slob lus la mnyam gzhag cing/ /rkyen gyis sangs rgyas lus las rnam par ldang/ /rkyen gyis sangs rgyas lus la mnyaM gzhag cing/ /sangs rgyas sku mchog rab las rnam par ldang/ /sangs rgyas sku mchog rab laS mnyam gzhag cing/ /lha yi lus gzugs las ni rnam
207b7(mdo 'grel): par ldang/ /lha yi lus gzugs la ni mnyam gzhag cing/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po klu yi lus las ldang/ /rdzu 'phrul klu yi lus la mnyam gzhig cing/ /dzu 'phrul chen po gnod sbyin lus las ldang/ /'phrul chen gnod sbyin lus la mnyam gzhag
208a1(mdo 'grel): cing/ /'byung po kun gyis lus las rnam par ldang/ /'byung bo kun gyis lus la mnyam gzhag cing/ /spu yi sgo gcig nas ni rnam par ldang/ /spu sgo? gcig la mnyam par bzhag gyur cig /spu sgo thams cad
208a2(mdo 'grel): las ni rnam par ldang/ /spu sgo kun la mnyam par bzhag gyur cing/ /skra rtse gcig gi khyon las rnam par ldang/ /skra rtse gcig gi khyon la mnyam gzhag cing/ /skra rtse kun gyi khyon las rnam par ldang/ /skra rtse kun gyi khyon la mnyam gzhag
208a3(mdo 'grel): cing/ /phra rab rdul gyi rdul las de dag ldang/ /rdul gcig la ni mnyam par bzhag gyur cing/ /ma lus rdzub rnams kun las rnam par ldang/ /rdul rnams ma lus kun la mnyam gzhag cing
208a4(mdo 'grel): rgya mtsho rdo rje'i gzhi las rnam par ldang/ /rgya mtsho rdo rje'i gzhil mnyam gzhag cing/ /nor bu'i shing tog dag las rnam par ldang/ /shing tog rnams la mnyam pr bzhag gyur cing/ /rgyal pa rnams kyi 'od zer sgo nas ldang/ /rgyal ba'i
208a5(mdo 'grel): 'od zer sgo la mnyam gzhag cing/ /rgya mtsho'i chu yi chu klung rnams las ldang/ /rgya mtsho'i chu klung rnams la mnyam gzhag cing/ /bdag nyid chen po me yi lam las ldang/ /me yi lam la mnyam par bzhag gyur cing/ /rlung gi lam
208a6(mdo 'grel): las dran ldan rnam par ldang/ /rlung gi lam la mnyam par bzhag gyur cing/ /bdag nyid chen pos yi gzhi las ldang/ /sa yi gzhi la mnyam par bzhag gyur cing/ /lha kun gzhal ming khang las rnam par ldang/ /lha kun
208a7(mdo 'grel): gzhal med khang la mnyam gzhag cing/ /dran ldan de ni mkha' las rnam par ldang/ /yon tan mdza' yas bsags pa de dag gi/ ting 'dzin rnam thar de dag bsam mi khyab/ /rgyal ba kun gyis bskal pa bsam yas su/ /ba bshad pa mdzad
208b1(mdo 'grel): kyang zad par mdzad mi sbyang/ /'gro las rnam smin pas ma gyis mi khyab ste/ /rgyal ba kun gyis de dag gsungs pa ni/ /klu yi rnam 'phrul sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul dang/ /bsam byed bsam gtan rnam
208b2(mdo 'grel): 'phrul bsam mi khyab/ /de dag la yang dpes ston brjod par bya/ /de dag 'dra ba'i dpe lta cang med de/ /mkhas shing rig pa'i skye bo dpe rnams kyis/ /bstan na myur du don rnams shes pa 'gyur/ /rnam thar brgyad kyi dbang la gnas pa
208b3(mdo 'grel): yi/ /nyan thos gcig tu gyur nas mar por 'gyur/ /mang por gyur nas phyir yang gcig 'gyur te/ /mkha' la bsam gtan 'cha' zhing 'bar bar byed/ /smad nas me 'bar stong nas chu yi rgyun/ /stong nas me 'bar smad nas chu yi rgyun//
208b4(mdo 'grel): 'gro dang 'greng dang nyal dang 'dug pa dang/ /lus 'phrul skad cig gcig la bsam mi khyab/ /de ni snying rje che dang mi ldan zhing/ /byang chub mi tshol 'jig rten yal 'dor yang/ /lus kyi rnam 'phrul bsam yas ston byed na/ /'jig
208b5(mdo 'grel): rten phan 'dod ci phyir ston mi byed/ /nyi zla mkha' las rnam par rgyu 'dod zhing/ /phyogs rnams kun gyi chu yi dogs ngag? dang/ /mtsho mtshe'u mtsho bran snod dang rin chen dang/ /rgya mtsho chu klung rnams su gzugs brnyen ston/ /de bzhin
208b6(mdo 'grel): gzugs rnams bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ /skyes bu dpa' bo phyogs bcu kun tu ston/ /ting 'dzin rnam thar kun gyi tshum? la mkhas/ /de la de bzhin gshegs par rang byung dbang/ /dad ba'i mtsho la yan lag bzhi pa'i dam na?/ /de dag so
208b7(mdo 'grel): so'i rang gis gzugs brnyan mthong/ /ral gri mnga' chen gzhu dang mda' rnams dang/ /go gyon bzhin dang theg par bcas su mthong/ /gang gi gzugs gang gnas gang cha byad yang/ /de dang de dag de ltar chu las mthong/ /'on kyang

208b9(mdo 'grel): chu la byams sdang rnam rtog med/ /drang srong ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul 'di 'dra'o/ /rgya mtsho'i lha mo sgra ldan zhes bya ba/ /sems can rgya mtshor ji snyed skyes rnams kyis/ /sgra yi yan lag dbyangs gyi tshul
208b10(mdo 'grel): mkhas te/ /rang gi skad kyi skad kun chim par byed/ /sgra ldan chags sdang gti mug can de yang/ /skad rnams kun gyis sgra yi tshul mkhas na/ /gzugs dang chos kyi stobs la dbang thob rnams/ /lhar bcas 'jig rten ci phyir mgu

208b15(mdo 'grel): bcas go gyon bzhin du byed/ /'dod chags sdang ldan lha dbang de dag kyang/ /lus kyi rnam 'phrul bsam yas ston byed na/ /dbang phyug rdzu 'phrul dbang gnas dpa' ba rnams/ /lus kyi rnam 'phrul ci phyir ston mi byed/ /rdo rje 'chang

209b17(mdo 'grel): ba'i blang pos bsrung bu/ /dbang bo'i 'khor gyur rdzu 'phrul chen po de/ /mgo po sum cu rtsa gsum mngon sprul zhing/ /mgo rnams kun la'ang mche ba drug drug ste/ /mche ba de dag so so re re la'ang/ /rdzing bu chu gang bdun bdud sprul? ba byed/ /?

209b19(mdo 'grel): po de yang lus ni sgyur byas te/ /lha rnams kun dang 'grogs shing 'dre bar byed/ /spyod pa'i tshul dang longs spyod kun kyang mthun/ /glang po mchog gi rnam 'phrul de ltar snang/ /glang ba? chags sdang gti mug ldan de yang/ /'di 'dra'i rdzu 'phrul

209b22(mdo 'grel): bsam yas pa la ltos/ /lha dang lha min dbang po g.yul 'gyed tshe/ /lha min bye ba 'byed ba ji snyed pa/ /de stong? brgya byin rang gi lus las sprul/ /lha min dbang dang lha min phal kun gyis/ /brgya byin rang rang mdun du 'dug par
209b23(mdo 'grel): shes/ /de ni rdo rje 'chang bas bzung ngo zhes/ /lta min dbang po kun kyang mgo myos gyur/ /'jigs par byed pa'i mig stong rab bstan te/ /rdo rje me lce 'bar ba thogs byed cing/ /lus la go kha gos gzi brjid bsnyen dka' ba'i/ /brgya byin
210a1(mdo 'grel): mthong nas lha min dbang po 'byer/ /de yang bsod nams phal ba'i mthu stobs kyi/ /lha rgyal don du rnam bar 'phrul byed na/ /'gro ba ma lus kun gyi skyabs gyur ba/ /bsod nams mi zad rnams lta cis mi
210a2(mdo 'grel): 'phrul/ /lha la skul ma 'debs pa'i lha yi rnga/ /lha las rnam par smin pas grub par gyur/ /lha rnams bag med gnas par shes gyur nas/ /rnga de nam mkha' las ni sgra sgrogs te/ /'dod ba thams cad mi rtag ther zug min/ /tha shal
210a3(mdo 'grel): mi brtan dbu ba'i ngo bo nyid/ /sgyu ma smig rgyu chu zla mtshungs shing 'dra/ /srid pa thams cad rmi lam sbrin dang mtshungs /bag med thams cad dgra bcas mya ngan can/ /'chi ba'i lam yin mi 'chi'i lam ma yin/ /ji snyed su dag
210a4(mdo 'grel): bag med gnas gyur ba/ /de dag 'chi bdag chu srin chen pos zin/ /sdug bsngal rtsa ba yongs 'dzin thams cad yin/ /skye ba thams cad 'phags pa rnams kyi smad/ /'dod ba'i yon tan rnams kyi yul la rmongs/ /chos kyi stobs
210a5(mdo 'grel): la rtag dga' gyis zhes bskul/ /rnga des bskul nas brgya byin lha rnams dang/ /lha yi mdun sa chos bzang 'dug nas su/ /gtam gang zhi zhi 'dod chags bral mthun pa/ /chos kyi gtam de lha rnams kun la brjod/ /rnga de gzugs
210a6(mdo 'grel): med bstan du mi rung yang/ /de ltar rnga sgras don chen rab byed na/ /bsam pa ji bzhin gzugs ni yongs ston rnams/ /'gro ba kun gyi don chen ci mi byed/ /lha dang lha min dbang po g.yul 'gyed che/ /lha yi bsod nams byed pI
210a7(mdo 'grel): mthu stabs kyis/ /lha la skul ma 'dabs ba'i lha yi rnga/ /lha rnams ma 'jigs shig ces sgra 'byin te/ /rnga yis bskul nas lha rnams rab dga' zhing/ /skrag ba med de stobs kyang skyes bar 'gyur/ /lha min dbang po skrag pas nyen pa
210b1(mdo 'grel): rnams/ /'jigs nas dmag bcas de yi mod las 'byer/ /de skad sgra skad 'byin pa'i rnga 'dra ba/ /'gro ba kun gyi skyabs dang dbung gnyen po/ /nyon mongs bdud bcom snying rje che ldan rnams/ /zhi ba'i sgra bsgrags nyon mongs phel

210b3(mdo 'grel): chos bzang mdun sa na yang de bzhin 'dug /lha rnams kun la chos rab ston snang zhing/ /brgya byin skad cig gcig la rnam bar 'phrul/ /brgya byin chags sdang gti mug ldan ba yang/ /sprul pas rang gi 'khor rnams dga' byed na//
210b4(mdo 'grel): 'gro don mi skyo sbyor rnams ci yi phyir/ /rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis 'jig rten mgu mi byed/ /bdud kyi dkrugs ma 'gro ba'i dbang sgyur ba/ /de yi dbang du sems can 'di kun 'dod/ /las dang nyon mongs kun tu zhugs pa yis/ /
