210b6(mdo 'grel): stong gsum gnas kyi bdag po tshangs pa yang/ /stong gsum tshangs gnas ji snyed yod pa na/ /de dag kun na 'dug par rab snang zhing/ /tshangs ba'i sgra dbyangs shin tu yid 'ong sgrogs/ /tshangs de 'jig rten pa yi tshangs lam gyi/ /bsam
210b7(mdo 'grel): gtan mngon shes rnam par 'phrul byed na/ /'jig rten rab 'das bla na med pa yi/ /bsam gtan rnam thar gnas pa cis mi 'phrul/ /dbang phyug chen po'i shes pa'i rnam 'phrul ltos/ /rgya mtsho'i sbrin gyis char thigs rab bkye ba/ /skad cig
211a1(mdo 'grel): gcig la thams cad bgrang ba byed/ /thigs 'ga' i zer kyang ma shes de med na/ /bslab pa bskal pa bsam yas rab bslabs te/ /byang chub bla med ye shes thob pa rnams/ /ci phyir skad cig gcig las
211a2(mdo 'grel): sems kyis ni/ /'gro ba ma lus rnams kyi sems mi shes/ /sems can las smin bsam gyi mi khyab pas/ /'jig nyen 'di kun rlung las yongs su byung/ /rgya mtsho ri dang lta yi bzhal med khang/ /rin chen rnam phye? sa bon? bsam?
211a3(mdo 'grel): ba 'ang byung/ /rlung las byung gyur sprin gyis char 'bebs shing/ /slar yang rlung nyid kyis ni sprin zhi byed/ /'jig rten gyis ni lo tog rlung gis bskyed/ /'gro ba kun gyi bde mar rlung gis byas/ /rlung des pha rol phyir lam bslabs shing/
211a4(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas yon tan rnams la ma bslabs par/ /'jig rten rnam smin bsam mi khyab ston na/ /mchog thob pa dag ci ste ston mi byed ces bya ba'o/ /bslab pa kun las btus pa las dkon mchog gsum rjes su dran ba'i le'u
211a5(mdo 'grel): ste bco brgyad ba'o// //bsod nams 'phel ba'i don du rgyu gzhan yang bya ste/ gang zhig /dus rnams kun du sems can don bya ba 'di yin no/ /'di ni dkon mchog sprin las/ de bzhin gshegs pI
211a6(mdo 'grel): mchod rten nam de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs la me tog gam bdug pa 'am spos gsol na sems can thaMs cad kyi ngang tshul ngan pa'i dri nga? ba? bsal ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims kyi dri thob par yongs su bsngo'o/
211a7(mdo 'grel): de phyag dar dang zhal zhal byed na sems can thams cad kyi spyod lam mi sdug pa med par 'gyur ba dang spyod lam mdzes pa phun sum tshogs par yongs su bsngo'o/ /de me tog gi gdugs gsol na sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs
211b1(mdo 'grel): pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs ba'i gdung ba med bar bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/ /de gtsug lag khang gi nang du 'gro na 'di ltar sems can thams cad mya ngan las 'das ba'i grong khyer du gzung ngo snyam du sems bskyed do/ /de phyir 'byung na sems can
211b2(mdo 'grel): thams cad 'khor ba'i btson ra nas gdon to snyam du sems bskyed do/ /de gnas khang gi sgo 'byed na 'di ltar 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes kyi bde 'go thams cad kyi sgo dbye'o/ /snyam du sems bskyed do/ /de sgo gcod na 'di ltar ngan 'gro
211b3(mdo 'grel): thams cad kyi sgo rnams gcang ngo snyams du sems bskyed do/ /de 'dug na 'di ltar sems can thams cad byang chub kyi snying po la 'god do snyam du sems bskyed do/ /de glo g.yas pas nyal na 'di ltar sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi
211b4(mdo 'grel): mya ngan las 'da' bas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' o snyam du sems bskyed do/ /de de nas ldang na 'di ltar sems can thams cad nyon mongs pa kun nas ldang ba rnams las bslang ngo snyaM du sems bskyed do/ /de lus kyi ched la 'gro na 'di ltar sems
211b5(mdo 'grel): can thams cad skyes bu chen po'i 'gros su 'gro bar gyur cig snyam du sems bskyed do/ /de'i ltar 'dug na 'di ltar sems can thams cad kyi 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mu gi zug rdu dbyung ngo snyam du sems bskyed do/ /de bkru bshal byed
211b6(mdo 'grel): na 'di ltar sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i dri ma'i skyon rnams bka' o? snyam du sems bskyed do/ /de lag pa bsnyal na 'di ltar sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i dri nga ba rnams bsal lo snyam du sems bskyed do/ /de rkang
211b7(mdo 'grel): pa 'khru na sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i rdul rnam pa sna tshogs bsal lo snyam du sems bskyed do/ /de gdong 'khru na 'di ltar sems can thams cad kyi chos thams cad kyi sgo yongs su sbyang ngo snyam du sems bskyed do/ /de so shing zan 'di ltar
212a1(mdo 'grel): sems can thams cad kyi dri ma rnam pa sna tshogs bsal lo snyam du sems bskyed do/ /de lus kyi g.yo ba thams cad sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde bar yongs su bsngo'o/ /de bzhin gshegs ba'i mchod rten la?
212a2(mdo 'grel): phyag 'tshal na 'di ltar sems can thams cad lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi phyag bya bar shog cig snyam du sems bskyed do zhes ji skad du gsung pa lta bu'o/ /yang na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las ji skad gsungs pa lta bu ste /shA ri'i bu
212a3(mdo 'grel): gzhan yang gcan gzan khro bo'i dgon par song na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'jigs par mi byed skrag par mi bya dngang bar mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des sems can thams cad kyi don du thams cad
212a4(mdo 'grel): yongs su btang ba'i phyir te/ des 'di snyam du gal te gcan gzan dag gi bdag zos na 'di ltar sbyin pa de byin bar gyur cing/ /bdag gi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
212a5(mdo 'grel): byang chub la yang shin tu nye bar 'gyur ro/ /ji ltar bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na dud 'gro'i skyes gnas su song ba'i sems can yod ye med par 'gyur
212a6(mdo 'grel): ba de ltar bya'o snyam du sems bskyed do/ /shA ri'i bu rkun po'i dgon bar song na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'jigs par mi bya skrag par mi bya dngang par mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
212a7(mdo 'grel): chen pos de dag ni bdag pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba la mkhas pa yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos lus kyang yongs su btang ba yin yo byad dang 'tshogs chas kyang yongs su btang ba yin te/ des 'di snyam du gal te
212b1(mdo 'grel): sems can de dag gi bdag gi yo byad dang 'tshogs chas rnams phrogs na de dag la sbyin pa de phyin par gyur cig /gal te de dag gis bdag gi srog gcad par gyur kyang de la bdag gi zhe sdang dang khong khro ba bskyed bar mi bya/ /bdag? gi
212b2(mdo 'grel): de dag la lus dang dag dang yid kyis kyang nyes pa mi bya'o/ /de ltar na de'i tshe sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhing/ /bdag bla na med pa yang dag
212b3(mdo 'grel): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la shin tu nye bar 'gyur te/ ji ltar bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon bar rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i tshe/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na nyes pa 'di dag dang gzhan yang yod de rnam pa thams cad
212b4(mdo 'grel): du mi 'byung zhing med par 'gyur ba de ltar bya'o de ltar bsgrub bar bya'o snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu chu'i dgon par phyin na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'jigs par mi bya skrag par mi bya dngang bar mi bya'o/ /
212b5(mdo 'grel): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni mi 'jigs pa'i chos can yin te/ des 'di snyam du bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi sred pa thamS cad gcad par bslab bar bya'o/ /byang chub sems
212b6(mdo 'grel): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos skrags par mi bya'o/ /gal te bdag skom bas 'chi ba'i dus byas bar gyur na sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po'i sems bskyed par bya ste/ kye ma 'di ltar 'jig rten na chu'i dgon pa 'di lta bu snang bas seMs can
212b7(mdo 'grel): 'di dag ni bsod nams chung ba dag ste /ji ltar bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas ba'i tshe /sangs rgyas gyi zhing de na chu'i dgon pa yod ye rnam pa thams cad du mi 'byung ba dang mi snang bar?
212b8(mdo 'grel): 213a
212b9(mdo 'grel): 'gyur ba de ltar bya'o? de ltar bsgrub po/ /ji ltar yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chu rnyed par 'gyur ba de ltar bsod nams kyi las la sems can rnams sbyar bar bya'o/ /ji ltar de'i tshe brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
212b10(mdo 'grel): pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba de ltar sems can thams cad kyi don du brtson 'grus brtan pa brtsam par bya'o snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu gzhan yang bkres pa'i dgon par song na/ byang chub sems dpa' 
212b11(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' chen pos 'jigs par mi bya skrag par mi? dngang? bar mi bya'o/ /des 'di ltar 'dis go cha bgo ste /ji ltar bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi
212b12(mdo 'grel): zhing de na bkres pa'i dgon pa 'di lta bu yong ye rnam pa thams cad mi 'byung ba dang/ mi snang bar 'gyur ba dang sems can de dag thams cad bde bar 'gyur zhing bde ba la dbang ba dang bde ba dang ldan par 'gyur ba de ltar brtson
212b13(mdo 'grel): 'grus brtan po brtsam par bya ste /de ltar rang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/ /de ltar na sems can de dag gang ci sems par 'gyur ba dang yid kyis gang dang gang 'dod pa de dang de 'byung par 'gyur /'di lta ste
212b14(mdo 'grel): dper na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi yid la bsams pa thams cad 'grub pa dang yid la bsam pa thams cad 'byung ba bzhin du de ltar bya'o/ /ji ltar sems can de dag chos dang ldan pa'i bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par
212b15(mdo 'grel): 'gyur ba dang/ sems can thams cad thams cad du thams cad las 'tsho ba'i yo byad dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar brtson 'grus brtan po brtsam par bya'o snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o zhes bya ba'o/ /de ltar dus rnamS
213b16(mdo 'grel): @213b
213b17(mdo 'grel): kun tu sems can gyi don bya ba 'di ni bsod nams 'phel ba'i rgyu ste/ zhib tu spyod yul yongs su dag pa'i mdo las blta bar bya'o/ /gzhan yang/ chos kyi sbyin pa zang zing med/ bsod nams 'phel ba'i rgyur 'gyur te/ lhag pI
213b18(mdo 'grel): bsam pa skul ba'i mdo las ji skad gsungs pa lta bu ste /byams pa gang zhig thob pa dang bkur sti mi 'dod par chos kyi sbyin pa byin na/ chos kyi sbyin pa zang zing med pa'i phan yon nyi shu ste/ nyi shu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste dran pa dang ldan pa yin/
213b19(mdo 'grel): blo dang ldan pa yin /blo gros dang ldan pa yin /mos pa dang ldan pa yin/ /shes rab dang ldan pa yin/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab rjes su rtag par 'gyur pa yin/ 'dod chags chung ba yin zhe sdang
213b20(mdo 'grel): chung ba yin /gti mug chung ba yin/ /bdud kyis de la glags mi rnyed pa yin/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis dgongs pa yin /mi ma yin pa rnams kyis de bsrung ba yin /lha rnams de'i lus la mdangs 'jug pa yin/
213b21(mdo 'grel): mi 'dza' ba rnams kyis de la glags mi rnyed pa yin/ de mdza' bo rnams dang mi phyed pa yin /tshig gzung bar 'os pa yin /mi 'jigs pa thob pa yin/ yid bde ba mang ba yin/ /mkhas pas bsngags pa yin /de chos kyi snyan pa de
213b22(mdo 'grel): rjes su dran par 'gyur ba yin te/ byams pa phan yon nyi shu po de dag go zhes bya ba'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las kyang gsungs te /gal te kun dga' bo khyad kyis nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gang zag rnams la nyan thas kyi sa'i
213b23(mdo 'grel): chos bstan pa/ /chos bstan pa des kyang gang dag stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can de dag thams cad dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du byas par gyur kyang/ da dung nyan thos khyod kyis nga la nyan thos kyi bya ba byas?
214a1(mdo 'grel): par mi 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo gal te khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i tshig gcig gcig bstan nas bshad na/ /de ltar na
214a2(mdo 'grel): nyan thos kyis de mnyes par byas par 'gyur ro/ /chos bstan pa snga mas gang dag stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi bams kyi sems can thams cad dgra bcom pa nyid thob par 'gyur la/ dgra bcom pa de dag
214a3(mdo 'grel): gis sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang/ tshul khrims las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos bo dang/ bsgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gang yin pa de la kun dga' bo ji snyam du
214a4(mdo 'grel): sems/ bsod nams kyi phung po mang ba yin nam/ gsol ba bcom ldan 'das mad lags so bde bar gshegs pa mang lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de lta bas kyang su zhig byang chub semS
214a5(mdo 'grel): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i chos ston na/ nyan thos kyi theg pa ba'i gang zag de bsod nams kyi phung po ches mang du bskyed do/ /kun dga' bo de bas kyang gang su zhig byang
214a6(mdo 'grel): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen bo rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i chos tha ma nyi ma gcig ston na de bsod nams kyi phung po ches mang du bskyed de/ /kun dga' bo nyi ma gcig lta zhog la tha na snga dro
214a7(mdo 'grel): 'am /kun dga' bo snga dro lta zhog la tha na chu tshod cig nas skad cig gcig ces bya ba'o/ /de bzhin du sbyar te /kun dga' bo 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i chos sbyin pa ste/ nyan thos kyi theg pa thams
214b1(mdo 'grel): cad dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gang zag thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba zil gyis mnan pa'o/ /kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di lta bu dang ldan pa dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di lta bu sems pa la ni 
214b2(mdo 'grel): gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med de/ gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ldog pa de ni gnas med do zhes bya'o/ /chos kyi sbyin pa ji ltar sbyin par bya zhe na/ /'phaD
214b3(mdo 'grel): pa dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i mdo las gsungs pa/ mkhas pa dus su sems par byed pa na/ khang bur zhugs te de bzhin sgo bcad nas/ /chos 'di thams cad la ni tshul bzhin blta/ /langs nas zhum pa med pa'i sems kyis
214b4(mdo 'grel): shod/ /mkhas pa bde la rtag tu gnas par 'gyur/ /bde la 'dug nas de bzhin chos kyang ston/ /gtsang zhing yid du 'ong ba'i sa phyogs su/ /yang ba'i bstan ni rab tu bshams pa ting ste/ /bzang po'i tshon gyis legs par kha
214b5(mdo 'grel): bsgyur ba/ /chos gos gtsang ma de ni rab bgos nas/ /rdul gzan nag po de bzhin bshams byas la/ /sham thabs che tshang legs par rab bgos nas/ /bcos bu'i ras rnams sna tshogs legs bting ba/ /rkang rten bcas ba'i
214b6(mdo 'grel): khri la rab 'dug cing/ /rkang pa legs par bkrus te steng 'dzegs nas/ /gdang dang bzhin gyi mdangs ni rab snum zhing/ /chos kyi stan de la ni rab 'dug nas/ /sems can ltag pa rtse gcig gyur rnams la/ /gtam mang sna tshogs
214b7(mdo 'grel): mang po smra ba dang/ /dge slong dag dang? dge slong ma rnams dang/ /dge bsnyen rnams dang dge bsnyen ma dag dang/ /rgyal po dag dang rgyal bu rnams la yang/ /mkhas te rtag tu phrag dog med par ni/ /sna tshogs ngon ldan can na'i gtam? yang
215a1(mdo 'grel): ston/ /le lo dag kyang rnam par rab spangs nas/ /skyo ba yi ni 'du shes bskyed mi bya/ /mkhas pas mi dga' thams cad rnam par spang/ /byams ba'i stogs ni 'khong la sgom par bya/ /nyin mtshan du yang//
215a2(mdo 'grel): chos mchog rab tu sgom/ /mkhas pa de ni bye ba khrag khrig dpes/ /'khor rnams mgu zhing de bzhin dga' bar byed/ /de la nam yang 'dod pa chung zad med/ /zas dang sgom dang bza' dang bca' ba dang/ /gos dang mal cha chos gso rnamS
215a3(mdo 'grel): dang ni/ /na ba'i gsos sman dag kyang mi bsam ste/ /'khor rnams la ni ci yang mi bslang ngo/ /gzhan du mkhas pa rtag tu bdag nyid dang/ /sems can 'di dag sangs rgyas grub bar shog /phan phyir 'jig rten chos gang
215a4(mdo 'grel): bstan pa de/ /bdag gi bde ba'i yo byang kun snyam sems zhes bya'o/ /yang de nyid las /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rab tu ston ba na/ /chos kyi dga' ba bsnyoms pa byed de than 'ga' tsam la yang chos kyi dga' bas lhag pa
215a5(mdo 'grel): phan 'dogs par mi byed do zhes gsungs so/ /zla ba sgron ma'i mdo las kyang/ /chos kyi sbyin pa'i ched kyi phyir/ /gal te khyod la gsol 'debs na/ /rab rgyas dag gis ma bslabs zhes/ thog mar tshig de brjod par bya//
215a6(mdo 'grel): khyod ni shes shing mkhas yin na/ /bdag nyid chen po'i mdun du ni/ /bdag gi ji ltar bshad nus zhes/ /khyod kyis de skad brjod par bya/ /'phral du brjod bar mi bya yi/ /snod la brtag pa byas nas bya/ /gal te snod ni
215a7(mdo 'grel): shes gyur na/ /gsol ma btab kyang bshad par bya/ /'khor ni mang po 'khong nang du/ /gal te dang tshul dan mthong na/ /khyod kyi yo byed bsnyungs mi bshad/ /sbyin pa'i bsngags ba brjod par bya/ /gal te 'dod pa chung
215b1(mdo 'grel): gyur te/ /tshul khrims dag par gnas yin na/ /khyod kyi byams pa'i sems bskyed la/ /yo byar bsnyungs pa'i gtam gyis shig /gal te sdig 'dod chung gyur cing/ /tshul khrims ldan pa mang gyur la/ /gnyen po rnyed pa de yi tshe//
215b2(mdo 'grel): tshul khrims bsngags par brjod par bya zhes gsungs so/ /'phags pa blo gros rgya mtshos zhus pa'i mdo las kyang/ /'di lta ste/ sha me she ma ba te/ sha ma tA? sha truM aM ku ra/ mi ku re?  /mA ra dzi te/ ka ro ti/ ka yU re/ oM ba ti/ u
215b3(mdo 'grel): ko hA? ya ti/ pi? sha tha ni rma kha/ mA lA pa nA yi u kha ra/ kha ro gra sa/ gras ni/ he mu khI/ pa ra mu khI /A mu khI/ she mi ta nI/ sarba gra ha ban d+ha nA nI/ na grI hI hI?/ sarba pa ? ba di na bi mug ta ma ra pA shAs+tha pa tA/ /bud d+ha mu drA:/
215b4(mdo 'grel): sa mung? gta ti tA sarba mA yA/ a tsa li ta pa da pa ri? shud dye?/ bi gats+tsha na ti/ sarba ma ra karma? ni? blo gros rgya cha tsho sngags kyi tshig 'di dag ni bdud tshar bcad pa'i tshig nyon mongs pa bsal ba'i tshig sta? de dag chos smra ba des lags par kha ton du byas la chos
215b5(mdo 'grel): kyi khri la 'dug ste byang chub kyi rnam par mngon par sgrub pa'i byams pas 'khor thams cad la khyab par byas la /bdag la sman pa'i 'du shes bskyed de/ /chos la sman gyi 'du shes dang /chos nyan pa la nad pa'i 'du shes dang /de bzhin gsheD
215b6(mdo 'grel): pa la skyes bu dam pa'i 'du shes dang /chos kyi tshul la yun ring du gnas pa'i 'du shes bskyed la/ sngags kyi tshig 'di dag mngon du byas te/ chos gyi gtam byed na/ de'i 'khor yug dpag tshad brgya tshun chad du bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams
215b7(mdo 'grel): 'thob cham par bya ba'i phyir 'ong bar mi 'gyur ro/ /gang dag 'ong ba de dag gis kyang bar chad byed par mi nus so zhes gsungs so/ /yang de nyid las/ chos smra bas gtsang sbra dang/ kun tu spyod pa gzob ba dang/ legs par bkrus pa dang/ /laD
216a1(mdo 'grel): par gos bgo bar bya'o zhes so/ /de ltar chos kyi sbyin pa dang/ /byang chub sems ni mdor bsdu na/ bsod nams 'phel ba'i rgyu yin no/ /dkon mchog za ma tog gi mdo las ji skad du /'jam dpal 'di lta
216a2(mdo 'grel): ste/ dper na spos kyi shing ljon pa sna tshogs ni khams bzhis bzung nas rnam par 'phel lo/ /'jam dpal de bzhin tu tshogs sna tshogs bsags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i dge ba'i rtsa ba yang byang chub kyi sems kyi bzung zhing thams
216a3(mdo 'grel): cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsdos na rnam par 'phel lo zhes gsungs pa bzhin no/ /phyogs 'di ni las dang po pa rnams 'phral du byang chub sems dpa' i bslab pa dran par bya ba'i phyir bstan te/ rgya cher ni sangs rgyas kyi yul nyid yin no//
216a4(mdo 'grel): 'dir bslab pa ji skad brjod pa 'di'i/ /'grub pa yang dag spong rnams te /bag yod ba dang ma bral zhing/ /dran pa dang ni shes bzhin dang/ /tshul bzhin du ni sems bso/ /de la sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes ba rnams mi bskyed
216a5(mdo 'grel): ba'i phyir 'dun pa skyed do/ /'bad do brtson 'grus brtsom me sems rab tu 'dzin to/ /yang dag par rab tu 'jog go zhes bya ba 'dis ni bsrung ba'o/ /sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos skyes ba rnams spang ba'i phyir 'dun pa skyed ces bya ba
216a6(mdo 'grel): 'dis ni dag pa'o/ /dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams skyed pa'i phyir 'dun pa skyed pa dang/ skyes pa rnams gnas pa dang 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir zhes bya ba 'dis ni 'phel ba bstan to/ /de dag kyang rtag tu bag yang ba dang ma bral bar bya
216a7(mdo 'grel): ste/ de ni dge ba thams cad kyi rtsa ba yin pa'i phyir ro/ /zla ba sgron ma'i mdo las ji skad du/ tshul khrims thos dang gtong dang de bzhin bzod/ /dge ba'i chos su brjod pa ji snyed pa/ /kun gyis rtsa ba dag yod 'di yin te/ /gter 'thob byed
216b1(mdo 'grel): ces bde bar gshegs pas bstan ces gsungs pa bzhin no/ /bag yod pa zhes bya ba 'di ci zhig yin zhe na// 'dod pa las nyams pa dang mi 'dod pa byung ba'i dogs pa sngon du 'gro bas gzob pA ltung len pa ste/ 'di lta ste/ dper
216b2(mdo 'grel): na rgyal po drag tu khro zhing mgu dka' ba'i bran sman gyi 'bru mar gyi gang ba'i snod thogs te/ stegs 'ded pa la 'gro bas bya ba bzhin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i mdo las gsungs te /de la bag yod? pa gang zhe na/ gang
216b3(mdo 'grel): 'di dbang po sdoms pa'o/ /de mig gis gzugs rnams mthong na mtshan mar mi 'dzin cing mngon rtags su mi 'dzin pa nas/ yid kyi chos rnams rnam par shes na mchan mang mi 'dzin cing mngon rtags su mi 'dzin pa yin te/
216b4(mdo 'grel): chos rnams kyi ro myang ba dang nyes dmigs dang 'byung yang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa ste /'di ni bag yod pa zhes bya'o/ /gzhan yang bag yod pa ni gang rang gi sems 'dul ba dang/ bzhan gyi sems rjes su srung ba dang/ nyons mongs? pa la
216b5(mdo 'grel): dga' bsel ba dang/ chos la dga' ba'i rjes su 'jug pa la sogs pa 'di ni bag yod pa zhes bya'o/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po su dad pa dang ldan zhing bag yod pa dang ldan pa des ni brtson 'grus gang gis bag yod bar byed pa dang dang
216b6(mdo 'grel): par byed pa dang dad par byed pa'i chos de dag yang dag par sgrub bar 'gyur ba'i brtson 'grus dang ldan par bya'o/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po su dad pa dang bag yod pa dang brtson 'grus dang ldan pa des ni/ dran pa dang shes bzhin
216b7(mdo 'grel): gang gis byang chub kyi chos rnams chung za bar mi 'gyur ba'i dran pa dang shes bzhin dang ldan par bya'o/ /gsang ba ba'i bdag po su dang pa dang bag yod pa dang/ brtson 'grus dang dran pa dang shes bzhin dang ldan pa des tshul bzhin
216b8(mdo 'grel): 217a
216b9(mdo 'grel): du sbyar ba la brtson par bya'o/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po tshul bzhin la brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni bag yod pa de yang yod par rab tu shes so/ /gang med pa de yang med par rab tu shes zhes bya ba nas/
216b10(mdo 'grel): kun rdzob tu mig la sogs pa yod do zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /de bzhin du de nyid las sems can don brtson byang chub sems dpa' ni/ /tshul bzhin nyid kyi dben sems gang yin dang/ /rtag tu bag yod 'chi med rgyu yin te/ /yongs su
216b11(mdo 'grel): 'dzin med bde ba kun gyi rgyu zhes gsungs so/ /yang smras pa/ bdag gzhan mnyam nyid goms byas pas/ /byang chub sems ni brtan par 'gyur/ /bdag dang gzhan nyid bltos pa ste /pha rol tshu rol ji bzhin brdzun/ /dogs? pa?
216b12(mdo 'grel): rang gi pha rol min/ /gang la bltos te tshu rol 'gyur/ /bdag nyid rang gis ma grub na/ /gang la bltos te gzhan du 'gyur/ /gal te de la sdug bsngal bas/ /bdag la mi gnod phyir mi srung/ /ma 'ongs sdug bsngal khyod la ni//
216b13(mdo 'grel): gnod mi byed pas ci ste srung/ /de tshe 'ang bdag nyid yin snyam pa'i/ /rnam rtog de ni log pa ste/ /gang phyir 'chi ba gzhan nyid la/ /der skye ba yang gzhan nyid yin/ /gal te gzhan zhig de skyes na/ /bsod nams kyis ni
216b14(mdo 'grel): ci zhig dgos/ /ci phyir gzhon tshe lus rgas pa/ /bde bar bya phyir nor sogs byed/ /mngal na gnas pa zhig pa las /byas par gyur pa gzhan yin la/ /byis pa zhig nas gzhon nu nyid/ /de zhig nas ni dar la bab//
216b15(mdo 'grel): de zhig nas ni gos gyur te/ /lus ni ji ltar gcig par 'dod/ /de ltar skad cig so so bos/ /lus gzhan sen mo skra sogs bzhin/ /ci ste byis pa'i tshong bor nas/ /byis pa gzhon du nyid gyur na/ /gang zhig gnas skabs
217b16(mdo 'grel): @217b
217b17(mdo 'grel): bral gnas pa/ /lus kyi rang bzhin brjod par gyis/ /lus ni sku gzugs 'dra zhe na/ mar mer thal ba la de med/ /gal te rig spangs pa dngos su/ /de la rnam par gnas zhe na/ /rang nyid bstan ba tsam? 'gyur bas/ /de mi lus zhes brjod
217b18(mdo 'grel): mi bya/ /de la bdag ni bsam pa med/ /snang ba'i lus ni 'jig dang ldan/ /gnas skabs rnams dang 'bral gyur pa /kun rdzob nyid du snang ba yin/ /lung gis kyang ni de yod na/ /rigs pa dgra ni ? gis bzlog/ /'di ltar yon tan ma
217b19(mdo 'grel): gtogs par/ gtso bo yod pa ma yin la/ /gtso bo gsum yang yod ma yin/ /de bzhin yon tan yod na yang/ /de yang so so rnam gsum bdag /'gro ba lhag ma rnams dgur 'gyur/ /sems pa med
217b20(mdo 'grel): pa gos la sogs/ /de bde'i bdag nyid ji lta bu /snam sogs bde sogs las skyes min/ /snam sogs las ni bde sogs yin/ /snam bu la sogs rgyu med phyir/ /med na de bde ga la yod/ /de ltar lung dang rigs pa yis//
217b21(mdo 'grel): 'dus byas thams cad mi rtag pa/ /de yis rgyu 'bras 'brel pa ni/ /mngon sum yin pas mi gnod de/ /de ni rang gis rgyud las mthong/ /rtags pa la ni ji lta bur/ /phra rab rdul yang gcig min te/ /phyogs kyi dbye bas mi 'thang
217b22(mdo 'grel): phyir/ /mar me'i 'bru mar zad 'gyur ba/ /zar 'gyur tshe na mngon pa med/ /de ltar dngos po zad par yang/ skad cig re re mi mngon no/ /rgyu dang tshogs zhes bya ba yang/ /phreng ba dmigs tshogs bzhin brdzun/ /de la gomS
217b23(mdo 'grel): pas dang 'dzin na/ /gzhan la ci phyir skye mi 'gyur/ /de phyir skye mched tshogs bzhin du/ /'gro ba gcig tu shes par bya/ /ma byung nyid nas sdug bsngal de/ /gzhan gyi bdag las phyir bzlog bya/ /de yang mi rigs 'gyur
218a1(mdo 'grel): zhe na/ /gzhan la 'ang rang gi bdag nyid med/ /bdag gzhan mi rigs gang yin de/ /ci rigs par ni bzlog bya yin/ /snying rje sdug bsngal mang gyur pas/ /ci phyir nan gyis skyed ce na/ /'gro pa'i sdug
218a2(mdo 'grel): bsngal brtag byas na/ /ji ltar snying rje sdug bsngal mang/ /de ltar rgyud ni goms gyur pa/ /gzhan gyi sdug bsngal ni dga' bas/ /pad+ma'i nags su dang pa ltar/ /mnar med par yang 'jug par 'gyur/ /sems can rnam par
218a3(mdo 'grel): grol ba na/ /dga' ba'i rgya mtsho gang yin pa/ /de nyid kyis ni tshags min nam/ /ro med thar bas ci zhig bya/ /de ltar gzhan gyis don byas pas/ /rlom sems dang ni ngo mtshar med/ /gcig tu gzhan don la dga' bas/ /rnam sman
218a4(mdo 'grel): 'bras bu re ba med/ /phyogs bcu'i sems can phun tshogs de'i/ /bdag gi yin par gdon mi za/ /gzhan pa de bdag gir 'du shes pas/ /bdag la phrag dog go skabs med/ /sdig pa bshad par bya ba dang/ /bsod nams
218a5(mdo 'grel): rjes su yi rang dang/ /sangs rgyas bskul dang gsol gdab pa/ /gzhan dang bdag gi phyir byed do/ /yongs su bsngo ba de bzhin te/ /bye brag med par rab tu 'jug/ de ltar sems can khams bzhin du/ /bsod nams mdza' yas rab
218a6(mdo 'grel): tu 'byung/ /lam 'di dam pa mchog yin te/ /bde ba mdza' yas dus ston bzang/ /byang chub sems dpa' i ded dpon ches/ /gang zhig dga' ba 'phel ba yin/ /lag na rdo rje sel mchog rnams/ /bdud kyi gcan pa skrag byed cing//
218a7(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas phyag brnyan rnams kyis kyang/ /rtag tu yongs su bsrung ba yin/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal po'i sras/ /byang chub sems kyi shing rtar zhugs/ /lha la sogs pas stong byed cing/ /lam de nas ni 'gro bar byed/ /de ltar
218b1(mdo 'grel): sems can rnams la bdag /goms byas tshul gyi sgro gtags te/ /bdag gzhan sdug bsngal zhi bya'i phyir/ /bdag la sogs pa rnam kun btang/ /gang zhig sred pas yongs zin pa/ /de yi sdug bsngal zhir mi 'gyur/ /'gyur bas rnam
218b2(mdo 'grel): par chud zos nas /de ni 'di ltar sdug bsngal skyed/ /'jig rten sdug bsngal mes gdubs na/ /rang gi bde la dgra ci yod/ /kun nas chig par gyur ba yi/ /lus la 'ang bde ba ci zhig yod/ /bdag la chags par byed pa ni/ /sdug
218b3(mdo 'grel): bsngal kun gyi rtsa ba mchog /de ltas sems can thams cad la/ /bdag nor btang zhing de gzhom mo/ /rten cing 'brel 'byung bsam pa yis/ /bdag la ma chags dran byas te/ /'bad pa kun gyis de'i pho nya/ /dam pa shes khe 'dod phan? bya//
218b4(mdo 'grel): gang gis 'jigs pas de mi gtong/ /de ma byin na 'jig pa yin/ /'di ltar bdag gi lus dang sems/ /skad cig re res 'gro ba nyid/ /gal te mi rtag dri 'bab pa'i/ /lus kyis rtag cing dri med kyi/ /byang chub thob par 'gyur na ni/ /de ni rin med
218b5(mdo 'grel): rnyed min nam/ /rtsi sman gzugs dang 'dra bar ni/ /'jig rten chos la mi sems pas/ /de ltar bdag kyang btang byos la/ /sems can kun gyi don du sbyong/ /sems can kun phyir blon por ni/ /rang gi shes rab bkol bar bya/ /rigs pas
218b6(mdo 'grel): nor de bsrung byas te/ /sems can rnams la mkho bar spyad/ /bdag gi lus dang gzhan lus la/ /sdug bsngal mang sel sdug bsngal gang/ /de bya ba de'ang? de bzhin te/ /bde ba mang byed bskyed par bya/ /sems can long spyod gegs byed
218b7(mdo 'grel): phyir/ /bsgrims te nyon mongs sbyang byas te/ /'jig rten 'tsho ba'i 'bab stegs nas /sbrul gyi ro bsal bzhin du bya/ /bsod nams zhing 'di dag gyur na/ /phun sum lo tog 'bras bu che/ /bde ba'i mu gegs gdungs pa yis/ /'gro ba dag
219a1(mdo 'grel): ni tshim? par 'gyur/ /'theb dang bkur sti lus la sogs/ /skye la bdag gi btang min nam/ /ci phyir da dung 'khrug par byed/ /bdag gis brdzun du de smras sam/ /rang don gnod byed la sdang na/ /'o na snying rje gang
219a2(mdo 'grel): du 'byung/ /gal te gzhan don 'jog pa la/ /snying rje med pa'ang su zhig 'khrug /gla rtsi bu ram shing la sogs/ /bdag pos mi shes bzhag nyes te/ /longs spyod du ni mi rung bas/ /spyod brgyad la sogs 'os yin bden/ /bdag
219a3(mdo 'grel): po la ni phan 'dod nas/ /rim gro bya bar sems pa med/ /de la bskul ba 'ang mi byed de/ /long spyod phyir yang 'gro mi byed/ /ma smos ma btab rgyal sras rnams/ /de dag rjes 'brangs nyer song ste/ /sna tshogs mi bzad khams rnams dang//
219a4(mdo 'grel): dbang po kun gyi sman chen 'gyur/ /de dag shes byas dran byas te/ /khro ba dang ni gnod byed kyang/ /sdug bsngal rnams la zhim pa yid/ /rang bzhin mi 'dor bde bar byed/ /sa dang chu dang me dang rlung/ /nam mkha' zhes bya khams lnga po//
219a5(mdo 'grel): sems can ji srid gnas srid du/ /kun gyi don ni byed pa ste/ /nyes spyod kun gyis de dag ni/ /sems can don las mi ldog go /de bzhin bdag gi khams drug po/ /'di dag don mad? mi bya'o/ /nam mkha' mdza' ni ji tsaM par/ /'jig rten mdza' ni bde gyur ro/?
219a6(mdo 'grel): de srid 'jig rten don byed pas/ /ye shes sngon btang gnas par bgyi/ /bya ba bsrungs nas bdag la ni/ /bdag gis mi dri nan gyis su/ /slob dpon bdag gis brtag par bdag /slob ma mchog bzhin bslab par bya/ /bdag gi bla ma
219a7(mdo 'grel): bdag 'dra ba/ /bdag gi bag nyal skyon sus shes/ /bdag sdug bsngal dang bdag 'jigs pas/ /su zhig de ltar sdug cing 'jigs/ /skyo bar mi 'gyur 'bros mi 'gyur/ /snying rje yi yang yul gyur cing/ /rtag tu nye bar gnas
219b1(mdo 'grel): gyur pa/ /slob ma bdag 'dra ga la yod/ /nyon mongs kyi smyo gti mug sdongs/ /g.yang sa mang po'i lam du ni/ /gom pa re re rdeg 'cha' ba/ /bdag dang gzhan rtag mya ngan gzhi/ /'gro ba rnams ni sdug bsngal mtshungs/ /de bas 'khrul
219b2(mdo 'grel): pa tsam mi rigs/ /'di la yon tan mthong na ni/ /ngo mtshar chen? po bya ba'i rigs/ /nyes pa rgya mtsho bdag gcig pus/ /blang bar nus pa ma yin pas/ /'di na bdag la gzhan yang dgos/ /nyes las thar byang gzhan gang yin/ /pha
219b3(mdo 'grel): rol bskul la mkhas pa po/ /gsol ba ma btab phan byed kyi/ /tshig ni spyi pos blang bar bya/ /bdag ni kun gyi slob mar bya/ /nyon mongs dgra ni mang po dang/ /gcig pu bdag ni g.yul 'gyed tshe/ /de na gcig dang 'thab pa na//
219b4(mdo 'grel): gzhan ni bdag gi bde ba 'joms/ /sdang bam mi sdang gyur kyang rung/ /da na la la rgyab nas bsam/ /gzhan nas 'jigs pa sgrogs byed pa/ /de ni bdag la srog bdas sbyin/ /sdug bsngal kun gyi sman pa mchog /bde ba'i dga' 
219b5(mdo 'grel): ston rab tshogs shing/ /rnam pa kun tu nyer 'tsho ba/ /'jam dbyangs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de ltar bde bar gshegs kyi sras/ /rnam kun rmad du byung rnams kyi?/ /spyod pa nye bar bkod pa ya?/ /dge ba bdag gis gang bsgrubs des/ /bde
219b6(mdo 'grel): gshegs go 'phang mdza' yas ni/ /nam mkha' i mtshams par dbang mdzad pa/ /de yi bde ba mdza' yas rnams/ /lus can dag gis thob par shog /bsod nams spel ba rdzogs so// //bslab pa kun las btus
219b7(mdo 'grel): pa zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' i 'dul ba mdo sde du ma las btas pa/ slob dpon zhi ba'i lhas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzin mi tra dang dA na shI la dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba bande ye shes sdes bsgyur cing
220a1(mdo 'grel): zhus te gtan la phab pa/ slad kyi kha che'i paN+Di ta ti la ka kla shu dang/ lo tsA ba dge slong blo ldan shes rab kyis/ /sri mda'i dgon par zhu thag legs par byas pa'o/ /rgyal sras spyod 'dir rab dang thos bdag?
220a2(mdo 'grel): gung thang dge slong shes rab 'byung gnas kyis/ /blo ldan thig le bum pa'i sems bzung nas/ /gzhung 'dir nges bsgyur lags par zhu thug byas/ /de yi dad pa'i mthu dang gzhung 'di yi/ /che pa nyid kyis ngang sang brtse ldan gyi/
220a3(mdo 'grel): lam 'dir 'jug par 'dod pa'i skye bo rnams/ /dga' bas chos 'di phyogs bcur rgyas byed shog/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po yi ge brgya pa'i bsrung ba dang sdig pa bshags pa'i cho ga /dpal rdo rje semS
220a4(mdo 'grel): dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po brgyad stong bzlas na 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad du zhugs par 'gyur ro/ /de yang gang zhe na/ na ma ltar ya dtwi? kA nAM /ta thA ga tA
220a5(mdo 'grel): nAM/ sarbba trA? a bra ti ha hA pA pti/ d+ha ? tA pa li nAM /a sa ma sa ma /sa man+ta te ne n+tA pApti shA sa ni /ha ra ha ra sma ra sma ra Na /bi ga ta rA ga bu d+d+ha d+ha bsma? ta /sa ra sa ra /sa ma pa la /ha sa ha sa /tra ya tra ya /pha ga wa na ma hA
220a6(mdo 'grel): pa ra le k+Sha Ne /dzwa la dzwa la na sA ga re swAhA/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku yin te/ 'di la gus pa bla na med pa bya'o/ /'dis las dang po pa dag kyang sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par 'gyur ro//
220a7(mdo 'grel): 'di nyid bdud la sogs pa dang ma rungs pa thams cad las srung par byed pa'i mchog yin no/ /thal mo brdab pa 'am /thal pa 'am/ yungs kar ram /chu 'am/ blta pa 'am/ yid kyis kyang mtshams gcod par byed do/ /
220b1(mdo 'grel): nang kyis btab na sman gyi chu la sngags kyis btab ste btung ngo/ /yang na mchod rten nam/ sku gzugs sam /dam pa'i chos kyi glegs bam la nags kyi me tog sems mnyam par bzhag ste 'bul zhing zla ba phyed sbyor pa byas na rgad? chon?
220b2(mdo 'grel): po dag las thar par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la dmigs pa dang/ sems can thams cad la dmigs pa dang /sems can thams cad kyi don bya bar 'dod pa'i sems kyis bzang po'i spyong pa sngon du byas pas
220b3(mdo 'grel): bzlas brjod bya'o/ /cho ga 'di ni cho ga de'i mjug nas 'byung ba'o/ /dam chag gsum gyi bzlas rjod byed pa ni khrus ma byas kyang nyes pa med do/ /lhag ma dang gtsang sbra ma byas kyang nyes pa med do/ /phyag rgya 'dra ba dag ma bza' o/ /mi 'gom
220b4(mdo 'grel): mo/ /khri la nyal bar mi bya'o/ /chang mi btung ngo/ /mos pas spyod ba'i bslab pa'i gzhi dag las mi g.yo ba dang the tshom med na sngon ngang tshul ngan par gyur kyang 'grub po/ /mkhas sam mi mkhas kyang rung ste nges par 'grub bo/ /de skad
220b5(mdo 'grel): du de nyid las/ gang zhig byang chub sems brtan zhing/ /blo gros chags pa med pa dang/ /the tshom dag kyang mi byed pa/ /de la des par 'grub par 'gyur zhes gsungs so/ /byang chub kyi sems bstan pa ni 'dir so so skye bo
220b6(mdo 'grel): ni stobs dang ldan par des par bya ba'i phyir gsungs kyi/ /sar chud pa'i dbang du byas pa ni ma yin no/ /'di la ma shes na sngags rnams yi ge lhag par brjod kyang nyes pa med do/ /nyung yang nyes par mi 'gyur ro/ /cho ga nyams kyang
220b7(mdo 'grel): nyes par mi 'gyur ro/ /'on kyang dang pa'i shugs dang/ byang chub kyi sems kyi shugs dang/ rang gi don dor ba'i sems brtson par bya ste /rnam par mi brtag par brjod na gdon mi za bar tshe 'di nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mthong
220b8(mdo 'grel): 221a
220b9(mdo 'grel): pa dang ci 'dod pa yang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /bslab pa kun las btus pa las 'byung ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i yi ge brgya ba'i bsgrub pa dang sdig pa bshegs pa'i cho ga /slob dpon
220b10(mdo 'grel): zhi ba'i lhas mdzad pa rdzogs so// // */ /bslab pa kun las btus kyi mngon rtogs gser gling pas mdzad pa bzhugs so// // */ /rgya gar skad du/ shik+Sha? sa mu ts+tsha ya a b+hi sa ma ya nA ma/ bod skad du/
220b11(mdo 'grel): bslab pa kun las btus pa'i mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /stobs bcu ldan pa gang gi zhabs rdul la/ /lha rnams cod pan gyis gtugs de btud de/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs
220b12(mdo 'grel): kyi zhabs gtugs zhi ba'i lhas/ /bslab pa'i gnas rnams mdo sde kun las btus/ /dang po gnyis ni phyi ma bdun gyis bshad/ /gnyis gyi don ni rnam dgur shes par bya/ /lnga yi 'og dang gnyis kyi gong ma ni/ /dang po
220b13(mdo 'grel): yin te gzhan na gnyis pa yin/ /gnyis ka'i don ni zla ba chos pa dang/ /nya dang sdig pa gser gyi 'khor lo dang/ /glang po gdugs dang thig le dang po dang/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi phyag na ral gri 'dzin/ /rin po che ni khyad par
220b14(mdo 'grel): gnyis dang bcas/ /dang dang bla ma'i tshogs dang go cha dang/ /byin rlabs phyir mi ldog dang spyad pa dang/ /lung bstan pa ni sku gsum yon tan bcas/ /bzhi las 'bras bur gyur pa dang po ste/ /gsum ni yang dag spong bar rab
220b15(mdo 'grel): tu gnas/ /gnyen po gang la de yi ngo bo ste/ /rten dang nyes pa spong ba dang po yin no/ /sun 'byin pa ni de yi gnyis par brjod/ /gnyen po spyod pa gnyis pa'i dang po ste/ /spyod pa tha ma de yi gnyis pa yin/ /mi mthun pa ni rnam pa
221b16(mdo 'grel): @221b
221b17(mdo 'grel): brgyad yin te/ /las dang nyon mongs lta ba ngag las ni/ /'gyur dang gyur pa'i khyad par rnam pa drug/ rang gi rtsa ba tha ma gnyis dang bcas/ /'gyur ba gsum ni dang po'i chos su bzhag /gyur ba gsum ni dang po'i gnyis pa ste/ /rtsa ba gnyiS
221b18(mdo 'grel): kyang de dang mthun pa yin/ /gyur pa gsum ni gnyis pa'i gnyis pa ste/ /rten gyi dang po'i chos kyang de yi yin/ /gyur pa dang po stobs? kyi dang po ste/ /gyur pa gnyis pa phung po'i gnyis pa yin/ /gyur pa gsum pa phung
221b19(mdo 'grel): po'i gsum pa ste/ /mi mthun gnyen po'i khyad par de yis bstan/ /chogs kyi lam la lnga ni dngos yin te/ /de las gzhan pa rjes su mthun pa yin/ /spyor ba'i lam la bdun ni dngos yin te/ /de las gzhan pa lnga ni rjes? mthun
221b20(mdo 'grel): yin/ /mthod pa'i lam la bcu ni dngos yin to/ /de las gzhan pa gnyis ni rjes mthun yin/ /tshogs kyi lam la bsrung pa gtso bo ste/ /chos gzhan gsum po mos ba mchog dang ldan/
221b21(mdo 'grel): sbyor ba'i lam la spel ba gtso bo ste/ /gsum po dag la ji ltar 'tsham par zad/ /mthong ba'i lam la dag la gtso bo ste/ gsum po dag gis bdag dang gzhan gyi don/ /bsgom ba'i
221b22(mdo 'grel): lam la pha rol phyin pa ste/ /bsdu ba'i dngos pos 'gro ba tshim par byed/ /bslab pa kun la btus pa'i mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba/ rdzogs so// //dpal mar me mdzad ye shes dang/ dge slong tshul khrims
221b23(mdo 'grel): rgyal bas bsgyur ba'o/ /gser gling rgyal pa dpal ldan chos skyong gis /bcom ldan 'jam pa'i rdo rje mnyes byas pas/ bslab pa kun las btus pa'i mngon par rtogs/ /ka ma la dang mar me mdzad la gsungs// //
222a1(mdo 'grel): bslab pa me tog snyem zhes bya ba rnam sga? srung bar mdzad pa bzhugs so// //*/ /rgya gar skad du/ shik+Sha ku su ma many+dza ri nA ma/ /bod skad du/ bslab pa me tog snye ma zhes bya ba/ /dpal 'jam
222a2(mdo 'grel): pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /shin tu g.yo ba'i kun rtog rlabs kyis mi 'khrugs pa yis zab gyur cing/ /rnam par 'phro ba'i sna tshogs yon tan 'byung gnas nyid dang de bzhin du/ sna tshogs thabs kyi sa ma lus 'gro
222a3(mdo 'grel): don phun sum tshogs pas rgya che ba'i/ /mtsho 'dra'i sangs rgyas gang yin de la 'chi med don du skyabs su mchi/ /gal te lus dang long spyod dang ni dge ba gsum/ /btang dang bsrung ba dang ni ngag dang spel ba rnams/ /gzhan don brtson
222a4(mdo 'grel): pas nges par byed par 'dod 'gyur na/ /bla med bslab pa kun las btus pa la brten bya/ /mdo sde rin chen sna tshogs kyi/ /rgya mtsho chen po gcig po yis/ /brlab kun bsdus pa 'di mthong na/ /sred pa kun nas gcod par byed/
222a5(mdo 'grel): shin tu rgyas bas 'jigs pas na /bdag 'dra'i sems kyi rgyud dag la/ /de yi gzugs brnyan 'char ba ni/ /bde blag tu ni 'dir mi 'byung/ /de phyir rang gi sems kyi rgyud/ /dag pa tsam gyi don gyi phyir/ /bdag gi dran pa
222a6(mdo 'grel): las 'ongs pa/ /cung zad btus te bri bar bya/ /'phags pa zhi pa'i lha gang gis/ /bshad bya thams cad mtshon byed pa'i/ /gang zhig bslab btus 'grel pa ni/ /yod pa'i tshigs bcad gcig gsungs pa/ /'di lta ste/
222a7(mdo 'grel): bdag gis lus dang long spyod dang/ /dge ba dus gsum bsags pa rnams/ /sems can kun la btang ba dang/ /de bsrung dag pa spel ba'o/ /lus ni 'di ni rab grags pa'i/ /'di ltar phung po lnga po'o/ /long spyod nyer mkho
222b1(mdo 'grel): thams cad de/ /de'i gnas pa yi rgyur gyur pa'o/ /dge ba legs pa thams cad de/ /'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar ba'o/ /btang ba la sogs rnam pa bzhi/ /de dag so so nas bstan te/ /snying po med pa snying blang phyir/ /gus pas sbyin par bya
222b2(mdo 'grel): ba yin/ /lus sogs snying po med pa 'di/ /mngon sum dang ni lung gis grub/ /ji skad du /gang zhig byin de nyams min te/ /gang zhig khyim na gnas de nyams/ /gang de khyim nas mya ngan rgyu/ /gang zhig byin de bde 'byung byed/ /gang
222b3(mdo 'grel): zhig byin de bde 'gro ba/ /mtho ris kyi ni skas su gnas/ /gang de khyim nas ngan 'gro der/ /sdug bsngal yang dag 'byung ba'i rgyu/ /gang da khyim nas yun ring du /'khor ba'i lam du ltung bar byed/ /gang byin de ni thar pa yin/ /grong khyer lam
222b4(mdo 'grel): na ston par byed/ /khyim gnas gang de 'khor ba yi/ /dug gi sdong bu 'phel bar byed/ /gang zhig byin de nyon mongs pa'i/ /dgra yi phyogs rnams sel bar byed /khyim gnas gang de pha rol gyi/ /khang pa'i sgor ni 'gro ba'i rgyu
222b5(mdo 'grel): gang zhig byin de 'dod pa las/ /gang ba'i khang bzang 'byung ba'i rgyu/ /ser snas bcings pa las byung ba'i/ /de ltar skyon rnams mthong nas ni/ /'gro ba'i don ni bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /sbyin pa la ni goms par bya/ /rim gyis goms pa
222b6(mdo 'grel): 'phel ba las /byang chub sems dpa' i snying rje'i gter/ gang zhig mgo dang rkang bar gyi/ /lus ni sbyin par byed pas na/ /de la rmi lam rgyu mtshungs pa'i/ /sdug pa'i bu la sogs pa dang/ /de bzhin longs spyod thams cad la//
222b7(mdo 'grel): sbyin mi bya ba yod dam ci/ /khyi dang wa dang stag sogs kyi/ /zas su 'di dag gsal par ni/ /yang dag mthong bas/ 'dod rnams la/ lus ni sbyin par cis mi bya/ /gzhan la btang ba'i rang bzhin 'di/ /lam du mkhas pa rnams kyis
223a1(mdo 'grel): bsten/ /'gro ba'i don ni rab sgrub ched/ /gzhan dag de yis mngon ma gzigs/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan tshogs/ /rin chen rgyan ni dran pa dang/ /ser sna'i nyes pa rnams mthong ba/ /
223a2(mdo 'grel): gnyis po sbyin pa la 'jug rgyu/ /de dag ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ //de ni sbyin par gyur kyang ni/ /bsrung ba dag ni ma byas na/ /lus sogs longs spyod du mi 'gyur/ /des na bsrung ba rnams bya'o/ /'gro ba'i don
223a3(mdo 'grel): rnams bsgrub don du/ /longs spyod nyid du bya ba'i phyir/ /lta mdzes shing gi sa bon bzhin/ /snying rje'i bdag nyid can gyis bsrung/ /gzhan du dus mi shes pa yis/ /smin par ma gyur byang chub kyi/ /sems kyi myu gu nyams
223a4(mdo 'grel): pa yis/ /ji ltar 'dod pa'i 'bras ster 'gyur/ /lus kyi bsrung ba gang zhe na/ /gzhan la gnod pa spong ba ste/ /de ni bdag cag chags bral pas/ /de ni dam chos yongs bzung dang/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen dam pa rnams//
223a5(mdo 'grel): ji bzhin rtag tu bsten pa dang/ /sems can kun la brtse ba las/ /'byung bar mdor bsdus nas ni brjod/ /gnod par 'gyur ba gzhan rnams kyi/ /bya dang bya min blta ba dang/ /nyes pa med par gnas pa la/ /lus dang
223a6(mdo 'grel): sems dang ngag gis ni/ /nyes pa nye bar 'dogs pa dang/ /de bzhin gzhan la gnod sems dang/ /yang dag byang chub seMs bskyed la/ /mi snyan rjod par byed pa dang/ /sdig can 'di ni blta min zhes/ /gang zhig ma dang khro
223a7(mdo 'grel): sems kyis/ /byang chub sems dpa' la ni gdong/ /phyir phyogs par ni byed pa dang/ /chags pas 'dod rnams la zhen dang/ /sdig pa'i grogs po'i rjes 'jug dang/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen spong ba dang/ /'jig rten chos la
223b1(mdo 'grel): 'bris byed dang/ /tshul bzhin ma yin rab ldan pa'i/ /sbyin pa la sogs gnod pa nyid/ /sgrib pa thams cad yongs dag pa'i/ /mdo las rab tu rtogs bya ste/ /'di ltar/ sbyin pa gtong na bdag nyid ni/ /gcig pu kho na gtor byed ces
223b2(mdo 'grel): bdag nyid nga rgyal ldan pa yis/ /ser sna can la brnyas 'di dang/ /tshul khrims srung bar byed pa na/ /tshul khrims 'chal rnams la bsnyas shing/ /bdag nyid tshul khrims ldan rig phyir/ /de skyon 'jig rten la brjod dang/ /bzod pa
223b3(mdo 'grel): goms par byed pa na/ /bzod med rnams la snyas byed cing/ /bdag nyid kho na sangs rgyas nyid/ /thob 'gyur zhes pa'i blo ldan dang/ /de bzhin brtson 'grus bsam gtan dang/ /de bzhin yang dag byang chub kyi/ /rgyur 'gyur dam
223b4(mdo 'grel): chos gzhan la yang/ /gang zhig mdo sde gcig nyid la/ /legs zhes rab tu brjod pa dang/ /tshigs bcad gzhan dang tshig gzhan dag /gsal bar gang zhig brjod pa dang/ /shes rab nyid la sbyor byed kyi/ /lhag ma'i pha rol phyin pa
223b5(mdo 'grel): min/ /de lta'i shes rab 'chal rigs kyi/ /spyod pa yang ni blta bar bya/ /'dod yon lnga yi rol pa yis/ /byed pa'i chos ni smra ba la/ /spyod pa ldan par gnas min zhes/ /gang zhig yid kyis sems byed pa/ /de lta'i gnod dang yang
223b6(mdo 'grel): de yis/ /rnam smin ches ni rtsub pa la/ /sna tshogs thams cad 'dod pa las/ /mkhas pa rnams kyis dang bar bya/ /dam chos dran pa nyer bzhag pa/ /la sogs mdo sde rnams la ni/ /gus dang g.yo ba med pa yi/ /sems kyis nges
223b7(mdo 'grel): par blta ba yis/ /gnod pa dang ni spong ba la/ /gus pa yang ni bsgrub phar bya/ /rang ni don 'gros 'jigs skrag nas/ /mthong dang ma mthong don sgrub phyir/ /stas? pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnas pa'i/ /sems can rnams la thams
224a1(mdo 'grel): cad du/ /nam yang khong khro ba dag gi /skabs ni rab tu dbye mi bya/ /gang phyir dpa' bar 'gro ba'i mdor/ /gzigs pa nyams med sangs rgyas kyis/ /bla med byang chub chen po ru/ /sems can thams cad lung bstan
224a2(mdo 'grel): to/ /byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag gi /spyod pa la ni smad mi bya/ /sems can rnams kyi spyod pa ni/ /'phags min mig gi spyod yul min/ /gang zag gzhan gyis gang zag gzhan/ /tshad 'dzin par ni byed pa dag /rang gis
224a3(mdo 'grel): rang nyid nyams byed par/ /de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis gsungs/ /mchod rten skor ba bya ba dang/ /yon gnas rnams dang 'dris pa dang/ /de bzhin phyi ma'i dus su ni/ /dam pa'i chos ni 'dzin pa yis/ /sman pa nad pa sman
224a4(mdo 'grel): dang ni/ /mi bzad nad kyi 'du shes kyis/ /dge bshes bdag nyid dam chos dang/ /nyon mongs rnams la rig par bya/ /gnod pa yongs su spang don du/ /bag yod pa ni yongs su bzung/ /rnyed dang bkur sti mi 'dod par/ /
224a5(mdo 'grel): brjod cing kun dga' ra sogs yang/ /de la bag ni yod pa ni/ /bag yod pa ni mdor bsdu na/ /gang zhig rang sems 'dul ba dang/ /gzhan sems rjes su 'jug pa ste/ /phun sum tshogs pa kun gyi phyir/ /skye bo ngan
224a6(mdo 'grel): pas brten pa yi/ /rnyed dang bkur sti la gzhol yid/ /myur du 'bigs par byed pas na/ /tsher ma dang mtshungs mkhas pas spang/ /'phral du phying bar byed nyid kyis/ /'dam gyi 'du shes kyis zhes bya/ /dran pa'i rin
224a7(mdo 'grel): chen nyams byed phyir/ /tshom rkun gyi ni 'du shes bya/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnod pa spong ba'o// //gnod pa spong ba tshul khrims te/ /de ni dran pa nyer gnas las/ /zhi gnas mi nyams rgyur 'gyur ba'i/ /
224b1(mdo 'grel): dran pa bcu gnyis dag tu gsungs/ /sangs rgyas bka' las 'das byung ba'i/ /rnam smin la grub dran pa dang/ /lus mi g.yo ba gnyis gnas pa'i/ /dran pa yang ni gzhan yin no/ /shin du ma dad pas byas pa'i/ /sbyin sogs dam pa'i
224b2(mdo 'grel): dran pa dang/ /spyod lam dang ni thams cad la/ /gus par bya zhes dran pa dang/ /gzhan gyi don la mi mkho ba'i/ /yan lag dag ni 'dir mthong na/ /de che bsdus nas slar yang de/ /gzhan gyi don sbyor
224b3(mdo 'grel): dran pa dang/ /sems kyi glang chen myos pa ni/ /zhi gnas kyi ni ka ba la/ /rtag tu gdags pa'i dran pa yang/ /'di ni drug par gsungs pa yin/ /ji tsam dag gi sgra yis ni/ /nyan pas don ni nges 'gyur ba/ /de las lhag ba don med pa'i
224b4(mdo 'grel): sgra mi brjod pa'i dran pa yang/ /spyod lam lhag pa gang zhig la/ /bsrung ba'i don gyi dran pa gzhan/ /dran pa lhag ma mdo yi ni/ /rjes su 'brangs nas shes par bya/ /gang zhig sgo bsrungs gyur pas nyon mongs dang/ /bdud rnams
224b5(mdo 'grel): dag gis zil gyis mi non cing/ /lam min lam ngan dag tu mi ltung ba'i/ /yang dag dran pa zhi gnas kyi ni rgyu/ /dran pa gang zhig phul byung nyid/ /shes bzhin zhes ni brjod pa ste/ /gang zhig lus dang sems la ni/ /yang dang yang
224b6(mdo 'grel): du rtog pa po/ /dran pa dang ni shes bzhin las/ /ting nge 'dzin kyang 'byung bar 'gyur/ /ting 'dzin zhi gnas la gzhan min/ /tshul khrims de med par mi 'byung/ /gang phyir ting 'dzin tshul khrims
224b7(mdo 'grel): las/ /'byung bas ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyu/ /sbyor bas gzhan dag gsungs pa rnams/ /thams cad tshul khrims khongs su 'dus/ /de phyir dran dang shes bzhin dag/ ldan pa ting 'dzin don gnyer bya/ /tshul khrims 'dod bas zhi gnas la/ /rtag tu
224b8(mdo 'grel): 225a
224b9(mdo 'grel): gus pas? 'brad par bya/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las lus bsrung pa'o// //lus bsrung ba yang bya ba'i phyir/ /long spyod kyang ni bsrung bar bya/ /long spyod rnam pa gnyis yin te/ /gos dang
224b10(mdo 'grel): kha zas dbye bas so/ /de la zas srung gang zhe na/ /kha na ma tho med pa gang/ /de dang gzhan ni kha gsag dang/ /tshul 'chos dang bral bsod snyoms so/ /gang tshe rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni/ /bsod snyoms la ni rgyu ba na/ /de tshe blo dang ldan
224b11(mdo 'grel): ba des/ /blo ni rnam gsum bskyed bya ste/ /lus la chos 'dzin blo dang ni/ /lus kyi srin bu gso ba dang/ /gzhan yang sbyin ba dag rjes su ni/ /gzung ba'i blo ni bskyed bar bya/ /gang zhig gzhan gyi don du ni/ /longs spyad byas na de bsrung
224b12(mdo 'grel): yin/ /gang gis rang nyid kho na spyod/ /de las nyon mongs ltung bar 'gyur/ /gzhan yang gzhan la zhen pa yi/ /sems kyi 'dod bas gzhan gyi nor/ /yongs su longs spyod byed pa gang/ /nyon mongs min ba'i ltung bar 'gyur/ /gyi zhes nas
224b13(mdo 'grel): ni rang gi nor/ /gang gis longs ni spyad gyur na/ /de ni rang lto 'gengs pa ste/ /brkus pa yi ni ltung bar 'gyur/ /de phyir sems can don la ni/ /brtson pas dam chos 'dzin pa'i lus/ /'di ni gnas par bya ba'i phyir/ /yongs su longs
224b14(mdo 'grel): spyod byed pa yin/ /sangs rgyas kyis gnang chos gos las/ /lhag pa blo ldan gyis mi gzung/ /bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan bsrung don du/ /ma gnang blo ldan gyis ming gtang/ /'dir ni sems can mang po yis/ /smad pa yongs su
224b15(mdo 'grel): bsrung ba'i phyir/ /slong par byed pa 'ga' la yang/ /chos gos gsum po sbyin mi bya/ /de dag ni longs spyod bsgrub? pa'o// //rnam par smin pa mi bshed? pas/ /dge ba kun du bsrung ba 'gyur/ /'jig rten pa las bsgraD
