225b17(mdo 'grel): min bar/ /byas te mi dga' i las bzhin no/ /de bzhin du / nga rgyal med kyang rtag par ni/ /rnyed dang bkur sti yongs spong dang/ /sems can kun la dang ba yis/ /dge ba kun tu bsrung bar 'gyur/ /'di ltar yang /khengs pa med
225b18(mdo 'grel): par gyur na ni/ /bde gshegs yon tan ngang gis 'byung/ /ri bo yongs su spangs nas ni/ /chu bo rgya mtshor 'bab pa bzhin/ /zhe sdang dbang du gang gyur pa/ /ngan 'gror 'gro dang dman pa yi/ /rigs su skye ba yongs 'dzin dang/ /mi
225b19(mdo 'grel): khom ba? rnaMs yongs su 'dzin/ /ma dad pa ni zhe sdang ste/ /khong khro zhes pa ming gzhan na/ /gang zhig bskal pa du ma ru/ /bsags pa'i dge ba 'joms pas so/ /de phyir 'joms par brtson pa yi/ /sems can la yang dang bya ste/ /skye bo'i tshoD
225b20(mdo 'grel): chen bsdigs byed pa'i/ /rgyal po'i skyes bu gcig bzhin du/ /shin tu phyi thag lta byed pa/ /de yis 'di gcig la yang mthong/ /gang phyir skye po'i tshogs chen gyi/ /rgyal po che dpung de yi dpung/ /rgyal po khros pas 'dir ni dmyal
225b21(mdo 'grel): bar byed nus sam/ /de bzhin gal te gus pas bde gshegs nyid mtshungs 'di ltar ram/ /de bzhin sems can mgu pa las byung sangs rgyas lta zhog gi /de ltar rang nyid snyan dang skal ba bzang ba ma mthod dam/ /gang zhig mgu
225b22(mdo 'grel): las srid gsum mtsho yi pha rol son gyur cig /sngon gyi rgyal ba'i yon tan yun mi ring bar rdzogs/ /blo dman rnams kyis gzhan dag mgu mi byas pas dmyal ba thob/ /des na legs 'dod bdag ni sems can rnams la cis ni
225b23(mdo 'grel): 'dud/ /de bzhin dug /sems can rnams la phun? sems shing/ /snyan pa chen po smra byed pa/ /rten pa zhes nas 'jug pa dang/ /bden pa smra par dga' ba ni/ /skye ba kun tu skyes tsam gyis/ /ngang gis 'byung ba dag dang ni/ /yang
226a1(mdo 'grel): dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems/ /'bad pa med par skye bar 'gyur/ /de dag ni dge ba bsrung ba'o// //'dir yang da ni lus kyis yang/ /yongs su dag pa brjod par bya/ /de yang/ mdor na lus
226a2(mdo 'grel): kyi sdig pa ni/ /zad dang nyon mongs spyad ba'o/ /bskal pa du mar bsags ba yi/ /sdig pa zad par byed pa'i rgyu/ /chos bzhi'i mdo las brten pa yi/ /chos bzhi yongs su gzung bar bya/ /de la chos bzhi ni /sun 'byin kun tu
226a3(mdo 'grel): spyod pa dang/ /gnyen po yongs su 'dzin pa dang/ de nas nyes pa las ldog stobs/ /de nas rten gyi stobs dag go /mi dge'i las ni byas pa na/ /sems ni 'gyod par byed pa nyid/ /sun 'byin kun du spyod pa ste/ /de nyid sdig pa
226a4(mdo 'grel): bshags pa'o/ /de la sun 'byin pa kun tu/ /spyod pa 'di ni bsgom par bya/ /lus dang sems dang ngag rnams kyis/ /bdag gis mi shes gang bgyis pa/ /mgon po rnams kyi mdun gnas te/ /sdig pa de dag bshags
226a5(mdo 'grel): par bgyi/ /mdo sde rgyal po gser 'od dam pa las/ rab tu gsungs pa'i bshags pa de dag gis/ /bla ma sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' la/ /'gyod pas bdag gi 'khrul pa'i sdig gshags bya/ /bral bar bya ba 'dod pa yis
226a6(mdo 'grel): ltung ba thams cad bshags par bya/ /dug dang bcas pa'i kha zas ni/ /ma skyugs bde ba'i rgyur mi 'gyur/ /de yang lce dang yang ba dang/ /'dir ni ltung ba gnyis su 'dod/ /de la zhe sdang las byung ba/ /lci zhing chags las
226a7(mdo 'grel): byung ba yang/ /rang bzhin kha na mtho lci/ /bcas pa yi ni spang ba'o/ /gang phyir sdong dang chags pa las/ /sems can gtod dang 'dzin pa'i rgyu/ /zhe sdang las skyes rgyal sras kyi/ /thabs su gyur pa ma yin gyi/ /gnod pa chen?
226b1(mdo 'grel): po'i rgyu yin par/ /'gyur ba nyid du the tshom med/ /gang phyir kun sdud shes pa ni/ /thabs su mdo rnams las ni mthong/ /shes rab kyis ni de yongs gcod/ /des ni de ltar gnyis ka min/ /gang tshe chags skyes sangs rgyas nyid//
226b2(mdo 'grel): myur du mi 'gyur chug na yang/ /gal te thabs la mkhas pa yis/ /sngon gyi sems can bsdus gyur na/ /tshangs pa yi ni 'jig rten du/ /skye bar 'gyur ba gang gis zlog /gal te min na dus ring du/ /ngan song dag tu skye par 'gyur//
226b3(mdo 'grel): gal te de tshe gzhan don du/ /longs spyod kyi gzhan bud med dang/ /chos kyi rgyal mtshan can gzhan la/ /'dod pa log par spyod mi 'gyur/ /gal te dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal yang/ /bsran pa rang gis khas blangs pas/ /gzhan gyi
226b4(mdo 'grel): srog ni bsrung ba'i phyir/ /de tshe nyes pa 'byung mi 'gyur/ /ji ltar khye'u skar rgyal ni/ /snying rje'i dbang du gyur pa yis/ /chags pa'i skal ldan mchog la ni/ /srog bsrung don du bzhugs pa bzhin/ /tshangs par spyod pa la sogs pa'i//
226b5(mdo 'grel): chos kyi rgyal mtshan can rnams la/ /rnam pa gzhan du byas pa yis/ /de las 'jug ba rigs ma yin/ /gzhan la gnod pa bzlog pas na/ /khro ba 'di las thal ba min/ /bag chags sa bon bsags pa dang/ /skabs phye ba las
226b6(mdo 'grel): snying rje nyams/ /gzhan yang mi dge ba las bzlog na 'ang gal te na/ /byang chub sems dpa' la ni yid byung na/ /rtag tu ngan 'gro'i sar ni 'gro 'gyur te/ /de yis bdag gzhan gnyi ga'i bya byas min/ /'on te thabs bral rang bzhin
226b7(mdo 'grel): gyi/ /chags pa la yang skyon 'di yin/ /gang phyir bdag bde la zhen bas/ /gzhan gyi sdug bsngal btang snyoms 'dor/ /de ni ma yin te/ gang gis rang gi sdug bsngal bzhin du gzhan sdug bsngal/ /snying rje dman pas mdza' 
227a1(mdo 'grel): gcig tu ni goms ma byas/ /de ni rang gi bde la zhen pas gzhan sdug bsngal/ /dus mdza' yas su btang snyoms 'dor bar byed pa bden/ /de dag ni sun 'byin pa kun du spyod pa'o// //
227a2(mdo 'grel): sdig pa'i las ni byas gyur kyang/ /slar yang dge pa'i don brtson pa/ /sangs rgyas dmigs pa la sogs pa/ /gnyen po kun du spyod pa yin/ /'di lta ste /byang chub sems ni bskyed pa dang/ /de bzhin rgyal ba'i gzugs brnyan dang//
227a3(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal dang/ /sangs rgyas mya ngan 'das pa yi/ /mchod rten me tog 'bul ba dang/ /khyad par du ni khyim gnas las/ /nges 'byung tshul khrims rdzogs pa dang/ /bde gshegs la ni mchod byas pa'i/ /dman
227a4(mdo 'grel): ma sel bar byed pa dang/ /byug pa 'am mar me chu snyim gang/ /dbul ba me tog gcig 'dogs pa/ /yang dag rgyal ba yis gsungs pa/ /rgyu rkyen dag dang ldan pa yi/ /chos rnams gal te shes gyur na/ /ngan song dag tu 'gro mi
227a5(mdo 'grel): 'gyur/ /mig gnyis btsums nas yid kyis ni/ /mdun du sangs rgyas dmigs byas te/ /gsang sngags rgyal po yi ge brgya/ /stong phrag brgyad du bzlas par bya/ /gang na rtse gcig yid kyis ni/ /skul byed ma yi gzungs
227a6(mdo 'grel): sngags dag /ji srid sdig pa zad pa'i rtags/ /rmi lam ma mthong bar du bzlas/ /'di lta ste /zas ngan dag ni skyugs pa dang/ /zho dang 'o ma za ba dang/ /nam mkha' la ni 'gro ba dang/ /nyi zla dag kyang mthong ba dang/ /rmi lam du ni
227a7(mdo 'grel): mi dag las/ /rgyal na sdig pa zad shes byas/ ma he dang ni de bzhin du/ /skyes bu nag po 'ang? mtshon byed yin/ /sman gyi bla ma baiDUrya/ /'od kyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs/ /ji bzhin yid la byed pa na/ /mi dge rnams ni zad
227b1(mdo 'grel): par 'gyur/ /de dag ni gnyan po kun tu spyod pa'o// //slar yang sdom ba 'dzin pa ni/ /mi mthun las ldog stobs brjod do/ /gang zhig mi dge ba yi las/ /slar yang sdom pa'i bdag nyid do/ /de dag ni mi mthun pa'i
227b2(mdo 'grel): phyogs las ldog pa'i stobs so/ /de la rten stobs sangs rgyas dang/ /chos dang dge 'dun la brten dang/ /de bzhin mi phyed dad pa yis/ /byang chub sems la brten pa ste/ /dkon mchog gsum la cho ga yis ni skyabs su song gyur
227b3(mdo 'grel): pa'i/ /ches mang 'bras bu gang yin phag mo'i rtogs pa brjod pa las shes bya/ /gang zhig byang chub sems la brten pa las byung 'bras bu dag /de ni sna tshogs mdo rnams dag ni bltas pa las shes bya/ /de dag ni sdig pa sbyangs pa
227b4(mdo 'grel): ste tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// //gang phyir mi bzod thos sogs la/ /brtson 'grus nyams par gyur pa yin/ /de phyir mi skyo brtson pa yis/ /thos pa spel phyir bzod pa bya/ /gang phyir thos pa ma gtogs par/ /
227b5(mdo 'grel): bsam gtan spyod yul thabs me gtogs/ /des na skyo ba med yid kyis/ /'bad pas thos pa btsal bar bya/ /gang phyir gong dang 'dres pa na/ /spyod lam shes par gyur kyang ni/ /mnyam gzhag yang dag skye min pa/ /de nas nags su gnas par
227b6(mdo 'grel): bya /nags suAng g.yeng bzhi med na/ /sems ni mnyam par 'jog mi 'gyur/ /nges na mkhas pa dag gis ni/ /mnyam par bzhag la sbyar par bya/ /nyon mongs spyang pa las gzhan pa'i/ /mnyam gzhag 'bras bu yod ma yin/ /de phyir
227b7(mdo 'grel): nyon mongs rnam sbyang phyir/ /mi sdug la sogs bsgom par bya/ /nyon mongs dag ni sbrang ba'i phyir/ /de ltar mdor bstan tshig rnams gsungs/ /da ni nyon mongs sbyang ba'i phyir/ /rgyas par yang dag brjod par bya/ /gang zhig dngos po bzod
228a1(mdo 'grel): pa ste/ /de yang rnam pa gsum du dbye/ /sdug bsngal gzhan gyis gnod byas dang/ /chos la yang ni skye bar 'gyur/ /phal cher mi 'dod byung ba dang/ /sdug dang bral dbyung las sdug bsngal/
228a2(mdo 'grel): gang zhig sdug bsngal las 'jigs pa/ /de bzod mi mthun phyogs su 'dod/ /de la sdug bsngal dang du lan pa'i bzod pa bsgom pa'i rim pa ni 'di yin te/ /sdug bsngal rab sel byed pa yi/ /kun mkhyen rin chen 'dod pa na/
228a3(mdo 'grel): chung du bzod pas rim gyis ni/ /gnod pa drag po bzod 'gyur te/ /re zhig shin tu dman pa'i 'bras bu yi/ /dang po la ni zhen pa'i sems/ /nya pa zhing pa la sogs pa/ /gnod pa bzod par byed mthong na/ /bdud kyi khar chud
228a4(mdo 'grel): gyur pa yi/ /'gro ba bcings pa dgrol ba yis/ /yang dag dam bcas byas pa dag / sdug bsngal mthong bas ji ltar ldog /gang zhig gnod ma byas kyang dgrar gyur zag pa yis/ /dgra bo gzhom phyir skad cig kyang ni khro ba ru/ /mi
228a5(mdo 'grel): byed pa de dag gi rigs pa'i dngos min zhing/ /gang zhi dgra ma thub pa nga rgyal can dngos min/ /shin tu dus ring dag tu sdug bsngal gyis thob pa'i/ /dge ba'i nor ni 'phrog pa dag tu brtson gyur zhing/ /bsran pas bdag gi sdug
228a6(mdo 'grel): bsngal tshor ba'i rgyur gyur la/ /gzhom par 'dod bci'i phyir na 'byung mi 'gyur/ /ji ltar mdza' gcig tu ni rim gyis goms pa phul byung stobs dag las/ /mi rnams la ni sdug bsngal la yang bde bar 'du shes stobs ldan 'byung
228a7(mdo 'grel): de bzhin yang dag byang chub gzhol ba'i yid can 'di dag la/ /sdug bsngal la yang mtshungs med bde bar 'du shes 'byung bar 'gyur ba nyid/ /yab sras mjal ba'i mdo las ni/ /de yi rgyu mthun 'bras bu gsungs/ /chos kun
228b1(mdo 'grel): bde ba gnas pa zhes/ /bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ /ting 'dzin de ni thob tsam gyis/ /dmigs pa'i dngos po thams cad la/ /byang chub sems dpa' bde ba yi/ /tshor pa nyid 'byung gzhan du min/ /'di ltar/ mgo bo gcod par byed pa
228b2(mdo 'grel): 'am/ /de bzhin rkang lag la sogs pa/ /sba yis gzhu ba byas kyang ni/ /bde ba'i 'du shes 'ba' zhig 'byung/ /dmyal ba dang ni mi yi 'am/ /sdug bsngal dag ni byed pa na'ang/ /gshed ma rnams la dga' ba ni/ /mngon du byed pa 'byung
228b3(mdo 'grel): bar 'gyur/ /bdag la lus can 'di kun gyis/ /gal te 'bigs sam gcod byed pa/ /de lta na 'ang gnod pa'i sems/ /bdag gis bya ba'i rigs min te/ /gang phyir bdag la sems can gyis/ /gnod byas dmyal pa'i sdug
228b4(mdo 'grel): bsngal la/ /stong phrag dag tu byas pa yi/ /chad yang phod pa ma yin no/ /gnod sems dag ni 'byung ba'i rgyu/ /bdag nyid la chags bkur ba dang/ /chen por mngon par zhen pa ste/ /de yi gnyen po bzod par 'dod/ /bdag gi dag dang
228b5(mdo 'grel): bshes kyi dgra/ dgra bo'i bshes las 'gyur ba yi/ /gnod sems rgyu dgu las byung ste/ /re re dus gsum dbye bas so/ /de dag ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// //de ltar bzod pa la gnas pas/ /thos pa la
228b6(mdo 'grel): ni brtson 'grus brtsams/ /gang phyir thos las shes rab ste/ /shes rab las ni nyon mongs spong/ /de yang rnam pa brgyad cu yis/ /thos pa gong du 'phel bar 'gyur/ /de la 'dun pa'i rnam pa dang/ /gzhan yang rten gyi rnam pa dang/ /gzhan
228b7(mdo 'grel): yang lhag bsam rnaM? ba dang/ /sbyor ba'i rnam pa zhes bya dang/ /sems ni dga' ba'i rnam pa dang/ /chog shes pa yi mtshan nyid dang/ /dran pa skyed pa'i rnam pa dang/ /gtod pa sbel ba'i mtshan nyid dang/ /gzhan yang sangs rgyas chos kun la ? mi 
228b8(mdo 'grel): 229a
228b9(mdo 'grel): ngoms pa yi rnam pa dang/ /ma thos nyan pa'i mtshan nyid dang/ /sngon shes nyan pa'i rnam pa dang/ /de bzhin sdug bsngal stong pa dang/ /mi sdug bdag med zhi rnams dang/ /rang sems bsrung ba'i rnam pa dang/ /brtson
228b10(mdo 'grel): 'grus spel ba'i rnam pa ste/ /'di yang rgyas par 'phags pa ni/ /blo gros mi zad mdor shes bya/ /thos pa nyid la chos kyi ni/ /cho ga shes bya ba ming gzhan yin/ /gang tshe yongs su sbyin pa ni/ /de nyid ye shes tshogs yin te/ /chos kyi
228b11(mdo 'grel): tshogs kyi sbyar ba yis/ /mthun rgyu dag tu brjod pa ni/ /don nyung bya ba nyung nyid dang/ /smra ba nyung la mngon dga' dang/ /yang dang yang du thos pa'i don/ /sems shing chos la gzhol nyid dang/ /sems dang ba dang yo byad dag /nyung? la
228b12(mdo 'grel): mngon par dga' ba dang/ /dgon par mngon par phyogs pa dang/ /gzhan yang cig pur dga' ba dang/ /dran mi nyams dang rtag tu ni/ /gtong dang tshul khrims phyogs dga' dang/ /chad pa lugs kyi bstan bcos sogs/ /gang
228b13(mdo 'grel): yang rol mo'i bstan bcos dang/ /'jig rten rgyad pan pa dag gi /bstan bcos kun ni yongs spong ba'o/ /de dag ni brtsan 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// //drag shul tsan gyis zhus pa las/ khyim sogs nyes pa'i phung
228b14(mdo 'grel): por ni/ /mthong nas thos pa ldan pa yis/ /de nas na gsu gnas par bya/ /khyim gnas rmongs pa 'di ni bu dang nor dang chud ma la sogs pa/ /dga' ba'i sbyor bas sems g.yengs gyur bas rab tu zhi ba gal 'gyur/ /de bzhin
228b15(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas rnams kyi rga dang 'chi med zhi zhing mtshungs med pa'i/ /go 'phang bdag gzhan phan pa phun tshogs gnas gyur pa yang thob 'gyur ram/ /nor dang chung ma bdag nyid zhes pa 'ching ba dam pa'i gsum po 'di/ /zhen pa
229b16(mdo 'grel): @229b
229b17(mdo 'grel): med cing lhan cig skyas? pa rtogs pa'i gnas la gnas pa ste/ /'di rnams la ni gang zhig gang tshe gang gis ji ltar skye bar 'gyur/ /min pas snying po med pa nyid du shes pa'i dpyod pa ste stobs ldan/ /thos pa ldan yang rnyed sogs la/ /zhen
229b18(mdo 'grel): na sems spyod mi 'gyur te/ /de tshe ltar bcas 'jig rten na/ /de ni gcig tu bslus pa'i mchog /ji ltar rgya mtsho chen por khyer ba yi/ /mi shes skye bo skom pas dus byed ltar/ /de bzhin dal 'byor thob nas skad cig kyang/ /sems
229b19(mdo 'grel): ma sbyangs na 'og tu 'gro bar 'gyur/ /mkhas pa rnams kyis byis pa rnams ni 'thab mas bskrad pa ma yin te/ /gang phyir mkhas pa rnams ni snying rjes bkur stir byas nas de dag gtong/ /de bzhin sgug pa rnams la dang po mtshungs par bde ba
229b20(mdo 'grel): nyer bstan nas/ slar yang dgra byed gang yin de dang lhan cig dga' bar gal 'gyur/ /de phyir nyon mongs spangs pa'i phyir/ /'jig rten pa dang 'dre pa spag/ /de dag nyid ni sems can gyis/ /dge ba mngon par 'phel ba'i rgyu/ /yang ni
229b21(mdo 'grel): gal te skal mi mnyam pa'i sems can gyi/ /tshogs la rjes su chags las 'khor 'dod yid 'byung zhing/ /rnyed dang grags pa'i rgyu phyir 'dud par gyur na ni/ /nags 'di yang ni khyim dang khyad par med min nam/ /bsod snyoms rgyu ba'i
229b22(mdo 'grel): yul dag dang/ /shin tu ring ba ma yin zhing/ /nye ba yang ni ma yin pa'i/ /nags de dag tu gnas bya ste/ /yul gang na ni dri ma srog chags las byung ba'i/ /skyon dang bral ba'i chu dag kyang ni yod pa dang/ /gang na 'bras bu'i lcing kyis
229b23(mdo 'grel): dud pa'i shing yod cing/ /gdug pa'i sprul dag dang ni bral ba'i phug yod pa/ /de ru 'di ni nyin dang mtshan du yang ni gsung rab 'don pa dang/ /slar sngags gang yin de ni slar yang rigs pa'i tshogs kyis dpyod par byed/ /de nas bsod
230a1(mdo 'grel): nams las byung mtshan ma rnams ni 'dzin par byed gyur cing/ bying dang rgong pa'i dug dang bral bas rang gi sems la dga' ba bskyed/ /rgyal po 'am ni rgyal buAm/ /bram ze 'am blon po la sogs pa/ /
230a2(mdo 'grel): dge slong dgon pa pa dag gi /drung du 'ongs par gyur na ni/ /nges ni de la gus pa yis/ /legs par byon nam zhes bya dang/ /ji ltar bshams pa'i stan dag la/ /rang gis mkhyen bzhin bzhugs zhes bya/ /rgyal po 'greng na ? bstan
230a3(mdo 'grel): las/ /bdag nyid kyang ni 'greng bya la/ /bzhugs na 'dug par byas nas ni/ /dga' bar byed pa'i btam bya ste/ /skal ldan khyod kyi yul du ni/ /thos mang tshul khrims ldan pa yi/ /dge spyong bram ze la sogs pa/ /rtag par bde bar
230a4(mdo 'grel): gnas lags zhes/ /gal te bstan zhing dul ba dang/ /dbang po kun ni zhi gyur na/ /las dang rjes su mthun 'byung ba/ /rnam smin bcas pa'i gtam bya'o/ /gal te rgyal po yid byung ldan/ /yid byung rjes mthun pa brjod pa'am/ /zab dang
230a5(mdo 'grel): rgya che'i mtshan nyid kyi/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni che ba brjod/ /byang chub sems dpa' nags phyin na/ /yang ni 'di ltar bsam bya ste/ /bdag ni khyim gyi gnas spangs nas/ /ci yi don du nags su 'ong/ /lha la sogs pas mchod bya'i
230a6(mdo 'grel): dge slong go 'phang ni/ /gal te nags su gnas pa tsam gyis 'dir 'byung na/ /nags cha rgyu ba'i spre'u dang chom rkun seng ge rnams/ /de dag kyang ni dge sbyong go 'phang yon tan gyis brgyan 'gyur/ /gzhan yang nga rgyal khengs
230a7(mdo 'grel): pa'i yongs su gdung ba dang/ /ser sna sdang chags rtag tu 'jigs mang dang/ /reg gzugs ro dang dri yi 'jigs pa dang/ /phung po bdud kyi 'jigs pas 'dar la dang/ /nyon mongs bdud kyi 'jigs pas mes gdungs shing/
230b1(mdo 'grel): lta yi bdud kyis 'jigs pas de bzhin skrag /'chi bdag bdud kyi yang yang bltas pa yis/ /da lta bdag ni nags su 'ongs min nam/ /de phyir na gsu? gnas pa 'di/ /bdag nyid dpon? pa'i phyir bsten nam/ /ji ltar bdag la 'jigs ?
230b2(mdo 'grel): rnams yod/ /de ni ji ltar 'byung bar 'gyur/ /'dir ni 'jigs pa rnams kyi rgyu/ /'jig tshogs lta ba gcig pu nyid/ /gang phyir 'jigs pa thams cad ni/ /de las kun tu 'byung ba yin/ /ma rig nye bslang 'khrul pa dang/ /gnyis
230b3(mdo 'grel): sbyor bdag tu rig pa rnams/ /phyin ci log las kun 'byung ba/ /'jig tshogs lta ba'i rnam grangs so /gzugs sogs phung po lnga rnaMs la/ /bdag zhes yang dag mi 'dzin pa'i/ /'jig tshogs lta ba rtsa ba ni/ /srid pa'i lcugs ma 'phel pa'i rgyu//
230b4(mdo 'grel): de phyir 'jigs pa kun gcad phyir/ /bdag tu zhen pa spangs pa la/ /da ni bdag gis bstan pa ru/ /rab tu 'thad pa dag tu bya/ /dgon pa chen por gnas pa yi/ /ljon shing gel pa lcug ma sogs/ /de dag su la'ang mi 'jigs na/ /bdag
230b5(mdo 'grel): ni de las lhag par sngar/ /'di na 'ga' zhig bdag gam ni/ /skyes bu 'am ni gang zag gam/ /shed las skyes sam shed buAng/ /tshad mas dpyad na yod ma yin/ /de ltar 'jigs pa dag gi rgyu/ /yang dag ma yin kun rtog 'di/ /de phyir lung
230b6(mdo 'grel): dang tshad ma yi/ /mig gi de nyid gzhom par bya/ /gzhan yang/ dbye ba med pa'i chos rnams la/ /'byed 'di tshul bzhin ma yin pa/ /tshul bzhin ma yin skyon can te/ /de yang skye ba med pa'i dngos /gzhan yang 'dir ni dag na gnas
230b7(mdo 'grel): pa/ /chos rnams kun la 'dre med de/ /ma 'dres rab tu mi gnas dang/ /dpyod med rjes su 'dzin byed pa'o/ /gal te yon tan ma thob par/ /gcan gzan khro bo nyer 'ongs nas/ /'jigs pa spang ba bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /des ni 'di ltar sems gdul?
231a1(mdo 'grel): bya/ /sngar ni sems can don bsgrub phyir/ /lus 'di bdag gis btang ba yin/ /sbyin pa byin nas mi shes pas/ /de la ji ltar bdag gdung byed/ /gang las kyang 'jigs mi bya ste/ /rang gi nyes byas kyis 'jiD
231a2(mdo 'grel): bya/ /gang phyir 'jigs kun 'di la ste thaMs cad de yi sprul par gsal/ /skye ba dang ni 'jig pa dag /ji ltar bdag med gal ba dang/ /lcug ma la sogs skyed dang ni/ /'jigs 'gyur de bzhin bdag gi yang/ /skye ba yang ni 'jig pa yi/ /rgyu dang rkyen
231a3(mdo 'grel): ni tshogs pa las/ /rtswa dang 'khri shing skye ba dang/ /'jig pa de bzhin bdag gi yang/ /skye dang 'jig ste don dam min/ /de dag ni dgon pa'i bsngags pa brjod pa'o// //nags chal nyid la brten nas ni/ /ting nge 'dzin la
231a4(mdo 'grel): sbyar bya ste/ /gang phyir mi g.yengs med pa ni/ /'jig rten phun tshogs kyang med pas/ /dang por 'dun pa'i ming can gyi/ /sems skyed nye bar bzung nas ni/ /byang chub snying por mchis kyi bar/ /gnod pa spangs phyir 'bad par bya/ /'di
231a5(mdo 'grel): ltar spyod yul gzugs ni mthong ba na/ /brnab sems yid mi bde ba 'am/ /gzhan yang mi dge ba yi chos/ /sems la skad cig byung gyur na/ /de tshe bsdams phyir de dag gi /mig gi dbang pos tshar gcad bya/ /tshar gcad pa ni mtshan?
231a6(mdo 'grel): ma dag/ gsal bar rjes su gzung las byung/ /de bzhin rna ba sna dang ni/ /lce dang lus kyi dbang po rnams/ /rtag tu sems ni bsrung ba'i phyir/ /so so dag tu bstan par bya/ /sad pa dang ni nyal ba dang/ /'dug dang 'gro dang smra ba dang//
231a7(mdo 'grel): mi smra gyur dang kun tu yang/ /mnyam par bzhag pa 'dor mi bya/ /rnyed dang ma rnyed bstod smad dang/ /bde dang sdug dang snyan mi snyan/ /yid bde byed dang gzhan pa rnams/ /sprul pa bzhin du bsam par bya/ /des ni 'di ni mi rgod cing/ /lus
231b1(mdo 'grel): zhi sems ni ma 'khrul cing/ /rtag tu dbang po mi g.yod zhing/ /spyod lam dge ba'i spyod yul dang/ /dmigs pa gsal bar rgyu pa ni/ /gang che sems lam mthong zhing/ /byid na gzengs ni bstod pa'i phyir/ /yid la dga' ba bsgom
231b2(mdo 'grel): par bya/ /rgod pa 'jig rten chos rnams la/ /gal te bdag med pa skyas na/ /kun mkhyen gyis gsungs ni rtag pa/ /myur du mngon du bya ba dang/ /gnyi ga'i don du gnyen po ni/ /rnyed dka' dal ba phun tshogs pa/ /dran bya de bzhin
231b3(mdo 'grel): bskal pa ni/ /bye bar rnyed dka' i rgyal byung ba'o/ /gzhan yang/ sdug dang phrad pa 'di ni nyi ma 'ga' zhig dag tu bde ster te/ /phyis ni dran par gyur nas mtshungs pa med pa'i gdung bskyed byed pa/ /de bzhin skye dang skye bar dran pa'i yul du
231b4(mdo 'grel): gyur nas 'jig rten pa/ /ji ltar srid pa'i 'khrul pa spong bar mi nus 'gyur ba de ltar byed/ /rga dang nad dang 'chi bdag rgud pa zhes bya bzhi po 'di dag ni/ /gnod pa chen por skrag pa'i yid kyis nyin mtshan so so dran bya ste/ /gang phyir
231b5(mdo 'grel): nad kyis bde dang 'chi bdag gis ni srog ni 'phrog byed cing/ /rgud las phun tshogs nyams byed lang tsho dag ni rga ba dag gis so/ /gnad rnams gcod par byed pa dang/ /grogs med gcig pur gyur pa dang/ /'jig rten 'di ni yongs spangs
231b6(mdo 'grel): shing/ /'jig rten gzhan du 'pho 'gyur te/ /'chi bdag khar ni zhugs pa la/ /dge ba'i las la gzhan pa yi/ /chung ma nor dang grogs dang gnyen/ /srung bar byed pa yod ma yin/ /snabs dang kha chu dri ma gcin gos shing/ /dbugs
231b7(mdo 'grel): kyi lhag ma 'dzin par byed pa'i lus/ /yang srid pa ni dmigs par byed pa na/ /legs byas ma gtogs skyabs byed dga' yod min/ /grang bas nyen la me dang ni/ /skom pas nyen la chu ji bzhin/ /ji ltar ngal 'grib ste/ /de bzhin
232a1(mdo 'grel): chos ni gzhan dag kyang/ /de phyir skyes bu rnams kyi 'khor dang nor dang lang tsho dag /glog dang mtshungs par mthong nas 'jig pa'i chos can du/ /skye dang ldan pas ma lus de ltar brtags nas ni/ /srid ba'i 'ching
232a2(mdo 'grel): ba 'jig las grol phyir 'bad bar bya/ /yang ni g.yeng ba chen po'i rgyu/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gsum/ /byams pa'i rten 'brel bsgom pa ste/ /rtag tu rgyun yang spong byed cing/ /gnyen po yang ni bsgom par bya/ /'dod
232a3(mdo 'grel): chags dag ni skye ba'i rgyu/ /bud med gcig bu kho na'o/ /mi sdug bsgom ba gang zhe na/ /mi gtsang la sogs 'du shes kyis/ /mgo bo nas ni rkang pa'i bar/ /gang zhig bsdus nas spyod ba ste/ /'di ltar skra dang ba spu dang/ /sen mo
232a4(mdo 'grel): so dang pags pa rtsa/ /sha rus rgyus pa snying dang mchin/ /rgyu ma zhag dang dri ma dang/ /gzhungs pa mchi mchu ser rdul/ /chil dang snabs dang glo ba dang/ /glang pa dang ni glad rgyas dang/ /gcin? dang rnag dang khrag dag gis/ /dang po 'di dag
232a5(mdo 'grel): la rmongs pa'i/ /shes rab 'chal pa gzhan dag ni/ /gcig la sogs pa rlom pa las/ /dge ba dga' bar ga la 'gyur/ /'byung ba bzhi las grub ba'i rang gi lus pa 'di la slar yang ni/ /sa dang chu dang me dang rlung zhes so so dag tu rtog
232a6(mdo 'grel): byed la/ /de nas ji ltar sna tshogs 'bru yi gang ba'i phur ma bzhin/ /de bzhin lus 'di yang ni brtan pa'i ble yis rnam par blta bya ste/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni dur khrod zhugs nas su/ gang tshe ro yi ngo bo yongs su lta byed pa/ /de tshe des
232a7(mdo 'grel): ni nyin zhag 'das las byung ba yi/ /dul dngos dag tu rang gi lus dang mtshungs par rtog /shin tu phongs gdangs kha ni zangs ltar gyur pa yi/ /sa steng ltung bar gyur pa'i ro yi lus po ni/ /srid pa'i bde la zhen pa'i sems ldan mi
232b1(mdo 'grel): rnams la /rang gi mi sdug dngos po ston par byed pa 'dra/ /de dag ni 'dod chags la kun du spyod pa'i gnyen po'o// //gzhan la phan dang bde sred dang/ /'dod dang smon dang dga' ba yi/ /rnam pa 'dir skye gang yin pa'i/ /byams de
232b2(mdo 'grel): rnam gsum du dbye ste/ /de la sems can la dmigs shing/ /chos la dmigs pa yang na gzhan/ /dang gi 'byung zhi dmigs med pa /byams pa chen po rab tu gsungs/ /dang po'i sems la dang po ste/ /gzhan ni spyod la dga' ba
232b3(mdo 'grel): yin/ /dmigs pa med pa mi skye pa'i/ /chos la bzod thob spyod yul lo/ /de dag kun la goms bya'i phyir/ /bsgom bya'i rim pa bshad par bya/ /de la dang po sdug pa bzhin/ /bar ma rnams la bsgom par bya/ /gang phyir sdug bzhin
232b4(mdo 'grel): shes pa ni/ /lhag ma rnams la skye bar 'gyur/ /de tshe goms pa phyi nas yang/ /dgra yi phyogs la bsgom par bya/ /gang tshe rnal 'byor pa dag ni/ /phyogs gcig tu ni dgra dag kyang/ /grogs po bzhin du snang gyur na/ /de tshe phyogs
232b5(mdo 'grel): kun la bsgom bya/ /ji ltar sems can la dmigs pa/ /bsgoms las nye ba skye 'gyur pa'i/ /ngal ba chos la dmigs pa dag /la sogs pa ni yod ma yin/ /de bzhin du/ gal te rang gi dge ba skye po gzhan rnams kyis/ /bde gshegs nyid thob
232b6(mdo 'grel): bya phyir yongs su sngo byed na/ /de yi byams pa 'di ni shin tu mchog 'gyur zhing/ /rang gi byang chub sems pa ni rdo rje ltar rtan byed/ /gzhan yang bde bar gshegs ba rnams kyi dge ba dang/ /de bzhin rgyal sras dang ni sems can gzhan gyi yang//
232b7(mdo 'grel): de dag ma lus pa yang 'gro ba srid ba'i btson ra yis/ /gcings pa grol? bar bya phyir yongs su sngo byed pa/ /sna tshogs snying rje'i snying po can/ /yongs su bsngo ba gang dag yin no/ /de kun byams pa nyid kyi ni/ /rjes su 'jug par the tshom med/ /de dag ni 
232b8(mdo 'grel): 233a
232b9(mdo 'grel): zhe sdang la kun tu spyod pa'i gnyen bo'o// //gzhan yod ba la brten nas no/ /me long gi ni gzugs brnyan bzhin/ /gang gi dngos po snang gyur ba/ /de la rang dngos ga la yod/ /de phyir rkyen las byung ba yi//
232b10(mdo 'grel): dngos po rnams ni dngos med nyid/ /rang gi mtshan nyid ma skyes ba/ /stong nyid shin tu zab ba nyid/ /dangs po de dag mi spong zhing des kyang dngos po mi spong ste/ /med na mi 'byung nges pI phyir/ /me dang sreg par byed pa bzhin/ rten 'brel yan lag bcu gnyis 'di/ /phyi ma
232b11(mdo 'grel): phyi ma 'bras bu dang/ /snga ma snga ma rgyu yin par/ /ma rig la sogs rim shes bya/ /ma rig pa ni gang zhe na/ /yang dag min pas khams lnga la/ /gcig dang bdag dang rtag sogs/ /ma rig skye ba gang yin pa'i/ /'du byed yul
232b12(mdo 'grel): ni 'di dag la/ /'dod chags la sogs 'jug ba'o/ /rnam shes 'di las skyes ba yi/ /dngos po brtag ba'i mtshan nyid do/ /gzugs min phung po bzhi dang ni/ /'byung ba chen po bzhi rnams la/ /gcig tu mngon par bsdus pa nyid
232b13(mdo 'grel): 'di la ming dang gzugs zhes brjod/ /de skyes mig la sogs pa ni/ /skye mched drug gi ming can no/ /gsum rnams 'dus pa dag la ni/ /reg ba zhes su mngon par brjod/ /reg pa myong ba ma lus ba'i/ /bde sogs rnam pa'i rang bzhin
232b14(mdo 'grel): can/ /tshor ba zhen pa sred pa ste/ /de ni 'dod ba'i rnam pa'o/ /sred pa nyid na 'phel ba la/ /len ba zhes ni brjod pa yin/ /len pa las ni srid pa ste/ /de la phung po dngos 'byung skye/ /phung po brnyings pa rga ba ste/ /yang ni nyams pa 'chi ba'o//
232b15(mdo 'grel): rang nyid ces las shi 'dod pas/ /nang gi gdung ba mya ngan ste/ /bde ba dran pa las byung ba'i/ /smre ba gang yin smre sngags 'don/ /sdug bsngal rnam shes lnga po yi/ /lus byung mi bde tshor ba'o/ /de ltar mdza' gnyis las grol
233b16(mdo 'grel): @233b
233b17(mdo 'grel): pa'i/ /rten cing 'bral ba'i mtshan nyid ni/ /sna tshogs mgal ma'i 'khor lo ltar/ /phan tshun rgyu yis 'khor ba yin/ /sa lu ljang sogs mdo las ni/ /phyi dang nang gi dbye ba yis/ /rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba de/ /rnam pa gnyis blta bya ste//
233b18(mdo 'grel): rgyu dang rkyen gyi rgyu las ni/ /de ni slar yang rnam pa gnyis/ /de la dang po nang gi ni/ /rnam pa gnyis su dbye bya ste/ /ma rig la sogs phan tshun du/ /rgyu yis dngos por gnas pa dag /de ni rgyu yi rgyur ni 'dir/ /bdag gis gong du bshad zin to//
233b19(mdo 'grel): yang ni rkyen gyi rgyu dag nyid/ /sa dang chu dang me dang ni/ /rlung dang nam mkha' rnam shes rnams/ /gcig tu 'dus par gyur ba ste/ /lus las khams gang zhe na/ /sra ba 'dzin pa gang yin ba'o/ /rlan la sogs brjes 'dzin gang/ /de ni chu yi khams su
233b20(mdo 'grel): brjod/ /zos dang 'chos dang 'thungs pa dang/ /thams cad rim gyis 'du byed pa'i/ /lus 'di dro ba'i mtshan nyid can/ /de ni me yi khams su bshad/ /bya ba bdun la rab 'jug pa'i/ /dbugs 'byung rdub ba'i bya ba dang/ /lus 'di la ni byed pa
233b21(mdo 'grel): gang/ /de ni rlung gi khams su brtan/ /lus 'di la ni yongs mthong ba'i/ /nang gi stong pa'i rang bzhin gang/ /kun gyi go skabs 'byed ba'i phyir/ /nam mkha' i khams zhes brjod bar byed/ /rnam shes khams ni gang zhe na/ /'dir ni zag bcas
233b22(mdo 'grel): yid gang dang/ /de bzhin rnam shes lnga yi ni/ /tshogs gang kun tu sbyong ba'o/ /ming dang gzugs kyi myu gu yi/ /sa bon ngo bor gnas pa yi/ /nang gi bdag nyid rang bzhin la/ /rkyen gyi rgyu zhes brjod pa yin/ /de bzhin du/ rnam shes
233b23(mdo 'grel): sa bon rang bzhin te/ /las ni zhing gi rang bzhin no/ /sred bas rnam shes rlan byed de/ /ma rig pa ni sa bon 'debs/ /las ni 'di ltar bdag gis ni/ /'du byed las byung rang bzhin gyi/ /rnam shes sa bon dag bya dang/ /zhing gi bya ba byas
234a1(mdo 'grel): mi sems/ /sred pa 'ang 'di ltar bdag gis ni/ /rnam shes rlan zhes shes pa med/ /ma rig pa 'ang 'di ltar bdag/ sa bon de ni gdab mi sems/ /sa bon rnam shes de la yang/ /rkyen 'di dag gis 'bar
234a2(mdo 'grel): pa yis/ /bdag ni bskyed pa yin zhes ba'i/ /de lta'i shes pa yod pa ma yin/ /'on kyang rnam shes sa bon ni/ /las kyi zhing gis brten pa dang/ /srid pa'i rlan gyis brlan pa dang/ /sa bon ma rig gis btab pas/ /skye ba de dang de dag
234a3(mdo 'grel): dang/ /rim pa de dang de dag gis/ /ma yi dkur ni dus kyis su/ /ming gzugs myu gu bskyed pa ni/ /bdag las ma yin gzhan las min/ /dbang phyug gis kyang sprul man? la/ /ming dang gzugs kyi myu gu 'di/ /rgyu med las kyang
234a4(mdo 'grel): skye ba min/ /de ltar bdag med chos rnams ni/ /sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid dag tu 'byung/ /rgyu dang rkyen ni tshogs pa las/ /rgyun mi 'chad par 'byung 'gyur te/ /mig dang gzugs dang snang ba dang/ /de bzhin nam mkha' de skyed yin/ /rgyu lnga dag ni tshogs pa las
234a5(mdo 'grel): mig gi rnaM shes 'byung 'gyur la/ /rkyen 'di dag ni med pa na/ /ming gi rnaM shes 'byung min yang/ 'di dag so so dag la ni/ /btsal na rnyed pa ma yin no/ /de ltar dbang bo lhag ma las/ /skyes pa rnam shes rim pa 'di/ /nam mkha' 'ja' tshon dag mtshungs par/ /rkyen ma
234a6(mdo 'grel): rig las shes par bya/ /yang ni rkyen las byung ba de/ /mtshan nyid lnga ru shes bya ste/ /rtag dang chad dang bral ba dang/ /de bzhin 'pho ba spangs pa dang/ /yang ni rgyu ni chung ba las/ /'bras bu chen por 'byung ba dang/ /'dra ba dag dang ldan
234a7(mdo 'grel): pa yi/ /rgyu mthun 'bras bu 'byung ba'o/ /gang phyir skye ba la phyogs pa'i/ /phung po dag ni 'chi ba la/ /phyogs pa 'byung ba de yi phyir/ /rtag pa min par 'di shes bya/ /chad min gang phyir phung po rnams/ /rgyu rnams yod pa dag dang ni/ /med
234b1(mdo 'grel): pa dag las skyed min phyir/ /srang mda'i mtho dman ci bzhin no/ /gang gi phung po rigs? mthun phyir/ /slar yang skye ba gzhan du ni/ /rigs mi mthun par skye 'gyur ba/ /de phyir 'pho bar? las kyang min/ /gang phyir las chung byas pa las/ /'bras
234b2(mdo 'grel): bu chen po 'byung 'gyur te/ /de phyir rgyu ni chung du las/ /'bras bu chen por 'gyur ba yin/ /gang phyir ci 'dra'i las byas pa/ /de yi gzugs brnyan mi 'dor ba/ /de 'dra'i rgyu ni 'byung bas na/ /des na rgyu dang 'dra bar brjod/ /chos gang 'jig rten 'di
234b3(mdo 'grel): nas ni/ /gzhan du 'phel ba 'ga' med kyang/ /'on kyang las dang 'bras bu dag/ yod pa ru ni brtags pa yin/ /ma rig len pa sred pa zhes/ /bya ba nyon mongs bsdus ba ste/ /'du byed srid pa zhes bya ba/ /las kyi ming du shes par bya/ /rnam bas
234b4(mdo 'grel): ming dang gzugs dang ni/ /de bzhin skye dang reg pa dang/ /rga shi dang ni lhag ma dag/ /sdug bsngal ming can 'du shes bya/ /stong pa nyid ni ston pa che/ /'og nas ston par 'gyur bas na/ /zlos ba'i skyon du thal 'gyur phyir/ /phyi yi mtshan
234b5(mdo 'grel): nyid ma bstan to/ /gang gis 'gro ba'i rang bzhin rkyen las byung ba ru/ /ji lta ba bzhin 'di dag shes rab kyis rtogs pa/ /phra ba'i blo ldan de yis de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ /kun bzhi dag dang yang dag ldan pa mthong bar 'gyur/
234b6(mdo 'grel): 'di dag ni gti mug la kun tu spyod ba'i gnyen po'o// //de ltar sems ni las rung bas/ /lus dang tshor ba nyid dang ni/ /sems dang de bzhin chos rnams la/ /dran
234b7(mdo 'grel): pa nyer gzhag gus par bsgom/ /rkang lag byin pa brang dang sum mdo mgrin ba srag pa lto ba brang/ /'gram pa rgya ba dang nang khrol dang ni mgo bo'i tshogs rnams 'dus pa'i lus 'di ni/ /de bzhin slar yang kun nas nyon mongs so so'i dug
235a1(mdo 'grel): can gnas su gyur pa 'di/ /mi rtag pa zhes ku sha'i rtse 'dra'i blo can rnams kyis legs pa'i don du dpyad/ /yang dag min la brtags las gzhan/ /lus po 'di ni sngon gyi mdza' / /gang zhig nas kyang 'ong ba yin/ /
235a2(mdo 'grel): phyi ma'i mdza' yang 'gro min pas/ /thog ma tha ma dbus rnams su/ /gang yang gnas pa med par brtag/ des na rtsad nas med pa yi/ /lus po 'di la yongs 'dzin med/ /de ltar cha yi tshogs 'di la/ /lus po don dam du med pas//
235a3(mdo 'grel): mkhas pas lus po nam mkha' bzhin/ /rjes su dran pa rtag par bzhag/ de yang 'jig rten pa yi tha snyad du/ /grub pa'i lus po? dang ni phung po dang/ /khog pa dang ni gnas 'di zhes bya ba/ /'di dag ma lus glo bur ba yin no/ /lus
235a4(mdo 'grel): la rjes dran bsgoms pa las/ /sems can rnams kyi lus gzhan la/ /rang lus dang mtshungs brtan ba ru/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'du shes skye/ /snying po med ba'i lus po la/ /lus dang long spyod snying po dang/ /de bzhin 'tsho ba'i snying
235a5(mdo 'grel): po ste/ /snying po gsum gyis blang bar gyis/ /bdag gi lus 'di mi rtag ces/ /sems can rnams kyis slob ma ru/ /'gyur bar bsgrub pa gang yin pa/ /de la lus kyi snying por brjod/ /lus gsob yin phyir longs spyod la/ /gang zhig
235a6(mdo 'grel): dga' bar mi byed pa/ /de ni thams cad gtod dang ldan/ /de yis longs spyod snying po 'thob/ /snying po med ba'i lus dran na/ /la tsho ba'i don du bdag nyid kyis/ /sdig ba'i las rnams byed min pa/ /de yis 'tsho ba'i snying bo 'thob
235a7(mdo 'grel): lus 'di rtag tu yongs su ma bskyangs na/ /'phel mi nus pas byis pa rnams dang mtshungs/ /khang pa rnying pa dang mtshungs lus po 'di/ /'bad pas legs par bskyangs nas gzung bar bya/ /bka' stsal mang bas rgyal bo rnams dang
235b1(mdo 'grel): mtshungs/ /slu bar byed ba'i rang bzhin grib ma bzhin/ /shin tu 'bad pa'i sgo nas gzem dgos pas/ /lus 'di so ma btang ba'i bum pa mtshungs/ /chu bo chen po tshogs kyi rgyun 'bab bzhin/ /lus kyi tha ma 'chi ba'i mtsho la gtuD//
235b2(mdo 'grel): mdung thung bzhin du sdug bsngal bskyed pa'i rgyu/ /rtag tu phan mi byed pas dgra dang mtshungs/ /nam yang yid ches rdul phra tsam gyi yang/ /gnas med pas na rkun ma rnams dang mtshungs/ /reg pa'i sran mi bzod pas rma dang mtshungs/ /sgyu
235b3(mdo 'grel): ma bzhin du stong ba'i bdag nyid yin/ /ji ltar 'o ma yis ni bkrus gyur kyang/ /sol ba nams yang dkar por 'gyur ma yin/ /gtsang zhing dag pas byi dor byas gyur kyang/ /de ltar lus kyi rang bzhin mdor mi byed/ /des na bdag po med
235b4(mdo 'grel): pa yi/ /'khrul 'khor lta bu'i lus bo 'di/ /bza' btung sogs las byung ba'o zhes/ /rgyas bar yang dang yang du brtag /de dag ni lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o// //de ltar rab tu bsgoms pa'i mthus/ /lus g.yeng rab tu
235b5(mdo 'grel): zhi ba des/ /tshor ba dran pa nyer gzhag pa/ /brtan pa yis ni rnam par bsgom/ /de la log bar mngon zhen las/ /tshong ba rnam pa gsum yin te/ /bde dang sdug bsngal dang gzhan ni/ /bde min sdug bsngal min rig bya/ /'di la tshor
235b6(mdo 'grel): byed 'ga' med cing/ /tshor bya'i dngos po 'ang yod min pas/ /rten cing 'brel ba las byung ba'i/ /tshor ba 'di ni bdag med pa'o/ /de ltar nam mkha' i dngos gyur pa/ /gang zhig la ni zhen byed pa/ /de ni rmongs pas chu nang gi/ zla
235b7(mdo 'grel): ba len bar 'dod pa yin/ /de bzhin sdug bsngal gyis gdungs pa/ /gang zhig phyir zhing 'joms byed pa/ /de ni rmongs pas mig nang gi /gzugs brnyan kha la 'o byed yin/ /rmongs pa gang zhig bde min zhing/ /sdug bsngal
236a1(mdo 'grel): yang min rig pa de/ /'gro tshe rtsal reg pa la/ /bzung bar mngon par rlom dang mtshungs/ /gzhan yang tshor ba thams cad la/ /ming gzhan du byas 'khor ba ste/ /chos yang dag bar bsdus pa'i mdor/ /kun
236a2(mdo 'grel): mkhyen rang nyid kyis gsungs pa/ /nyer len dang ni phyin ci log /nye bar dmigs dang yongs su 'dzin/ /tshul bzhin ma yin y i byed ba/ /tshor ba yin zhes nges par gsungs/ /'di ltar gang tshe sdug bsngal gyis/ /byang chub sems dpa' 
236a3(mdo 'grel): la reg pa/ /de tshe sdug bsngal gyis nyen ba'i/ /sems can rnams la brtse bas dmigs/ /gang gi tshe na thugs rje can/ /tshor ba bde ba myong byed ba/ /de tshe chags pas gdungs rnams la/ /de yi brtse ba cher drag skye/ /gang che bde min sdug
236a4(mdo 'grel): bsngal min/ /rgyal ba'i sras bos myong byed ba/ /de tshe rmongs par byir rnams la/ /'di yi brtse ba shas cher 'phel/ /'ga' zhig byang chub sems dpa' la/ /mngon du gyur ba skye 'gyur ba/ /de nyid kyi tshe dmigs med pas/ /dmigs pa
236a5(mdo 'grel): byas ba lta bur skye/ /mtshan mar 'dzin pa yin pas na/ /tshor ba nyid la sred par brjod/ /gang tshe de nyid mi gnas pa/ /de tshe mya ngan 'das par brjod/ /de dag ni tshor ba dran ba nye bar gzhag ba'o// //de ltar gus par tshor
236a6(mdo 'grel): ba la/ /dran ba nyer gzhag bsgom byas te de yi rjes la 'bad ba yis/ /sems rjes dran ba nyer gzhag bsgom/ /mi gtsang gtsang bar 'du shes pas/ /sems ni sbrang ma rnams dang mtshungs/ /sdug bsngal thams cad bskyed bas na/ /sdang ba'i
236a7(mdo 'grel): dgra bo dang yang mtshungs/ /'dod pa sngar bag yud tsam la/ /bde ba nyid du 'du shes dang/ /mchil ba'i gzan la chags pa yi/ /nya yi lce dang de yang mtshungs/ /gzhan dag rnams la glags tshol phyir/ /mdangs 'phrog gnod
236b1(mdo 'grel): sbyin dang yang tshungs/ /dge ba'i nor rnams 'phrog pa'i phyir/ /de ni chom rkun dang yang mtshungs/ /sems ni skad cig nyid tsam gyis/ /'jig pa'i phyir na glog dang mtshungs/ /rkyen la rag las skye ba'i phyir/ /mar me'i 'od kyi rgyun dang
236b2(mdo 'grel): mtshungs/ /sems ni sdod pa ma yin pas/ /chu bo chen po'i rgyun dang mtshungs/ /nyon mongs glo bur ba rnams kyi/ /sgrib pas sems nam mkha' dang mchungs/ /'di ltar/ gzugs la dmigs nas gzugs rnams la/ /dga' ba phye ma leb
236b3(mdo 'grel): kyi mig dang mtshungs/ /sgra la dga' bas sems ni mngon pa yi/ /glu la snyan pa'i e Ne ya dang mtshungs/ /sems ni mang nag snod kyis reg pa la/ /dag la bas chags pa'i sbrang ma rnams dang mtshungs/ /rol dga' bas zas kyi lhag ma la//
236b4(mdo 'grel): brkam zhing chags ba'i bran mo rnams dang mtshungs/ /dri la dga' bas mi gtsang phung po la/ /shugs drag rgyug ba'i phag phrug rnams dang mtshungs/ /de lta na yang brtags shing dpyad ba na/ /sems de gang nas kyang ni rnyed ma yin/ /'das pa'i
236b5(mdo 'grel): sems ni 'gag pa yin pas med/ /ma 'ongs sems ni ma thob pas yod min/ /da ltar gnas pa bcings nas yod min te/ /gang ltar yang de tshad ma'i dpyad byar med/ /sems de shin du 'bad pas btsal gyur kyang/ /'das pa yod min
236b6(mdo 'grel): da lta ba yang med/ /ma 'ongs ba yang yod min de ltar na/ /de ni dus gsum dag las 'das bar 'dod/ /gang zhig dus gsum las ni 'das pa de/ /yod pa nyid ma yin zhing med pa 'ang min/ /de ltar mdza' gnyis las ni rnam grol ba/ /de ni
236b7(mdo 'grel): gang gi 'ang spyod yul ma yin no/ /sems ni gang na 'ang dga' med cing/ /gang na 'ang mi dga' yod min te/ /nam mkha' bzhin du ma skyes ba/ /skun phyung ma yin rmongs bya min/ /slar yang 'di yi rang bzhin 'bad btsal na/ /phung po khams dang skye 
236b8(mdo 'grel): 237a
236b9(mdo 'grel): mched rnams la naM/ /gang yang gang du 'ang nam yang ma mthong ba'i/ /sems kyi rgyun de 'dod par bya ba'am ci/ /dmigs pa las ni sems skye ba/ /re zhig 'di ltar brtag bya ste/ /dmigs pa las ni tha dang dam
236b10(mdo 'grel): tha mi dad ces yongs su brtag/ tha dang mngon bar khas len na/ /khams gsum thams cad sems med 'gyur/ /tha mi dang na bdag nyid la/ /nang gi bya ba zlog par dka' / /mjub mo'i rtse mo de nyid kyis/ /de nyid la reg nus ma yin
236b11(mdo 'grel): de bzhin ral gri'i so de yis/ /de nyid gcod par nus ma yin/ /legs par bslabs kyang rang nyid kyis/ /phrag pa la ni 'gong min ltar/ /sems kyi sems ni reg min zhes/ /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis gsungs/ /drag la

236b13(mdo 'grel): pa dang rab tu zhi/ /zhi gnas kun tu gnas pa'o zhes/ /sems rjes dran ba rgyas par bsgom/ /sems kyi chos nyid mi spang zhing/ /de bzhin rnam par sbyong ba 'ang min/ /sems 'di sgyu ma lta bu zhes/ /bya ba sems kyi chos nyid do//
236b14(mdo 'grel): gang dag dngos kun yongs btad nas/ /sangs rgyas zhing du yongs dag bar/ rab tu bsngo ba de rang gi sems kyi rnam par sbyor bar gsungs/ de dag ni sems dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o/ /de ltar sems rjes dran
236b15(mdo 'grel): pa nyer gzhag pa/ /yang dag gnas nas chos dran nyer gzhag bsgom/ /de ni mdor na chos rnams thams cad la/ /spong len spangs nas 'bad med rtogs pa yin/ /nyon mongs rnams la yang dag tu snang ba/ /'dod chags yod min zhes

237b17(mdo 'grel): sdang yod ma yin/ /gti mug yod min zhi ba yod ma yin/ /'dus ba yod min phung po 'ang yod ma yin/ /de ltar rtogs pas don dam du dpyad na/ /kun nyon mongs med rnam byang yod min pa/ /de ltar chos rnams yin zhes nges? pa gang/ /de 'dir
237b18(mdo 'grel): chos rjes dran par yang dag brjod/ /de ltar chos rnams sus thos pa/ /de yis chos dang sangs rgyas dang/ /byang chub dang ni lam rnams dang/ /chos kun tha dang mthong ma yin/ /slar yang nyon mongs kun la 'di/ /bcos pa'i 'dud shes
237b19(mdo 'grel): skyed byed pa /de bzhin chos gzhan rnams la 'ang/ /sgyu ma'i rnam par rab tu brtag/ nges byed de bzhin nyid kyi bcud kyis ni/ /phug nas chos rnams thams cad yongs su rtog /rab rib sgribs ma? lus rnam spangs pa/ /de ni thugs rje chen
237b20(mdo 'grel): pas rgyan du byed /ji ltar me dang 'bru mar sdong bu dang/ /rkod bu rnams las mi yis me mar mthong/ /de ltar rkyen rnams la skyes chos rnams la/ /stong nyid snying po can zhes tha snyad byed/ /chos rnams thams cad mdor bsdu na/ /phung po khas
237b21(mdo 'grel): dang skye mched de/ /rkyen la rag las skye bzhin du/ /'pho ba spangs nas yod ma yin/ /ji ltar rgyal brten nas ni/ ? /gang du rgya ye rjes mthong ba/ /rgya de ? yan
237b22(mdo 'grel): zhing/ /de med par yang med bzhin no/ /bdag dang gang zag shed pu gsob bo/ /srog dang shes? skyes byed pa tshang ba bo/ /gang yang cung zad mdza' cig tu med pa'i/ /nyon mongs des gang 'chid? byed grol bar khyed/ /ming rnams thams
237b23(mdo 'grel): cad ming gis stong ba'i phyir/ /chos rnams thams cad ming des stong ba yin/ /sna tshogs rang bzhin med gis gang brjod pa/ de ni kun rdzob bden pa 'phags pas gsungs/ /rang bzhin gang zhig ming gis brjod pa dang/ /rdzogs
238a1(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas kyis ma gsan gzigs ma yin/ /skye med 'gag pa med pa'i rang bzhin phyir/ /'jig rten 'di ni brda tsam las la min/ /de dag ni dran pa nye bar zhag pa rnams so// //
238a2(mdo 'grel): de ltar sems las dung? nas des/ /sdug bsngal rgya mtshor byid ba yi/ /mgron gdon pa yis bsam pa yis/ /stong nyid rab tu gsal byas pa'i/ /yon tan dpag tu med pa ni/ /mdo sde zla ba sgron ma las/ /yon tan rin chen
238a3(mdo 'grel): gyis rab brtan/ /stong nyid mthong ba bde bar gshegs pa yi/ /bslab pa'i lam la nges par ldog ma yin/ /rang bzhin gyis ni dbang por gyur pas na/ /nam yang bud med dbang du 'gyur ma yin/ /yun mi ring bar ltar
238a4(mdo 'grel): bcas 'jig rten 'dir/ /'di nyid rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog tu 'gyur/ /yang dag chos rnams des par shes nas ni/ /ngan song du ni ltung bar mi 'gyur zhing/ /mtshan dang dpe byad phun sum chogs pa dang/ /mngon par shes
238a5(mdo 'grel): pa lnga pa'ang 'thob par 'gyur/ /chos rnams la bdag med pa dang/ /de bzhin rang bzhin med pa dang/ /las dang 'bras bu ji lta bar/ /'brel ba la yang 'gal ba med/ /byang chub sems kyi spyod pa dang/ /mthong ba'i chos la
238a6(mdo 'grel): 'gal med ces/ /de skad yab sras mjal ba las/ /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi gsungs/ /khams drug reg pa'i skye mched drug/ yid kyi nye bar spyod pa ni/ /bco brgyad po rnams 'dus pa las/ /re zhig skyes ba zhes brjod
238a7(mdo 'grel): do/ /rnam shes nam mkha' rlung dang me/ /chu dang sa rnams ma lus pa/ /lugs 'byung lugs las bzlog pa yis/ /sna tshogs 'dzin par byed phyir khams/ /rnam par shes las skye zhes brjod/ /de ni rgyun du mchod byed pa'i/ /mig
238b1(mdo 'grel): la sogs pa rnam drug po/ /de dag skye mched du brjod do/ /gzugs rnams mthong ba'i mig la ni/ /rag pa'i skye mched du 'dod de/ /rang rang gi don gsal byed phyir/ /skye mched lhag ma 'ang de bzhin no/ /mig la sogs pa rang rang gis/ /
238b2(mdo 'grel): rag pa drug 'dir skyed par byed/ /so sor yid bde la sogs pa'i/ /dbye bas de ni rnam pa drug/ de ltar yid kyi nye ba ni/ /spyod pa bco brgyad gsal bar brjod/ /'di rnams kun tu tshogs pa dang/ /'dus pa skyes bu zhes bya'o/ /gang zhig nang
238b3(mdo 'grel): gi sra ba nyid/ /lus 'di la ni dmigs pa yi/ /sen mo so sogs dbye ba ni/ /nang gis yi khams yin no/ /gang yang phye yi 'jam pa dang/ /cung zad sra ba nyid mthong ba'i/ /sa 'dzin sogs byed gang yin pa/ /de ni spyi yi khams yin no/ /nang
238b4(mdo 'grel): gi bdag nyid skye bzhin pa/ /'di ni gang nas kyang 'ongs min/ /de bzhin 'gag pa'i tshe na yang/ /gang du 'ang nyams par 'gyur ba med/ /de ltar bud med rnams kyi slar/ /nang du bud med nga zhes rtog/ brtags nas slar yang phyi rol tu//
238b5(mdo 'grel): skyes pa'o zhes mngon par rlom/ /de nas yang dag chags sems de/ /skyes ba dang ni lhan cig tu/ /phrad par 'dod cing rtse ba dang/ /za bar 'dod na shas cher spre/ /skyes pa 'ang de bzhin nang 'di la/
238b6(mdo 'grel): skyes pa'o zhes rtog byed cing/ /ma rig stobs kyis bskyed pa yi/ /grong pa'i chos kyi 'dod pa 'byung/ /des na de gnyis bde ba ni/ /'dod pas dben par song nas ni/ /gang gis nur nur po skyed pa'i/ /sbyor ba de 'dra byed par
238b7(mdo 'grel): 'gyur/ /de la brtags pa gang yin dang/ /rtog pa las byung kun rtog gang/ /yang dag min par brtags las gzhan/ /de dag rang bzhin gyis grub min/ /de bzhin mo la bud med med/ /skyes ba la yang skyes ba med/ /snyoms par
239a1(mdo 'grel): 'jug na snyoms pa med/ /nur nur la yang nur nur med/ /nur nur rang bzhin med gyur pa/ /de tshe yang dag ji bzhin rig/ de gnyis yod par ma gyur phyir/ /skye ba med pa yin zhes gnas/ /ma skyes pa
239a2(mdo 'grel): yis ji ltar na/ /sra ba nyid ni skye bar 'gyur/ /des na yod min kun rtog las/ /sra nyid 'byung bar shes par bya/ /phyi rol gyi ni sa yi khams/ /lcags ri dang ni ri dbang bo/ /ri bo mchog rab la sogs pa/ /'jig rten khams rnams
239a3(mdo 'grel): ma lus pa'o/ /de yi srid pa nyid gang de/ /'ongs ba med cing 'gro ba med/ /khams yin no zhes 'jig rten pa'i/ /tha snyad byed pa tsam du zad/ /gang gi tshe nas chen 'di/ /me yis yongs su bsregs nas ni/ /chu rnams kyis ni

239a5(mdo 'grel): pa ltar/ /de bzhin gnas dang stong pa yang/ /rang bzhin nyid kyis stong pa yin/ /yang ni chu khams gang zhe na/ /lus kyi rdul dang mchi ma gcin/ /snabs mkhris khrag tshil 'o ma rnag /gzhan yang gsher ba gang yod pa'o/ /
239a6(mdo 'grel): de la mya ngan zug rdu dang/ /byams dang brang? las mchi ma 'byung/ /bsod nams ldan pa la la la/ /chos kyi shugs kyis 'byung ba yin/ /de yang gang nas kyang 'ongs min/ /bskams tshe gang du 'ang song ba med/ /byung ngo bskams so
239a7(mdo 'grel): zhes pa yang/ /tha snyad 'jug pa tsam du bas /gang che sbrin stug chu rgyun gyis/ /'jig rten 'di ni 'jig byed cing/ /sa chen tshangs pa'i 'jig rten par/ /rgya mtsho gcig tu byas gyur ba/ /de tshe de 'dra'i chu yi tshogs/ /gang zhig
239b1(mdo 'grel): nas ni 'ongs par 'gyur/ /nyi ma bcu gnyis me yis ni/ /bskams nas brlag che gang du song/ gzhan la bltos nas byung ba yi/ /khams gzhan rnams kyi skye ba dang/ /gnas pa dang na 'jig pa yang/ /de ltar dngos mar shes par bya
239b2(mdo 'grel): sa sogs 'byung ba bzhi po la/ /brten pa'i dang ba gang yin pa /mchod cing 'di gsal byed pa'i phyir/ /mig gi skye mched du brjod do/ /sa yi khams kyi dang ba 'dir/ /mig gi skye mched du mi 'dod/ /de bzhin chu dang me dang ni/ rlung khams
239b3(mdo 'grel): dang ba 'dod ma yin/ /de ltar de ni brtag bzod pa'i/ /mig gi skye mched 'ga' yang med/ /tha snyad tsam las ma gtogs pa/ /'di dag bya ba dang bral yin/ /khams rnams so so snang ba la/ /dang ba 'ga' yang yod ma yin/ /chos rnams
239b4(mdo 'grel): thams cad stong ba'i phyir/ /dang pa de dngos gang zhig yin/ /des na mig gi skye mched la/ /thog ma med cing tha ma med/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis na/ /gnas kyang dmigs pha ma yin no/ /gang zhig rang bzhin dang bral te/ /skyes pa ma
239b5(mdo 'grel): yin bud med min/ /rlom sems rlom sems min pa 'ang/ /rang bzhin gyis ni 'gag pa nyid/ /mdo rjes 'brangs nas rigs pa 'dis/ /rna ba sogs la 'ang shes bya ste/ /de dag rnams kyi rtogs pa 'ang mthar/ /chos kyi dbyings la thug
239b6(mdo 'grel): phyir ro/ /mig ni yul gzugs las yin zhes/ /gsungs pa yin bde yi phyir/ gzugs rnams nyid la dmigs pa'i mig/ gzugs rnams la ni thogs dang bcas/ /de ltar sgra la sogs pa la/ /dmigs pa'i rna ba la sogs pa/ /rang rang yul la thogs bcas zhes/ /
239b7(mdo 'grel): yul dngos rim pas shes par bya/ /mthun pa la sogs dbye ba tha dad pa'i/ /gzugs rnams la ni dmigs par byed pa'i mig /mthun pa la ni sdug par 'du shes shing/ /mi mthun pa la mi sdug par 'du shes/ /mthun pa ma yin mi mthun
240a1(mdo 'grel): pa yang min/ /gzugs la btang snyoms tshul byas 'du shes te/ /de ltar yid kyi chos rab rim bzhin du/ /rang blo rab tu gsal ba las mtshon? bya/ /de ltar drug la so sor gsum gsum du/ /phye ba las 'dir
240a2(mdo 'grel): yid kyis nye ba ru/ /spyod pa rab tu brtags pa'i yid kyis ni/ /nyes bar spyod pa bco brgyad du gsungs so/ /de ltar khams sogs rang bzhin gyis/ /sgyu ma lta bur shes byas nas/ /kun la chags pa las grol ba/ /sprul pa'i glang chen
240a3(mdo 'grel): bzhin du sbyang/ /rmi lam gzhon nu ma dang phrad pa yi/ /dga' ba de nyams gnyid log sad pa'i tshe/ /'di na gyis pa'i rigs can las gzhan min/ /de ltar zhe na cing kun tu chags pa des/ /lus dang ngag dang yid kyi dbye ba yis/ /'dod

240a5(mdo 'grel): yang ji ltar tha mar 'gag pa yi/ /rnam shas de ltar dang po'i rnam shes skyed/ /las dang dmigs pa'i dbang por gyur ba ni/ /nyin mtshan 'gro ba rnams la so sor sbyar/ /rang bzhin mtshungs pa yin pa'i phyir/ /sems kyi rgyud ni rab
240a6(mdo 'grel): tu 'jug na yang/ /gang du bde dang sdug bsngal spyod ba yi/ /rnam par smin pa yang dag myong bar byed/ /shes 'gag tha ma gang yin pa/ /de la 'chi 'phor 'dod pa yin/ /dang po'i rnam shes 'byung ba la/ /'dir ni skye bar 'dod pa
240a7(mdo 'grel): 'ang yin/ /de lta bas na shes pa'i dang po ni/ /skye ba'i tshe na gang nas kyang 'ongs min/ /de ni nges par 'gag pa'i tshen yang/ /gang du song ba 'ang spungs nas yod ma yin/ /de ltar dang po'i rnam shes dang/ /las rnams kyis ni skye ba
240b1(mdo 'grel): dag/ rang bzhin stong phyir gang nas kyang/ /'ongs pa 'am gang du 'ang song ba med/ /thog ma tha ma gnyis kyi ni/ /shes pa shes pa nyid kyis stong/ /de bzhin du ni 'chi 'pho yang/ /'chi 'pho'i rang bzhin nyid kyis stong/ /de lta 'ang bde ?

243b4(mdo 'grel): bsam pa yang dag dag gyur pa'i/ /chos kyi sgra ni nam mkha' i dkyil nas 'byung/ /bsam pa dag na shing dang ni/ /rtsig pa las kyang gdam dag rjes bstan 'byung/ /'dir ni dge ba spel ba yi/ /yang ni snying rje rab bsgom par/ /sangs rgyas chos
