248b10(mdo 'grel): par/ /gos kyi rnam pa grangs med mang po dag/ lus la bde bar rim gro sbyin par byed/ /snying po byang chub gnas phyir gtan stong ste/ /mal gsum don du mal gyi sbyin pa byed/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i spyan mchog bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /
248b11(mdo 'grel): mchod rten gtsug lag khang du mar me dbul/ /lha yi rna ba 'thob phyir rol mo dang/ /sangs rgyas tshul khrims bsgrub phyir spos kyang 'bul/ /skyabs su 'gro ba yongs su bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /khyim dang btung gnas rab gnas rnams gtong//
248b12(mdo 'grel): bro ba ro mchog yongs su bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /shin tu zhim sbyar ro rnams gtong bar byed/ /'jig rten 'di dag rga shi med stobs par/ /sman gyi mchog rnams grangs med sbyin par byed/ /nyon mongs tshogs kyi 'khol ba'i 'jig rten rnams//
248b13(mdo 'grel): rab byung bdag nyid mnyam par bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /de ni rtag tu bran dag gtong byed cing/ /sems can bla med chos kyi rdzar? yang bsgrub/ /mtshan rab bzang po phun sum tshogs bsgrub par/ /mu tig bye ru gser la sogs pa gtong//
248b14(mdo 'grel): dpe byad bzang po sna tshogs bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /rin chen sgron ma rgyan gyi sbyin pa byed/ /bsam gtan sgrub phyir brtul zhugs nags tshal dang/ /chos mdzod thob phyir /nor mdzod yongs su gtong/ /thub dbang rgyal bo
248b15(mdo 'grel): thob phyir skyon med par/ /rgyal srid paks? brgyan sbyin pa gtong bar byed/ /byang chub mchog la mos phyir skyon med par/ /bu dang bu mo sdug pa'i sbyin pa byed/ /gcig tu chos la dga' zhing mos pI
249b16(mdo 'grel): @249b
249b17(mdo 'grel): phyir/ /dga' ba'i rgyur gyur rtsed mo sna tshogs gtong/ /'khor los brgyan pa'i rkang pa mchog thob ste/ /byang chub snying por gnas par mos pa'i phyir/ /'jig rten don chen bsgrub par brtson pa de/ /rtog pa med par rkang pa yongs su gtong/ /
249b18(mdo 'grel): sdug bsngal rgya mtshor skye shi'i chus g.yengs pa'i/ /'jig rten chos kyi lag pas bskyab bo zhes/ /lag pa pad+ma rgyas 'dra gtong bar byed/ /dbang po lnga dag rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ /sna dang rna ba skyon med yongs su gtong/ /'jig rten thams cad
249b19(mdo 'grel): sgrub pa kun spangs te/ /rnam dag mig ldan bsgrub phyir mig kyang gtong/ /sa chu me dang rlung ltar rtog med cing/ /'jig rten nyer 'tshor bdag gi lus sgrub ces/ /sha bcad khrag dang bcas pa gtso bo de/ /snying rje chen pos yongs su gtong bar
249b20(mdo 'grel): byed/ /? du byung ba'i spyod pa brtan pa de/ /rdo rje lta bu'i char ba bab gyur kyang/ /de bzhin gshegs ba'i sku mchog mi bshigs pa/ /'jig rten kun gyi thob phyir rkang yang gtong/ /'jig rten blar gyur ye shes mnyam gzhag phyir//
249b21(mdo 'grel): skye bo slong du 'ongs pa thams cad la/ /lus kyi dam pa mgos kyang mchod byed na/ /lus kyi yan lag gzhan lta ci zhig smos/ /de la sogs pa rgyun tu skyon med par/ /byang chub sems dpa' spyod las yongs btang ba'i/ /sbyin pa'i char kyis 'gro
249b22(mdo 'grel): ba chim byas shing/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgya mtshor mngon par 'gro/ /de ni mi rigs btsal zhing sbyin pa dang/ /gzhan la gnod pa'i btsal zhing sbyin mi bya/ /de la gzhan la btang bas dma' ba med/ /de ni sbyin pas snyoms pas bdag
249b23(mdo 'grel): mi bstod/ /gzhan la gnod pa nan yang byed pa med/ /log pa'i sbyor ba yongs su mi gtong ste/ /lta ka pa'i bsam pas ma zin sbyin mi byed/ /khro ba'i skyon gyi dma' bar mi gtong ste/ /sbyin nas de la rjes su 'gyod mi byed/ /gcam byas bkur
250a1(mdo 'grel): zhes mang du sbyin mi byed/ /khrel gyis dogs sam 'jigs pa'i phyir ram/ /sbyin pa'i gnas su 'gyur phyir gtong bar ni/ /bzang po yod bzhin ngan ? gtor ba 'am/ /sbyin pa'i gnas min zhes te brnyas pa'i//
250a2(mdo 'grel): rnam smin re bas dogs par byas pa 'am/ /rim gro med cing smad bar de mi gtong/ /tshul khrims ldan la phul bas mi mthong zhing/ /khengs shing brnyas zhes nyung bar gtong ba med/ /gang gi log pa'i nan tan rgyur gyur dang/ /slong ba
250a3(mdo 'grel): rnams la gnod par sbyin mi byed/ /de ni dus min sbyin par mi byed de/ /dus dang mi mthun sbyin pa 'ang de mi byed/ /ltar smon ma yin rgyal por smon phyir min/ /theg pa dman smon tshul gyi gtong mi byed /de ni dor bltas gtong
250a4(mdo 'grel): par mi byed de/ /grags ba'i sgra dang gzhad gang don phyir min/ /bdag gis nus su zad ces mi rlom zhing/ /gzhan gyi srog la gnod phyir sbyin mi byed/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen par ma bsngos pa 'am/ /skyes bu dam
250a5(mdo 'grel): pas smang? par gtong mi byed/ /de phyir pha rol phyin pa'i ming 'thob cing/ /shin tu rnam dag sbyin par yang dag 'gro/ /de yi sbyin las byung ba'i bsod nams tshogs/ /'jig rten kun gyi bsod nams yongs bsdus kyang/ /de dag
250a6(mdo 'grel): kun gyi zil gnon mi 'gyur bas/ /de phyir 'jig rten kun gyi gtso bor 'gyur/ /mngon shes lnga la shin tu nges 'gyur zhing/ /'jig rten kun la sbyin pa'i char 'bebs pas/ /phyogs rnams kun du de yi tshang mi zin/ /rtag par
250a7(mdo 'grel): rgyun tu 'byung bas zad mi shes/ /de bas mi zad 'gro la phan par 'gyur/ /ye shes mi zad rgya chen rgyu yang yin/ /khams gsum zad par 'gyur ba'i dngos po dang/ /mkha' dang sprin ltar rtag tu 'dre ba med/ /de ni stong nyid rnam par
250b1(mdo 'grel): mnyam gzhag cing/ /mtshan ma'i skyon rnams yongs su spangs pa dang/ /nyon mongs bsal zhing dman pa med pas na/ /thub dbang chen po rnams kyis ma zad gsungs/ /skyes bu dam pas ched du brjod byas shing/ /bde ba rgya chen rgyu yi sbyin pa ni/ /byed
250b2(mdo 'grel): phar 'dod bas mi rtag rnal 'byor dang/ /'jig rnams la snying rje chen po bskyed/ /longs spyod rnam pa mi rtag mthong gyur cing/ /snying rje chen po rang gi dang gyur na/ /byin pa bdag gis khyim bzhag gzhan gyi bar/ /shin tu rig pa'i tshul
250b3(mdo 'grel): gyis rtogs par 'gyur/ /gang byin de las 'jig pa skye mi 'gyur/ /khyim na gang bzhag de las 'jigs pa 'byung/ /mi mchog thun mong rtag tu bsrung dgos te/ /byin na nyes pa de dag gnod mi 'gyur/ /byin pas 'jig rten pha rol bde
250b4(mdo 'grel): bsgrub/ /ma byin tshe 'di nyid la 'ang sdug bsngal skyed/ /mi yi nor rnams skar mda'i rang bzhin ltar/ /yongs su ma btang de dag med par 'gyur/ /ma byin nor rnams mi rtag med 'gyur te/ /byin pas de dag yod pa'i gter du 'gro/ /sems can
250b5(mdo 'grel): phan par gzhol bas gang byin pa'i/ /nor rnams snying po med pa'ang yod par 'gyur/ /gang zhig yongs su btang ba mkhas pas bsngags/ /skye bo byis pa de dag sogs la dga' / /yongs su gzung bas mi 'bral gang yang med/ /byin pas rtag
250b6(mdo 'grel): tu phun sum tshogs pa 'byung/ /btang bas nyon mongs yongs su 'dzin mi 'gyur/ /'jungs pa 'phags pa'i lam min nyon mongs bskyed/ /gang zhig byin pa de ni lam gyi mchog /de las gzhan gyur 'phags pas lam ngan gsungs//
250b7(mdo 'grel): slong ba sngon du 'ong na rgyal sras des/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub tshogs ni spel ba'i phyir/ /des gzhan 'du shes bdag la bzhag byas shing/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'du shes de la skyed/ /slong ba 'ongs pa thos na che ba rnams/ /nyon mongs
251a1(mdo 'grel): mi dga' rnam par srab 'gyur bas/ /dga' ba'i ston mo chen po 'byung ba bas/ /slong ba sngon du 'ongs la de dag dga' / /ci ste slong ba mngon du 'ongs gyur kyang/ /shin tu mthu chung sbyin par ma nus na/ /ci nas slong pa
251a2(mdo 'grel): sma bab ma gyur pa/ /'jam pa'i chig gis de yi yid kyang bzho/ /phyin chad slong ba dung du 'ongs gyur na/ /ci nas kho chad dma' bar mi 'gyur bar/ /'jungs pa'i skyon rnams rnam par bsal ba dang/ /srid pa yongs su spang phyir nan tan bya/ /
251a3(mdo 'grel): gang zhig zang zing nor la chags byed pa/ /de la byang chub mchog sems skye ba med/ /sems mchog de ni skyon dang mi 'grogs te/ /rgya mtsho chen po ro dang mi 'grogs bzhin/ /de bas rtag tu skyon rnams kun spangs te/ /byang chub tshol ba
251a4(mdo 'grel): rtag tu thams cad sbyin/ /'jig rten thams cad gcig pu ngas skyabs pa'i/ /sems dang spyod dang zhum pa'i ngang mi mthun/ /sbyin pa de 'dra'i rtsa ba byang chub sems/ /de 'dra'i sbyin pa gtong 'dod de mi btang/ /'jig rten nang na gtong 'dod
251a5(mdo 'grel): sems ldan pa/ /gtong ba'i nang na mchog ces rgyal bas gsungs/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u'o// //rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshul khrims rgyan ldan par/ 'gro ba thams cad bsgrub don gang brtson pa/ /rang gi tshul
251a6(mdo 'grel): khrims thog mar yongs su sbyang/ /tshul khrims dag pa'i mthu yi stobs kyang bskyed/ /ci nas rmi lam rmi yang 'tsho med par/ /'jig rten kun la byams pa bskyed par bya/ /gzhan la phan par gcig tu brtson pa des/ /gzhan gyi longs spyod
251a7(mdo 'grel): sbrul bzhin reg mi bya/ /kha ton spyod pa'i blo las phyir log pas/ /thog mar gzhan gyi bud med bslu ba'i blo/ /yongs su btang bya 'jig rten phan byed pas/ /lus kyi spyod pa skyes bu mchog ltar bsgrub/ /snyan cing yid 'ong dus dang ldan pa'i
251b1(mdo 'grel): tshig/ dbyen du mi 'gyur bden dang mthun ba dag /dam chos yang dag khong du chud 'gyur ba/ /gnyen pos btsal cing rtag tu brjod par bya/ /gzhan gyi bde ba phun sum thob gyur na/ /bdag gis zho shas gang zhig bsgrub bya ba//
251b2(mdo 'grel): de dag kho bdag nyid kyi rnyad gyur ces/ /dga' sems bskyed bya chags sems yongs su spangs/ /nyon mongs dbang gyur bdag phan mi reg pa/ /'di ni bdag nyid mthu chung zhan pa'i mdza' / /gzhan gyi nyes pa kun kyang de bzhin zhes/ /gnod
251b3(mdo 'grel): sems me 'bar gzhi la phyir nan tan bya/ /log lta'i 'du shes mun nag thibs po dag /ye shes snang bas yid la bsal byas te/ /lha mi phul gyi yon tan bsgom byas shing/ /dad pa mi 'phrogs rtsa ba brtan bar gzugs/ /mtho
251b4(mdo 'grel): ris thar pa'i bde lam gyur pa ste/ /las lam bcu po 'di las nyams mi bya/ /'di la gnas pa 'gro la phan bsams pa'i/ /bsam ba'i khyad par 'bras bu yod par 'gyur/ /ngag lus yid rnams yang dag bsdam bya ba/ /mdor
251b5(mdo 'grel): bsdus tshul khrims yin zhes rgyal bas gsungs/ /tshul khrims ma lus du ba'i gzhi yin pas/ /de phyir 'di dag rnam par spyang bar gyis/ /srog gcod spangs pa nges pa'i dang 'chang bas/ /'gro ba thams cad ston cing phebs par 'gyur/ /de
251b6(mdo 'grel): yi bag chags sems la skyon gyur pa/ /nan tan ma byas rang gi yongs su 'chad/ /byams pa'i khyad par rjes mthun sems ldan zhing/ /khon gtsugs rnam pa yongs su zhi 'gyur na/ /mya ngan rnam pa'i nyes pa kun spangs shing/ /bde bar de nyal bde
251b7(mdo 'grel): par sad par 'gyur/ /gnad sbyin srin po dag kyang phan par byed/ /lam ngan rgyud kyis de la 'jigs pa med/ /nang med yon tan rgyan dang ldan pa yi/ /bde lam brten pa'i tshe ring thob par 'gyur/ /de nyid rgyu yis byang chub brnyes pa yi//
252a1(mdo 'grel): bde gshegs rnams kyi sku tshe dpags yas shing/ /'jig rten bde ba bskyed cing don mdzad pa/ /dgongs pa'i rjes su snyeg pa yongs su 'grub/ /gzhan gyi longs spyod ma byin ma blangs pas/ /'jig rten gzhan du longs spyod rgya
252a2(mdo 'grel): chen dag/ bud med dbugs kyis ri rab mi 'gul ltar/ /bgo skal ba dang 'phrogs pas mi 'phrogs 'grub/ /sbyod pa dag pas kun gyi yid 'ong zhing/ /ston pa'i snod du tshe 'di nyid la 'grub/ /de phyir pha rol tu yang dogs med cing/ /lam gyi ?
252a3(mdo 'grel): su gyur pa'i rnam pa med/ /skyid longs yangs la snying po med rtogs pas/ /ched du ma bsgrubs kyis sbyin pa'i dang du 'gyur/ /de phyir nye ba'i nyon mongs rnam dag pas/ /bla na med pa'i byang chub dang gis 'thob/ /'dod pa rnams la log
252a4(mdo 'grel): par spyod spangs pas/ /dbang po thul phyir rab tu zhi la mos/ /'jig rten bstod pas phyogs rnams kun gyi mthar/ /grags pa khyab 'gro bsal la kun 'thob 'gyur/ /bud med kun lam ltar bltas pas na/ /nyon mongs 'dod chags
252a5(mdo 'grel): gang la'ang mi 'byung ste/ /de phyir de yi bsod nams bsags pas na/ /thub dbang skyes chen dbang po mtshan ldan 'grub/ /tshig tu gang smras brdzun las phyir bzlog pas/ /rab tu dga' ldan g.yo rgyu rnam dag sems/ /tshig rnams
252a6(mdo 'grel): kun gyis blang bar 'grub gyur pas/ /sems can mang po chos gzhol kun gyis 'grub/ /bden dang ldan la lha rnams byams gyur pa/ /lta yi rang bzhin yon tan phyogs byed pa/ /de yi spyod pa kun la mngon sum pas/ /'di 'dra de la ngo
252a7(mdo 'grel): mtshar che ba med/ /'jig rten gzhan byams tshad mar byed pa ni/ /'jig rten phal cher yon tan mi 'chad la/ /rang gi tshad kyis gzhan la tshod 'dzin kyang/ /de 'drar gyur pa de ni ngo mtshar che/ /me tog uta pa la yi nags por zhing/ /bde
252b1(mdo 'grel): ldan kha ni padmo 'phags tshul du/ /dri zhim sim byed yid du 'ong ba dang/ /de yi kha la gnas 'cha' rten par 'gyur/ /ye shes 'bar ba ngan 'gro'i skar lta bu/ /rigs dang mi rigs rnam par shes gyur pas/ /ci dga' sdug pa'i rnam rtog
252b2(mdo 'grel): byung gyur na/ /bdag nyid dbang du gyur pa khrel gyis 'dzem/ /de ltar rang bzhin rnam dag tshul gyur pas/ /gzhan la dogs med gzhan gyis dogs mi bya/ /de phyir de yi bden pa'i rjes brnyegs tshig/ sangs rgyas grub tshe bsrung ba med par
252b3(mdo 'grel): 'gyur/ /phra ma dbyen spangs g.yog 'khor mi 'phrog cing/ /gzhan gyi gnod pas lus la mi tshugs te/ /nan tan lhur byed dad pa dbyer med 'gyur/ /byams pa slu med 'jigs pa mi 'gyur dang/ /'gro don mi gtong snying rje mi nyams
252b4(mdo 'grel): 'thob/ /thub dbang grub tshe slob ma'i dge 'dun yang/ /tshe rabs bskal pas phye bar mi 'gyur 'grub/ /khro ba'i rdul mang dpung du gyur pa la/ /rnam rtog rlung gis kun tu 'tshubs pa rnams/ /grags pa'i lus la grib mar 'gyur ro zhes//
252b5(mdo 'grel): zhe gcod rnam pa byams pa'i chus bkrus shing/ /de las phyi rol tshig snyan 'jam pa yis/ /'jig rten bsam pa bde ba'i dbang du 'gyur/ /'jig rten dga' ba rtsa ba brug? gyur pas/ /de yi tshig ni kun gyis blang zhing gzung/ /de phyir
252b6(mdo 'grel): 'jig rten rnam pa brgyad btul zhing/ /de dag sdug bsngal lam ngan bcad bya ste/ /bsod nams las ldan 'di dang pha rol tu/ /chos kyi tshul bsrungs ngan 'gror 'gro mi 'gyur/ /rgyang ring gnas nas zab gsal grags pa dang//
252b7(mdo 'grel): dpal ldan nyen rang bzhin bde skye ba/ /de bzhin 'brug sgra zab la gsal ba yi/ /tshangs ba'i sgra dbyangs kha yi rgyan kyang byed/ /'khyal ? tshig las phyir log gyur pas na/ /mkhas pa rnams la shin tu dpen par 'gro/ /de yi blo
252b8(mdo 'grel): 253a
252b9(mdo 'grel): yang bden par smra mos pas/ /skyon med che ba nyid kyang nges 'thob bo/ /bsod nams des na thub pa'i rgyal gyur tshe/ /dka' zhing zab pa yongs su dris pa yi/ /zhu ba rnam mang grangs med dus gcig tu/ /
252b10(mdo 'grel): thogs pa med pa'i tshig gis lung yang ston/ /chags sems don med 'di dang pha rol tu/ /gnod pa'i 'bras bu sgrub byed blos bsal te/ /phrag dog med pas bsam pa ji bzhin du/ /phun sum tshogs pa'i longs spyod rgyas ba 'thob/ /
252b11(mdo 'grel): rnam shes dag bas de la brten pa yi/ /lus ngag yid kyi las kyang shin tu gtsang/ /dus dang mthun bas gsal ba'i mkha' dbyings la/ /skar tshogs dri med dkyil 'khor ji bzhin 'bar/ /de yi longs spyod mchog rnams bsod nams
252b12(mdo 'grel): la/ /rtag tu sbyar ba de yi blo 'jug ste/ /zhes pa nga rgyal can gyi glags med cing/ /rgyal ba dag gi de ni brtan par 'gyur/ /de yi las dgos bsgrubs ba'i 'bras bu bas/ /dbang po nam yang nyams bar 'gro ba med/ /de phyir 'jig rten
252b13(mdo 'grel): gsum gyis mchod 'os pa'i/ /'khor lo zlog byed ston pa'i mchog tu 'gyur/ /gnod sems gdung pa'i rims nad yongs bsal zhing/ /rang bzhin dge tshul phun sum tshogs bas na/ /shin tu zhi zhing gsal ba'i dang tshul
252b14(mdo 'grel): gyis/ /yid kyi mos pa shin tu gsal bar 'gyur/ /byams pa'i ro bde khyad par thob pas na/ /'tshe ba'i tshul lam 'thab mo 'khrug ldan dang/ /'phags min spyod pa las ngan rnam pa la/ /de yi blo ni nam yang 'jug mi 'gyur//
252b15(mdo 'grel): las rung 'jam pa'i yid kyis las ldan pas/ /tshangs pa'i 'jig rten de la dkon pa med/ /'jig rten kun du 'phags dang mnyam 'gyur zhing/ /'gro bas lha bzhin gus pas mchod bar 'gyur/ /sems can kun la phan
253b16(mdo 'grel): @253b
253b17(mdo 'grel): dga' yang dang yang/ /dbyar gyis brnyogs pa'i chu klung chu bo dag /ston dus gsal bas dad bar bya ba bzhin/ /'gro ba kun gyi yid la dang? bskyed/ /kun gyi blta na yid 'ong bzang ba dang/ /ye shes rgyus byung tshul mchog rmad byung ba/ /'jig
253b18(mdo 'grel): rten rnam shes so sor sgrub pa dag/ sangs rgyas grub tshe rnam pa gcig tu bsgrub/ /log par lta ba'i 'dam la mi 'dug na/ /de bas bsgrubs pa'i grogs dang brad par 'gyur/ /rang gi las bzhin 'gyur bar lam mthong bas/ /sdig ba'i las rnams
253b19(mdo 'grel): de ni yongs su spongs/ /rgyal ba rnams la dad pa mi zlog cing/ /ngo mtshar bkra shis rnams kyi nyon mongs med/ /'phags pa'i lam la gnas pa de 'thob ste/ /de phyir de ni khyad par 'gro ba thob/ /'jig chogs lta las yang dag 'phags
253b20(mdo 'grel): bas na/ /rgyu rnams zad phyir ngan 'gror de mi 'gro/ /chags med ye shes mchog dang de ldan pas/ /sa dang mtho ris chags pa med par 'gro/ /'gro ba'i don la mthu che dpa' ba yi/ /thams cad mkhyen myur rgyal dbang chos kyi rnams/ /nga rgyal la sogs thob
253b21(mdo 'grel): par ma gyur pa'ang/ /thams cad de la de phyir mngon du 'gyur/ /de 'dra'i longs spyod yon tan rgyan ldan zhing/ /rang la dbang yod bsgom 'os de dga' i rgyu/ /mkhas pa su zhig yang dag len mi byed/ /sems can phan dga' de len ci zhig smos/ /lha rdzas
253b22(mdo 'grel): dga' rgyu mi yi longs spyod dang/ /bde mchog ro mchog lha yi phun sum tshogs/ /tshul khrims rgyus byung ci zhig ngo mtshar che/ /sangs rgyas chos rnams de las byung ba ltos/ /tshul khrims nyams pas rang don mi nus na/ /gzhan don tshul la mthu
253b23(mdo 'grel): yod ga la 'ong/ /de phyir gzhan don legs par brtson pa yis/ /'di la rim gro glod par rigs pa min/ /de bas mi bzang 'jigs pa mthong bya zhing/ /spang 'os chung yang rnam par spang ba gyis/ /byang chub sems dpa' bsrung bos tshul khrims
254a1(mdo 'grel): dag/ rang gi bde la brkam pas dral mi bya/ /bud med lus dang tshul byang mthong sogs pa'i/ /skabs kyi nyes pas shag shig tshul mi bcad/ /mi bsrun skye ba nyon mongs rnam pas kyang/ /tshul khrims 'dran 'dran rnam pa
254a2(mdo 'grel): yongs su spad/ /gcig tu dkar chos tshogs ni bsags byas shing/ /rnyog dang rnam bral tshul khrims bsten par bya/ /rang dbang gyur pas nyams su bde ba dang/ /mkhas pas bspags pa'i rgyan ldan tshul khrims bsrungs/ /bslab pa'i gnas
254a3(mdo 'grel): skabs tshad bar yongs rdzogs pa'i/ /kun rdzob snyems med tshul khrims yang dag bsten/ /rnam dag sems la gzugs brnyan gyur ba yi/ /gzhan don ro gcig sbyor bas de dag bsrung/ /dran pa'i gzhi ldan dbang ba bsdam byas shing/ /tshul
254a4(mdo 'grel): khrims bsrung la shin tu brtson bar bya/ /'jig rten tshul khrims 'chal ba mang bo'i mun/ /nyi ma'i 'od kyis gsal ba ji bzhin gsal/ /sdug bsngal gnyen po'i don du bden pa dang/ /lus kyi rma sku'i rdul la sogs pa dang/ /rigs pas
254a5(mdo 'grel): 'thob pas cho ga bsam byas shing/ /gzhan gdong lta ba'i de ba med bar bya/ /tshul dang mthun zhing yon tan 'gyud ba'i rgyu/ /yid bzhin dga' ba kun gyi spyod gyur kyang/ /ngo mtshar med pas nga rgyal spang bya zhing/ /de las byung ba'i grags pa
254a6(mdo 'grel): bsnyems mi bya/ /thob ba'i yon tan rnam pa gzugs brnyan dag/ mja' ba' i tshul gyi dgra dang nye ba bzhin/ /pad+ma'i nags la zla ba'i 'od gsal ltar/ /brtul zhugs ltod pa rnams la bde ba gnod/ /tshul khrims yon tan bsgom ba'i
254a7(mdo 'grel): tshul du gsungs/ /yon tan ma lus byang chub sems la gnas/ /byang chub mchog sems snying rje'i rgyu las byung/ /de bas snying rje'i rang tshul ldan par bya/ /gang zhig 'dod ba'i khams la mi gnas shid/ /gzugs kyi khams la'ang de
254b1(mdo 'grel): bzhin mi gnas te/ /gzugs med khams la'ang de bzhin mi rten ba/ /de ni tshul khrims yang dag yin par brjod/ /gang zhig 'jig rten dpag yas sems can dag/ mdza' dag tshul khrims dag la dgong mos shing/ /'jig rten rngan phyir
254b2(mdo 'grel): tshul khrims sten byed pa/ /de ni tshul khrims pha rol phyin par gsungs/ /de bas ngan song 'jigs dang rgyal srid dang/ /mtho ris phun sum tshogs pa snon btsal ta/ /tshul khrims dri med yang dag bsrung bya zhing/ /'jig rten don la brtson bas
254b3(mdo 'grel): tshul khrims bsten/ /tshul khrims de ni byed bar thob ba'i lam?/ /snying rjes dang can rnams dang mnyam bar bsgrub/ /ye shes gtsang ma lus kyi rang bzhin te/ /skyon bral rgyan du 'gyur ba'i mchog ces bya/ /khams gsum kun du yid 'ong di
254b4(mdo 'grel): bsrung dang/ /rab tu byung dang mi 'gal byug pa yin/ /cha lugs mthun yang tshul khrims ldan gyur na/ /mi yi nang na de ni 'phags par 'gyur/ /tshig tu ma brjod ? gsum gyur kyang/ /nyams su mkho ba'i longs spyod rim gro 'du/ /bsdigs
254b5(mdo 'grel): ba med par 'jig rten kun sdud de/ /chags mang ma bsgrubs dbang phyug thob par 'gyur/ /brjod du mi 'os? rigs su 'byung ba dang/ /phan zhing dben pa gang yang ma byas shing/ /sdan chad mi shes skye bo thams cad dang/ /tshul khrims ldan
254b6(mdo 'grel): pa'i skye bo de la 'dud/ /rkang pas bkra shis gyur ba'i rdul dag kyang/ /spyi gtsug dam pas blangs shing lta dang mi/ /phyag 'tshal mgos gtugs thob pa kun du khyer/ /de phyir tshul khrims dpal ldan rigs mchog yin/ /tshul khrims kyi
254b7(mdo 'grel): pha rol tu phyin ba'i le'u 'o// //bdud rnams thams cad yongs su rmongs byed cing/ /rnam thar thob byed ? gang gsungs pa'i/ /bzod pa shin tu phan pa sgrub byed pa/ /de la su zhig nan tan mi byed yod/ /gzhan la gnod byed
255a1(mdo 'grel): nam yang mi shes pa/ /brtan pa rnams kyi yid 'ong dang tshul te/ /'jig rten don byed snying rje'i tshul snyems pa/ /yon tan mthun pa'i ming ni bzod pa yin/ /gzhan don mthun ba'i yid dang ldan pa la/ /tshul gyi dam pa
255a2(mdo 'grel): bzod pa yin zhes gsungs/ /'jig rten legs pa phun sum tshogs pa dag/ khro ba'i skyan la bzod pas yongs su skyob/ /mthu ldan rnams kyi rgyan gyi dam pa ste/ /dka' thub tshul 'chad rnams la stobs kyi tshul/ /gnod sems 'brog
255a3(mdo 'grel): me la chu yi rgyun/ /'di la gzhan la gnod dgu bzod pas sel/ /skye bo mchog gi bzod pa'i go cha la/ /mi bsrun skye bo'i tshig gis mdangs stugs las/ /de dag bstod pa'i me tog bzang gyur cing/ /grags pa'i phrad ba yid du 'od par 'gyur/
255a4(mdo 'grel): skye bo gdug pa'i dag gi mtshon gyi rma/ /ye shes zla ba bzhin du sim par byed/ /brtul zhugs 'chang ba brtan pa'i rang bzhin te/ /bzod pa de ni yon tan tshogs kyi gnas/ /zab cing brtan pa'i snying por gyur pa ste/ /khro ba'i gdud ba gzhil
255a5(mdo 'grel): ba dbyad dang 'dra/ /yon tan rgya mtsho'i rlabs kyis brlabs pa yi/ /sgra snyan khyab pa bzod ba'i mthu las byung/ /tshangs ris 'jig rten dag tu 'jog pa la/ /skas kyi them bzhin skyo ba'i skyon dang bral/ /yon tan mdzes ldan mtshan rab brgyan
255a6(mdo 'grel): pa yi/ /gzugs bsgrub bzo yi gnas kyang bzod pa yin/ /skyon gyi shing chen khan bzod chu bo bzhin/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems kyis spel ba yi/ /bsod nams chu yi tshogs dang rtag tu mthun/ /'jig rten gzhan du phan dge rdzogs par
255a7(mdo 'grel): sgrug /'gro la phan don 'phel ba'i mchog kyang yin/ /grags pa'i snyan pa'i rang bzhin phul gyi rgyu/ /yon tan yang bsgrub gnas kyang bzod pa yin/ /snying rjes sems can dben par mthong bas na/ /'khor ba'i nyes bas de ni skyo mi 'gyur
255b1(mdo 'grel): rang gi las dge 'jig rten phan byed pas/ /'jig rten kun tu grags pa'i tshogs su 'gyur/ /ye shes mchog gis sbyangs pa'i bzod ldan na/ /mtshar 'dzin dpya ba kun gyis 'go ba med/ /mi rtag bzod pa'i mthu dang ldan pas na/ /bde ba'i ?
255b2(mdo 'grel): pas dga' bar 'gyur ba med/ /gnod pa'i rnam pa mi bzad mang pos kyang/ /skyes mchog de dag yid ni 'gyur ba med/ /bzod pa'i stobs kyis shin tu brtan pa na/ /byang chub mchog sgrub mos pa mang par 'gyur/ /bzod pas brtan pa'i spyod pa
255b3(mdo 'grel): dam pa des/ /dka' thub dka' ba kun du ston byed cing/ /mu stegs dregs pas mtho ba'i bsam pa dag/ phan pa'i bsam pas bcil zhing dma' bar byed/ /'jig rten rmongs pa bdag snyam chags gyur te/ /lhag ma gzhan snyam nga rgyal 'chang bdag
255b4(mdo 'grel): de yi gnod pas zil gnon sems gyur cing/ /bzod dang mi ldan yongs su gdung bar 'gyur/ /skyes mchog bsam pa snying rje'i mgon ldan cing/ /bzod pas bkra shis bsgrubs pa 'chad pa dang/ /bdag tu lta ba yongs su spangs pa la/ /gnod byed
255b5(mdo 'grel): gzhan dang nye yang gnod pa med/ /brtan pa nyam chung sems kyi skyon gyur pa'i/ /khro ba log pa rnam par rtog las byung/ /yang dag rtog pa yid la zhi skyed cing/ /bzod pa'i rnam pa mnyam par gzhog par byed/ /chu la zla ba'i gzugs brnyan
255b6(mdo 'grel): yod 'dra ba'i/ /bzod pa'i rnam rtog zhi la brten pa las/ /'phags pas rtag tu skabs med 'phags par bya/ /rnam rtog zhi ba don dam bzod pa zhes/ /bzod pa'i yang dag nyid mkhyen de dag gsungs/ /de bas 'jig rten mi 'dra rtogs bya
255b7(mdo 'grel): zhing/ /rnam rtog nye bar zhi la nan tan gyis/ /mig ni mig tu zad na ci ste khro/ /rna ba la sogs der zang khro med ces/ /de ltar gang bzod skye mched ltos pa ste/ /de ni don dam nyid du bzod pa min/ /sgra dang tshig ni mi rtag rang bzhin te/ /sgra dang rnam
256a1(mdo 'grel): rtog 'di yang mi rtag ces gang bzod ni mi rtag rtog pa ste/ /bzod ba'i mchog tu de yang gsungs pa yin/ /nyes pa byed pa gang la 'ang yod pa min/ /gang la bya ba de yang med do zhes/ /gang bzod de ni bdag med sbyar ba
256a2(mdo 'grel): ste/ /de yang bzod ba'i phul tu phyin pa min/ /bde dang sdug bsngal bstod dang smad pa dag/ kun kyang rten cing 'brel 'byung dngos go zhes/ /gang bzod de ni rten 'brel rtogs bya'i sa/ /bzod pa shin tu mnyam gzhag de ma yin/ /'di ni yongs su
256a3(mdo 'grel): rmongs pas bslus gyur pas/ /bsam pa log gyur de 'dra bdag min zhes/ /gang bzod de ni mtho dman bsam pa ste/ /bsod ba'i phul gyi go skabs de la med/ /sgra skad yi ge sgra snyan ji bzhin te/ /re re brjod cing de bzhin 'jigs bsam//
256a4(mdo 'grel): su la su zhig ji ltar gnod 'gyur zhes/ /bzod pa de yang bzod pa'i phul ma yin/ /'di ni bdag gi sdig pa zad bya'i phyir/ /rang gi chos la gnod pa 'ang mi lta na/ /bde gshegs dam pa ci ro ba ma min zhes/ /gang bzod de ni ming tsaM
256a5(mdo 'grel): brjod pa min/ /rang gi las bzhin 'gyur ba rtogs bya zhing/ /de yi yon tan rdzogs pas bzod byed pa/ /de 'dra'i bzod pa 'ang rnam rtog sbyor can te/ /bzod ba'i mthar phyin mchog ni de ma yin/ /mi rtag sdug bsngal mi gtsang bdag med pa
256a6(mdo 'grel): bdag la bzod kyi bzlog pa ma yin zhes/ /gang yin de ni gnyen po zhes brjod kyi/ /gnyis kyi rjes 'brang don dam bzod pa min/ /skye bo 'di ni yang dag mi shes pas/ /de phyir gzhan la gnod par dga' zhes/ /gang bzod de yang
256a7(mdo 'grel): mnyam nyid mnyam mi 'gro/ /bzod pa de yang rnam rtog skyon can yin/ /mtho dman mnyam pa'i rnam rtog rnam pa dag/ gang tshe ma lus yang dag zhi gyur pa/ /de ni bzod pa bla med dam pa zhes/ /gnyis med lam la spyod pa de dag gsung/ rang
256b1(mdo 'grel): dang gzhan dang gnyi ga rgyu med las/ /dngos po gang yang 'byung ba med pa dang/ /rang dang gzhan dang gnyi ga rgyu med las/ /dngos po gang yang 'jig par 'gyur ba med/ /yod dang med la skye ba med pas na/ /skye ba med phyir gang yang
256b2(mdo 'grel): 'gag pa med/ /dngos po'i rnam rtog rang bzhin stong pa nyid/ /yang dag mthong na bzod pa'i phul zhes bya/ /de thob gyur na rgyal ba 'dir 'gyur zhes/ /rgyal ba rnams kyis rnam mang lung yang bstan/ /de ni rtag tu yang dag mnyam gzhag
256b3(mdo 'grel): kyang/ /'jig rten phan 'dod grangs med kun tu 'byung/ /chos dang smon lam las la dbang thob ste/ /mos pa rdzu 'phrul skye ba'i dbang yang thob/ /de bzhin sems dang po byang rnam pa dang/ /ye shes mchog dang tshe la dbang ba thob/ /
256b4(mdo 'grel): dbang gi nor mchog yun du mi zad cing/ /gzhan don che sgrub de dang/ /ye shes mchog dang tshe la dbang ba thob/ /  dbang gi yongs su bzung phyir dbang ldan de dag skye/ /de phyir gzhan don phal cher bkur spro bas/ /bzod pa thabs tshul 'di 'dra ba
256b5(mdo 'grel): bsnyen par bya/ /de la gnas la gzhan don che bsam pa'i/ /spyod yul yon tan 'bras bu'i rgyan ldan 'gyur/ /'di la dang pa rtsab brtan gyur na/ /des kyang thub rgyal des par 'gyur zhes gsungs/ /chos kyi lam la dad brgyun chags na//
256b6(mdo 'grel): bsam pa yid bzhin shing rta chag mi 'gyur/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u'o// //thams cad bzod pa'i mthu ni skyes gyur nas/ /spyod pa'i mthu chen mdza' dka' brtson 'grus kyis/ /dpa' bo rtul zhugs thams cad
256b7(mdo 'grel): rtson byed pas/ /lha 'am bdud rnams las kyang 'phags bar 'gro/ /tshe 'dir mthar phyir 'jig rten don dag kyang/ /btson 'grus med pas mthar phyin bya ? dka' / /yongs su skyo med brtson 'grus che ldan na/ /mi 'thob mi 'grub rnam pa gang yang
256b8(mdo 'grel): 257a
256b9(mdo 'grel): med/ /skye bo ma rabs thog mar brtsams mi mos/ /brtsams nas dbus su sgyid lug brtson 'grus gtong/ /gzhan don dal med brtson 'grus ldan pa ni/ /mya ngan 'das gtong spyod pa rgya chen rtsom/ /le los bslus
256b10(mdo 'grel): pa'i 'gro la phal cher ni/ /brtson 'grus rang dbang yod kyang bdag don gtong/ /brtson 'grus che ldan gzhan la ltos med ni/ /gzhan don khung chen skyo ba med par 'khyer/ /snga phyi 'khor ba'i mdza' dang
256b11(mdo 'grel): mnyam tsam du/ /rgya che ring ba'i nyin dang mtshan gyur la/ /de 'dra bsags pas lo gyur dus ring ba'i/ /bskal pa rgya mtsho'i chu thigs grangs snyed kyis/ /byang chub mchog gi sems gcig skye 'gyur ba/ /de 'dra'i rnam pas sogs? gzhan de de zhing//
256b12(mdo 'grel): bsgrub dgos gyur kyang rdo rjes skyo bsal te/ /byang chub dam pa sgying lug med par sgrub/ /'khor tshe rang gi sdug bsngal sems btang zhing/ /go cha brtan pa dpag yas de bskyed na/ /brtul zhugs dpa' bo snying rje'i dang can la/ /gang dag blangs pa
256b13(mdo 'grel): dang po yin par brjod/ /'jig rten mes bkang rkang gis 'bog bya zhing/ /sa chen mtshon gyis dkrigs pa gzigs byas te/ /bde gshegs lta bar mos dang ? ldan zhing/ /chos kyi bdud rtsi zhi ba mchog bsrung dang/ /'khor ba'i 'das nas skye bo
256b14(mdo 'grel): 'di dag kun/ /bdag gis bton te byang chub bde dgos ces/ /goms pa bteg cing bor ba'i dus dag tu/ /gang zhig de 'drang mnyam 'jogs sems 'chad dang/ /'jig rten phan phyir brtson 'grus che ba skyed cing/ /gzhan la phan pa'i bsod
256b15(mdo 'grel): nams ma grub pa/ /de ni mi bzad pa yi brtson 'grus te/ /dpal ldan yang dag blangs pa gnyis zhes bya/ /bsod nams rnam pa ci sgrub dus na yang/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid du bsngo byed na/ /de ni mi zad yang dag bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /yang
257b16(mdo 'grel): @257b
257b17(mdo 'grel): dag len pa'i mchog ces thub pas gsungs/ /rgya mtsho chen por chu thigs gcig por ba/ /rgya mtsho ma zad dus su zad mi 'gyur/ /de bzhin byang chub mchog tu bsngos pa yi/ /bsod nams rnam par zad par 'gyur ba med/ /de yang snying rje rnam dag
257b18(mdo 'grel): sems ldan zhing/ /'gro ba rgyu dang mi rgyu ma lus kun/ /nam pa thams cad mkhyen par bsgrub bya zhes/ /sems can dam pa bsod nams de dag rtsom/ /stong gsum chen po'i 'gro ba ji snyed pa/ /nyi ma gcig gi la sgrol byed la/ /bskal ba du mang
257b19(mdo 'grel): de bzhin bsgral byas kyang/ /sems can khams las mang po bsgral zhes/ /sems can mi zad de 'dra thos gyur kyang/ /ma lus sems can bsgral bar rab mos shing/ /sgyid lug skyon gyis ma bzung brtson ldan na/ /don gyis snying po rim ring
257b20(mdo 'grel): ba min/ /'gro ba kun gyi bsod nams gcig bsgrubs pa/ /de snyed bcung 'gyur bsgyur bas bde gshegs kyi/ /ba spu'i khung gcig mngon par 'grub 'gyur la/ /spu rnams gcig nas re rer mngon 'grub cing/ /ba sgrub mngon sgrub bsod nams
257b21(mdo 'grel): de dag tshogs/ /brgya 'gyur dag tu bsgyur ba'i bsod nams kyis/ /dpe byang bzang gcig 'grub cing de bzhin du/ /dpe byad bzang po'i lhag ma kun 'grub cing/ /dpe byang bzang pos bsdus
257b22(mdo 'grel): pa re bsod nams tshogs/ /de snyed stong du bsgyur ba'i bsod nams kyis/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mngon par sangs rgyas gtso/ /mtshan rab sna tshogs re re 'grub 'gyur la/ /mtshan rab skyed pa'i bsod nams rgyur gyur te/ /stong du bsgyur ba'i
257b23(mdo 'grel): bsod nams phung po las/ /zla ba nya stang mdzes shing gsal ba yi/ /mdzed slu mdog bzang yid 'ong 'grub gyur ba/ /mdzod spu mngon bsgrub bsod nams de snyed tshogs/ /brgyad 'gyur stong du bsgyur ba'i bsod nams kyis/ /spyi gtsug bltar mi
258a1(mdo 'grel): mthong ba'i mtshan ldan pa'i/ /gtsug tor rgyan mdzes sangs rgyas dbu 'grub ste/ /de 'dra' bsod nams sgrub tshul de dag kyang/ /bdag gis bsgrub ces byang chub sems mthong na/ /brtson 'grus 'dor ba de la gang gi
258a2(mdo 'grel): sgor/ /sgyid lug le le'o cha shas skabs su 'gyur/ /'jig rten khams kun sems can ma lus par/ /rang rgyal rnams dang thams cad 'drar gyur kyang/ /bzod la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gcig/ ye shes dam pas de dag kun pas?
258a3(mdo 'grel): 'phags/ /de snyed bzod pa'i stobs la gnas pa pas/ /mi ldog byang chub sems dpa' gcig 'phags te/ /'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten 'das pa yi/ /dge la bsgrub la de ni dal mi shes/ /mi ldog byang chub sems dpa' de snyed pas/ /skye ba
258a4(mdo 'grel): gcig thog rgyal sras de 'phags te/ brtson 'grus brtan dang ldan pa'i nang na yang/ /byang chub shing drung byin pa ci zhig smos/ /rnam pa de 'dra'i ye shes rnam dag dang/ /'jig rten ma lus sems can kun ldan yang/ /byang chub snying
258a5(mdo 'grel): bo'i shing drung phyin gyur la/ /bdud 'dul skye ba tha ma'i char mi 'gro/ /de 'dra'i ye shes rnam pa dag ldan pas/ /'jig rten ma lus khams kun gang gyur kyang/ /yon tan rnam mang de dag gcig sogs pas/ /bde gshegs stobs kyi
258a6(mdo 'grel): cha la 'ang mnyam mi 'gro/ /de 'dra'i ye shes rgya mtsho rmad byung ba/ /gzhan sems shes pa'i mthu la thogs med cing/ /ye shes smad pa mkha' ltar yongs pa la/ /snying rje ldan pa gcig pu pha rol rgal/ /sems can ma lus kun la khyab pa yi//
258a7(mdo 'grel): snying rje chen po 'jig rten kun tu 'byung/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos kyi rnam pa dag/ rmad byung ma lus de phyir yang dag grub/ /de 'da' i sems can dma' bas gnyan dga' ba'i/ /yang dag blangs pa'i yon tan kun ldan na/ /yang dag nyid
258b1(mdo 'grel): lam yan lag brgyad ldan bzhin/ /brtson 'grus phul byung shon tu rnam par mdzes/ /brtson 'grus rnam gsum dge ba sbyong kha ste/ /lus dang dag yid brtson 'grus rnam pa las/ /'jug dang gna dang mnyam par bzhag pa yi/ /brtson
258b2(mdo 'grel): 'grus phul byung yid las byung ba yin/ /byang chub sems la mos shing zhi ba dang/ /snying rje che dad bdag med bzo ba dang/ /'gro ba sdug bsngal ba rnam bzhi dang/ /chos rnams kun la yongs su 'dzin med dung/ /'khor ba'i 'dam na yongs su skyo
258b3(mdo 'grel): med dang/ /khams gsum thams cad nye bar mi dmigs shing/ /bdog pa kun gtod nga rgyal 'gyur med dang/ /bslab pa kun la yang dag slob pa dang/ /gzhan gyi gnod pas mi 'gyur brtan ldan zhing/ /sems la rnam 'khrul nam yang mi 'byung
258b4(mdo 'grel): dang/ /dge ba'i las la brtson pa brtan pa dang/ /dben la dga' ba'i ro gcig sems ldan dang/ /bsam gtan bzhi por mnyam par gzhog pa dang/ /bdag med nges par rtogs pa'i sems ldan dang/ /thos pa mang pos ngoms par mi
258b5(mdo 'grel): 'gyur zhing/ /rigs par 'jug cing de la rtog pa dang/ /ji ltar thos pa yang dag ston byed cing/ /brjod med chos nyid yang dag shes pa dang/ /mngon shes lnga la mthu chen ldan pa dang/ /mngon shes drug la sgom tsam byed pa dang/ /rdzu
258b6(mdo 'grel): 'phrul rkang pa mngon par sgrub pa dang/ /spyod pa chags med shin tu bsal ba dang/ /yang dag spong la sbyor ba byed pa dang/ /dge dang mi dge'i phyogs las rnam grol zhing/ /dbang po nges par bya la mkhas pa dang/ /chos rnams dbang po med
258b7(mdo 'grel): par shes gyur cing/ /las kyi tshogs rnams yongs su tshol byed kyang/ /gar yang 'gro med rmad byung zab pa dang/ /de la sogs pa sems spangs brtson pa'i lus/ /gzung cing dgong ba'i khyad par 'phags pa can/ /de nyid mi zad
259a1(mdo 'grel): /yongs su rdzogs bya'i phyir/ /dgon pa'i brtson 'gus khyad par rgyu yang yin/ /ye shes mchog gi las la gnas 'cha' yang/ /mtshan ma'i las la de ni 'jug pa med/ /snying rje chen pos 'jus byas ma
259a2(mdo 'grel): gtod zhing/ /brtson 'grus che yang 'dus byas med mi ltung/ /sngon chad ma thos chos thos gnang ba med/ /cis kyang mi tshugs thos pa'i tshes kyang 'dzin/ /mi min kun kyang de la phan par dga' / /ting nge 'dzin rnam
259a3(mdo 'grel): pa kun kyang thob par 'gyur/ /nyin mtshan dus rnams 'bras bu yod par zla/ /yon tan tshogs kyi dma' bar 'gyur ba med/ /mi yi chos las 'phags pa'i don rnams kyis/ /me tog utpal bzhin rnam par 'phel/ /grags pa yangs dang
259a4(mdo 'grel): bde ba thob par 'gyur/ /ser sna dog spangs yid tshul mchog kyang 'thog /tshe 'di'i yon tan ji snyed snang ba kun/ /brtsan pa'i tshul 'byung yon tan che ba med/ /yon tan che mda' rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/ /khams gsum mchod
259a5(mdo 'grel): 'os nyid kyang de las grub/ /brtson 'grus chen po'i yon tan de 'dra na/ /brtson 'grus tshe la gang zhig brtson mi byed/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu byin pa'i le'u'i/ //de nas ye shes bskyed pa'i phyir//
259a6(mdo 'grel): bsam gtan tshul la brtson bar bya/ /'jig rten phan pa'i rnam pa dag /ye shes snang bas bde bar 'grub/ /bsam gtan tshul gyis sems dag na/ /ston gyi dus kyi sprin bsal ba'i/ /mkha' la zla ba gsal ba ltar/ /ye shes
259a7(mdo 'grel): khyad du dang bar 'gyur/ /rnam dag tshul khrims ldan byas shing/ /dge phan grogs dang bstan byas te/ /bya ba nyung zhing zhi ba'i dang/ /dran pas byin brlabs tshul bcangs te/ /shing drung brtul zhugs gnas dag gam//
259b1(mdo 'grel): ne'u gsing? sdug gu'i sa gzhi 'am/ /ched du ma byas mdangs dga' ba'i/ /nags kyi ma tog dri zhim pa'am/ /bsam gtan rkyen du 'os pa yi/ /chog shes 'gro ba'i gnas dag gam/ /'gro ba'i sgra skad mi 'byung bar/ /thab mong
259b2(mdo 'grel): gnas pa'i gnas dag gam/ /dgon pa'i sa gzhi bzang po'am/ /stong pa'i gnas dang khyim dag gam/ /sman ljongs ri khrod dbang pa dag/ seng ge'i dor grags gnas sam/ /'du 'ji'i nyon mongs dben gyur pa'i/ /gang yang rung
259b3(mdo 'grel): ba'i gnas dag tu/ /skyil mo klung du bder 'dug ste/ /drang po'i lus ni bsrang byas shing/ /dran pa'i bsrung ba sems gzhi la/ /nye bar yang dag bzhag phya ste/ /snying rjes log par rtogs pa rnams/ /skabs med tshul du dmar? ?
259b4(mdo 'grel): shing/ /shes par rab shes bya ba'i dus/ /'di yin mya ngan 'das dus min/ /sems can mya ngan ma 'das su/ /mya ngan 'da' bar mos med ces/ /de ltar 'jig rten phan bsam te/ /sangs rgyas nyid du mos bskod cing//
259b5(mdo 'grel): rgyan mi 'chad ba'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /bsam gtan bsgrub la brtson par bya/ /yang dang yang zhing dal bsan/ /btsubs pa me phyin ma 'gyur te/ /rnal 'byor tshul la 'das de bzhin du/ /khyad par ma thob btang mi ba/ /dmigs
259b6(mdo 'grel): lo gcig la brtan tshul du/ /yid kyi bsam pa brtan par bya/ /dmigs pa mang po rgyud pa las/ /'di ni nyon mongs 'khrug par 'gyur/ /lhag mthong brtson pa'i stobs kyi mthus/ /zhum par gyur na gzer yang bstod/ /rgod par gang tshe
259b7(mdo 'grel): gyur ba'i yid/ /zhi gnas tshul gyis bzlog bar bya/ /ting 'dzin mthu ni mi g.yo zhing/ /yang dag gyur na btang snyoms gzhag /bde gshegs ting 'dzin thob bya'i phyir/ /de la chags par yod mi bya/ /bsam gtan dga' 
260a1(mdo 'grel): ba'i ro myong bas/ /rang dbang med pa'i nyam mi blang/ /bdag gi bde tsam 'tho ba don du/ /brtsal ba rgya chen 'di sgrub min/ /lus dang srog la lta ba yi/ /zhum pas non gyur sems gyur cing/ /ngang gi mgo la
260a2(mdo 'grel): tshig gyur kyang/ /brtson 'grus lhod par des mi bya/ /mtshan ma'i rnam pa shes byas shing/ /yid ni mnyam par bzhag pa'i phyir/ /dmigs las bsam pa nyams gyur na/ /dran pas phyir yang bsu bar bya/ /sgrib pa rnams las rang
260a3(mdo 'grel): ge yid/ /glang po rang dbang 'thob 'gyur na/ /lcags kyus bzlog par bya ba bzhin/ /log pa'i phyogs las bzlog par bya/ /de nas sgrib pa'i nad kyi rnams/ /bsal bas sos pa'i yid gyur cing/ /dbul po nyam thag yongs pa las//
260a4(mdo 'grel): longs spyod skyed thob thar pa bzhin/ /bde dang ldan pa'i yid kyis ni/ /'dod pa'i skyon rnams bsal bar bya/ /de dang bral bas dmigs pa yi/ /bde ba gcig nas gcig brgyud kyang/ /glog ltar mi rtag 'gyur ba dang/ /dbu ba gsong
260a5(mdo 'grel): ltar bdag med pa'i/ /rmi lam bzhin du don med dor/ /bslu ba'i don du 'ongs 'dra dor/ /pha rnams bu la byams pa dang/ /bu rnams pha la de bzhin te/ /mdza' la mdza' bo byams pa dang/ /'gro rnams phan tshun byams pa dag/
260a6(mdo 'grel): yon tan tshogs kyis bsgrubs byas shing/ /brtan pa'i snying pas brtan byas te/ /g.yul du gru gdong 'dren bzhin gyis/ /mdza' byams sa mtshams 'jigs byed kyang/ /'di che brtsal ba'i sdug bsngal dang/ /gzhan du ngan 'gro
260a7(mdo 'grel): skyed byed pa'i/ /rgyud gyur 'dod pa'i rnam pa yin/ /de bas 'dod pa bsten mi bya/ /rnam rtog rnams kyi gzhir gyur cing/ /bdag dang gzhan rnams kun gyi yang/ /shes rab mig ljongs byed pa'i rgyu/ /mi bde sna tshogs skyed pa yang//
260b1(mdo 'grel): bdag 'dod don la brtson par bya/ /rnam par kun tu yongs spangs pa'i/ /'dod pa de dag gzhan don la/ /brtson pas zan byar 'os pa yin/ /'dod pa de dag thob pa dang/ /nyin gcig bzhin du bsten pa dang/ /mang dang bsags pas ? ?
260b2(mdo 'grel): ngoms na/ /de las nad che gang zhig yod/ /btsal tshe ro med nyon mongs la/ /bsrung tshe 'jigs pa skyed byed cing/ /mang gyur mya ngan che skyed na/ /de la 'dod byed bu zhig yod/ /gang gi rol myos gyur na/ /rang don nyer kyang mi rigs ste/ /skyes 'gyur
260b3(mdo 'grel): smyon chu ji bzhin pa'i/ /'dod pa sems ldan su zhig skyed/ /de ltar rnam pa thams cad du/ /'dod pa skyon ldan shes gyur na/ /de las sems ni ldog 'gyur te/ /'byung lam chos la mos par 'gyur/ /dpen las skyes pa'i dga' dang bde/ /
260b4(mdo 'grel): bag yang thob las skyes pa 'byung/ /yan lag de dang ldan pas ni/ /bsam gtan dang po thob ba yin/ /der ni rnam rtog rnam spyod dag/ 'dod ldan skyon ldan mthong 'gyur cing/ /de dag zhi 'tshol byed pas/ /ting 'dzin dga' skyes bde pa
260b5(mdo 'grel): 'thob/ /nang ni yongs su dang gyur zhing/ /de sems rtse gcig gyur pa ni/ /bsam gtan gnyis pa'i bsam gtan zhes/ /gnyis med drang srong mchog gis gsungs/ /yid kyi 'khrug long yin shes nas/ /dga' las 'dod chags bral gyur ba//
260b6(mdo 'grel): dran pa btang snyoms ldan pa yi/ /bsam gtan gsum pa thob par 'gyur/ /bde ba'i bsam pa yongs btang bas/ /bde dang sdug bsngal med gyur cing/ /btang snyoms dran pas rnam dag pa'i/ /bsam gtan bzhi ba thob par 'gyur/ /de nas
260b7(mdo 'grel): mngon shes lnga thob ste/ /chos rgyal rgyal srid gnas pa na/ /dpal ldan grags pa khrel dang gzungs/ /de yis rjes su 'byung? bar 'gyur/ /gzhan gyi don du mngon bsgrubs pas/ /rang rgyal nyan thos yon tan la/ /de dag shin tu 'das gyur
260b8(mdo 'grel): 261a
260b9(mdo 'grel): cing/ /shin tu khyad 'phags mthu dang ldan/ /gtong la 'jungs pa 'gong byed cing/ /tshul khrims med pa tshul la 'god/ /khro ba bzod cing des pa dang/ /sgyid lug brtson 'grus chen po dang/ /la brug pa'i
260b10(mdo 'grel): sems ldan bsam gtan dang/ /shes rab 'tshal pa shes rab la/ /snying rje chen pa skyo med par/ /brtson 'grus spyod pas sbyor ba byed/ /de nas mdza' yas spyod yul can/ /nyi ma 'od chen ji bzhin du/ /mi nyams gsal ba'i 'od
260b11(mdo 'grel): chen gyis/ /'jig rten thams cad snang bar byed/ /de nas sems can sdig can dag /ngan 'gror ltung bar gyur pa dang/ /bsod nams tshe dag zad gyur cing/ /lha las ltung bar gyur pa dang/ /'jig rten sdug bsngal de dang des//
260b12(mdo 'grel): yongs su gdud bar gyur pa dag /'jig rten khams na gang yod pa/ /lha mi'i gsal bas mthong gyur cing/ /snying rje chen po skye 'gyur te/ /snying rje ldan pas bag med spong/ /gzhan don sgrub la bag yod pas/ /bsam gyis
260b13(mdo 'grel): mi khyab mthu dang ldan/ /de nas 'jig rten khams mang na/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mang bzhugs dang/ /sangs rgyas zhing gi rgyan dag dang/ /dge 'dun phun sum tshogs mthong zhing/ /byang chub sems dpa' khyu mchog gi/ rnam
260b14(mdo 'grel): dag spyod yul spyod mthong ste/ /sems can gzhan la phan don du/ /dpal ldan spyod pa mthong gyur pas/ /de la smon lam che skyed cing/ /smon lam dkyil 'khor 'grub 'gyur te/ /gzhan don rgya chen snga byed pas/ /rgyal
260b15(mdo 'grel): sras tshul mchog yongs su 'grub/ /mi las 'das pa'i rna ba ste/ /lha yi rna ba rnam dag pas/ /rgyang ring sgra rnams nye ba bzhin/ /che chung rnam pa kun thos shing/ /snying brtse med pas gang smras pa'i/ /zhe gcod ro med tshig gi rnams
261b16(mdo 'grel): @261b
261b17(mdo 'grel): khro pa'i me las byung ba yi/ /me stag rgal 'dra thos gyur cing/ /lha mo'i glu ro snyan ba dang/ /rgyan gyi phar phur sil khrol dang/ /lha rdzas rol mo'i sgra snyan pas/ /mi rtag tshul thos sgra thos shing/ /'jigs dang sdug bsngal rnam pa las/ /mi bzang myu
261b18(mdo 'grel): ngan drag po'i sgra/ /nyon mongs nyams bab thos pa dag/ mi dga' i rnam pa thos gyur na/ /bskul ma drag pos bskul ba bzhin/ /byang chub sems dpa' mthu ldan zhing/ /khong nas snying rje tshe ldan to/ /brtson 'grus mchog ni brtsom par byed/ /'jig
261b19(mdo 'grel): rten sna tshogs 'jigs pa yi/ /bde gshegs rnams las chos tho ste/ /mya ngan 'das la mos pa'i blos/ /sems can don mang bsgrub par byed/ /gzhan sems tshul la de? mkhas pas shing/ /bag la nyal dang bsam shes pas/ /ye shes yo byad
261b20(mdo 'grel): ldan pa de/ /bsod nams myu gu gsang yang skyed/ /bskal pa bya ba mang po yi/ /sngon gyi gnas rnams rjes dran zhing/ /'jig rten bsod nams rnam pa dang/ /stobs dang stobs med mthong gyur nas/ /de dag bsam pa'i tshul
261b21(mdo 'grel): bzhin du/ /rdzu 'phrul rnam pas lus bsgyur cing/ /snod bzhin ston par byed bas na/ /bon yod rjod byed mchog tu 'gyur/ /la lar gzugs mdzes phun ldan zhing/ /nyi ma brgyad lta'i 'od ldan te/ /ri mo gsal ba'i mtshan rgyas pa
261b22(mdo 'grel): thub rgyal mtshan ldan sku mchog gis/ /'gro ba'i mig la bde skyed cing/ /yid la khyab par sim byed pas/ /rgyal dbang mos pa byang chub tu/ /bsgrub phyir 'chi med ston par byed/ /thub dbang zhi tshul dpal ldan pa'i/ /spyod pa rnam par
261b23(mdo 'grel): spyod byed cing/ /la lar 'dul dbang ji bzhin du/ /slob ma'i tshul gyi 'dul bar byed/ /la lar lha dbang brgya phyin bzhin/ /lha yi spyi bo zhabs la 'thug/ nor sbyin ji bzhin nor mang gtong/ /la lar tshangs ltar gzungs mchog 'dzin
262a1(mdo 'grel): la lar spyan gsum phye ba ste/ /dri med zla ba'i rgyan ldan ston/ /la lar lha mi'i rgyal po dang/ /klu yi dpal chen khyer ba ston/ /la lar gnod sbyin rgyal po ltar/ /rdo rje 'bar ba thogs pa ston/ /yon tan 'od ldan
262a2(mdo 'grel): thub zla ltar/ /la lar g.yang gzhi mtshan bstan ston/ /la lar brgya byin nor bu yis/ /brang la 'od 'bar mdzes pa ston/ /la lar chu yi lha gzugs dang/ la lar 'dod pa'i lha lhar ston/ /la lar bud med gzugs mdzes dang//
262a3(mdo 'grel): la lar pho smos dga' ba ston/ /la lar brtul zhugs nor ldan te/ /dod las 'dod chags bral ba ston/ /la lar mi rnams yid 'phrog cing/ /slob dpon slob ma rgyal po byed/ /la lar mthu chen byin brlabs kyis/ /ngan song sdug
262a4(mdo 'grel): bsngal rnam mang sel/ /'gro ba'i dad pa tshul bzhin du/ /sna tshogs spyod pa las bstan cing/ /snying rje'i yon tan rgya che bas/ /'jig rten phan la grangs med byed/ /bsam gtan 'di 'dra'i gnas thob cing/ /khyad par phun sum
262a5(mdo 'grel): tshogs thob pas/ /gter gyi mtshan ma slu med bzhin/ /khyad par gong nas gong brtson bya/ /de la gnas 'cha' yan bor cing/ /tshul zhugs lhod pa'i tshul bor te/ /dge ba spel phyir brtson par bya/ /de las bzlog pa
262a6(mdo 'grel): dman par 'gro/ /ting 'dzin brtson pa med pa ste/ /rjes su bsgrub pa dkon pas na/ /rnam par rgyal ba 'dod rnams kyis/ /zhi ba'i gnyen po tshugs med bsten/ /yid tshul spang ba'i mchog gyur kyang/ /sa ltar mi g.yo brtan
262a7(mdo 'grel): pa yi/ /sa mchog mi g.yo ma thob tu/ /de la yid brtan g.yo mi bya/ /mngon par 'dus byas lam byas pa/ /ting 'dzin bsgrub pa'ang 'jig par 'gyur/ /de bas rnam rtog rnam spangs te/ /lam gyi dam pa bsgom pa bya/ /bde
262b1(mdo 'grel): gcang rtag pa'i rnam rtog dag /'dus byas slu ba'i chos can du/ /yang dag rtogs par shes bya ste/ /dngo po'i rnam rtog yongs su spang/ /dmigs pa tshud yang byung gyur na/ /nyon mongs 'das bcag gzhing yang 'gyur/ /de 'dra'i gnod
262b2(mdo 'grel): pa kun bcil na/ /bdud gyi spyod yul 'das par 'gyur/ /gnas pa'i skyon dang ldan gyur na/ /bsam gtan rnam dag tshul mi 'gyur/ /gnas pa'i rjes 'brang nyams pa ste/ /dong skam bcas zhes de phyir brjod/ /tha snyad tshul dag
262b3(mdo 'grel): 'grub don du/ /de ni 'jig rten lam zhes bya/ /yod dang med byung gtad med pas/ /gang na 'ang ci yang skye ba med/ /nam mkha' i dbyings 'dra yid ldan na/ /srid pa gsum gyi gnas dang bral/ /tshul 'chos bral pa'i spyod brtan la//
262b4(mdo 'grel): kha? gsag med pa'i tshul ldan na/ /'jig rten spyod pa de byed kyang/ /'gro ba gcig tu phan pa spyod/ /sems la dbang gyur thob pas na/ /ting 'dzin stobs las nyams pa med/ /de thob yan chad rmad byung ba'i/ /ting 'dzin
262b5(mdo 'grel): 'bras bu med ldan pas/ /dbyar dus rgya mtsho chu klung dag /chu gsar byung bas skye zhing 'phel/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u'o// //sbyin pa la sogs pa'i bsod nams 'di dag ni/ /shes rab mgon
262b6(mdo 'grel): bcas lhag par mthu ldan 'gyur/ /gser gyi rgyan bzang rnam pa sna tshogs la/ /rin chen 'phra bkod 'od kyis gsal ba bzhin/ so so'i don la de dag yon tan mthu/ /shes rab 'di nyid rgya chen sgrub par byed/ /dpa' bo rang rang yul gyi bye
262b7(mdo 'grel): brag la/ /mthu zhan yid kyis gsal bar bstan pa bzhin/ /lus 'di srog dang bral na mthu med cing/ /rang gi dgos pa sgrub pa mi mdzes pa/ /de bzhin shes rab med pas blo gyur na/ /don sgrub 'jig rten dag na mdzes pa med/ /dang la sogs pa'i
263a1(mdo 'grel): dbang po'i rnam pa yang/ /dbang po gzhan la blo 'dzin shes rab gtso/ /de yi mgon ldan yon tan skyon shes pas/ /nyon mongs zad pa'i tshul la mkhas par 'gyur/ /shes rab med na 'bras bu don gnyer la//
263a2(mdo 'grel): sbyin pa bdag nyid rnam par dag mi 'gyur/ /gzhan don btang ba sbyin pa'i mchog ces gsungs/ /lhag ma nor spel don gyi sbyor ba yin/ /shes rab mi gsal rnam par bying 'gyur na/ /byang chub sems dpas rang gi sha byin na/ /sman
263a3(mdo 'grel): gyi shing ltar rnam par mi rtog par/ /mtho 'am dma' bar 'gyur ba de la med/ /de bas 'jig rten 'das pa ngon gyi gzhi/ /khro med dga' bas phun sum tshogs pa'i sems/ sbyin pa chen pos 'gro don bsgrub mos pa/ /rgyal sras
263a4(mdo 'grel): sa yi dang po thob par 'gyur/ /de la gnas pa phal cher byang chub tu/ /mi 'phrog blo 'chang 'khor lo sgyur bar 'gyur/ /shes rab mthus brtan lam mchog bde ba des/ /rim gyis dri med rgyal sras sa yang thob/ /de nas rang bzhin
263a5(mdo 'grel): rnam dag tshul 'chang zhing/ /gling bzhi 'khor lo sgyur bar de 'gyur te/ /rgyal po kun gyi spyi bos bka' blang zhing/ /thub dbang rgyal ba bzhin dus mchod par 'gyur/ /de dag yan chad 'dod pa'i lha ris dang/ /'jig rten gyur du stong
263a6(mdo 'grel): gnyis stong gsum gyi/ /dbang phyug thob 'gyur de dag yan chad du/ /shes rab 'dod kyis rgyu rnams sbyangs pas 'thob/ /shes rab snang bas mun pa ma bsal na/ /tshul khrims nga dang ldan par de mi 'gyur/ /phal cher shes rab med
263a7(mdo 'grel): pas tshul khrims dag/ shes pa'i skyon gyis nyon mongs rnyog bcas 'gyur/ /rang gi ngon du tshul khrims ma sgrub na/ /blo ldan srid pa'i brtson pa'i skyon mthong zhing/ /de nas 'jig rten ma lus gdon mos pa/ /srid pa'i don du mi sgrub smos
263b1(mdo 'grel): ci dgos/ /shes rab log pa'i skyon gyis sems rnyog na/ /bzod pa'i yon tan de la gnas ci smos/ /legs par rtogs la mi dga' i tshul 'chang zhing/ /yon tan med ba'i rgyan la grags pa bzhin/ /shes rab ldan pa rnams la gnod pa dag/
263b2(mdo 'grel): bzod ba'i yon tan yod pas gnod mi 'gyur/ /shin tu dul ba'i glang po mchog rnams la/ /las kyi khyad par rnam mang bzod pa bzhin/ /brtson 'grus gcig bu byas pa phal ba'i mdza' / /shes rab grogs kyis bstad na yon chen 'jug
263b3(mdo 'grel): bsgrub byas rjes la de yi yon tan 'thob/ /de las byung ba'i dub pa yongs su sel/ /mkhas pa rnams la phul du bsngags 'gyur zhing/ /de las phra zhing zab la gzhan med pas/ /'dod pa'i skyon gyis yongs su ma bsgribs ba'i/ /yid lam drang por
263b4(mdo 'grel): shes rab med mi 'gyur/ /de 'dra'i bsam gtan ba de dga' mchog ldan pa/ /skyon bsags nyes pa chen pos grags gyur pa'i/ /lam gol rigs pa'i tshul la brten pa yi/ /skye bo ma rabs yid la ji ltar 'grub/ /shes rab tshul la brtson
263b5(mdo 'grel): med blo 'chad na/ /de yi lta ba yongs su dag mi 'gyur/ /de med tshul khrims mi 'dag de med pas/ /ting 'dzin mi 'thob sdug bsngal zad mi 'gyur/ /shes rab ldan pas skyon las bag byed cing/ /yon tan tshogs las rgyun tu bde 'thob bas
263b6(mdo 'grel): nyon mongs 'gro ba'i don la rab brtson zhing/ /yon tan tshogs kyis bde ba'i lam du 'jug/ /yang dag rtogs pas ting 'dzin thob par 'gyur/ /ngag yid lus rnams rnam par dag pa 'grub/ /de phyir skyon med mthu dang ldan gyur pa/ /'jig
263b7(mdo 'grel): rten phan pa phun sum tshogs la 'jug/ sbyin pas ci 'dod yid bzhin bsgrub pa byed/ /tshig snyan bdud rtsi shin du gsal ba dang/ /rgyu med mthu dang ldan ba'i sdom pa yis/ /gzhan gyi don la mnyam bar kun tu sbyong/ /don la thun mong yang dag
264a1(mdo 'grel): bstan byas shing/ /byams pas de dag yid ni dbang sgyur te/ /shes rab stobs kyi 'khor lo thogs med de/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i bde la 'god par byed/ /shes rab sngon 'gro mthu chen 'di dag gis/ /byin gyis
264a2(mdo 'grel): brlabs shing yongs su bsrungs pas na/ /'cho med ngan 'gro'i 'chi dang smad pa dang/ /dogs pa'i stobs kyi 'jigs pa nyer mi 'ong/ /'jigs pa thams cad skyon las byung ba ste/ /shes rab skyon dang lhan cig mi 'grogs pas/ /ston gyi nam
264a3(mdo 'grel): mkha' i sprin tshogs med pa la/ /nyi 'od gsal ba mun dang mi 'grogs bzhin/ /nyi ma 'od chen shar bar gyur bzhin du/ /'gro ba'i rgyud rnams mun nag gang 'gegs pa/ /shes rab 'od kyi mthu chen 'byung bas na/ /thams cad bsal 'gyur
264a4(mdo 'grel): ming tsam 'ba' zhig lus/ /gang la shes rab 'od chen shar gyur ba/ /de la bya ba'i lhag ma las pa med/ /bskal ba'i mes bsregs 'jig rten bsal ba'i tshe/ /bsreg bya'i lhag ma yod par brjod med bzhin/ /snang pa thams cad
264a5(mdo 'grel): gcig tu 'dus gyur kyang/ /shes rab 'od la skrun tu nyer mi 'gro /de bas khe chen de las mchog gzhan med/ /yongs su mnyam pa med pa 'ang gzhan med do/ /shes rab tshul brtson bslab pa bde tshul du/ /yongs su rdzogs 'gyur
264a6(mdo 'grel): tshul khrims zhi bar 'gyur/ /de bas rang gi mthu rnams kun gtugs te/ /de 'dra'i shes rab tshul la brtson par bya/ /phung po khams dang skye mched rgyu dag dang/ /bden pa'i gnas la som nyid mi 'gyur zhing/ /dus gsum de 'drang?
264a7(mdo 'grel): bsdus pa'i rigs pa ni/ /shes rab shin tu sbyangs pa'i yul 'jug yin/ /shes rab dag sbyangs spyod pa'i rnam pa dag /yid ches bka' zhing yon tan snang la yang/ /skyi g.ya' ngo mtshar thob pa'i dbang gyur bas/ /rgyal sras grags pa
264b1(mdo 'grel): chen pos khyab par 'gyur/ /shin tu mthu 'bar shes rab stobs kyi phul/ /bdud dang dpung bcas tshogs kyis bzod mi nus/ /shes rab 'od kyis de dag mig rmongs pas/ /de dag mgo ldeg lta bar mos pa med/ /'dod pa'i ltas
264b2(mdo 'grel): 'phangs mda' la mgo thub pa'i/ /shes rab go cha sems kyis brtan bgos na/ /gzugs la sogs pa'i dmag mang tshogs kyi rnams/ /gcig pu 'jigs med zil gyis mnan cing 'gro/ /mi brten yang tshul 'jigs shing rtabs pa'am//
264b3(mdo 'grel): glen ba'i dang tshul mya ngan 'dzin pa'am/ /mthu gzhan sems la rtsa ba zug gyur pa'i/ /khro dang chags dang dman zil gnon pa 'am/ /phan byed rnams la 'jungs pa'i dri ma dag /'dod chags ldan la rten 'cha' rgod pa 'am/ /gzi brjid
264b4(mdo 'grel): mthu chud le la'i bsam pa dang/ /shin tu g.yed bas gzhi 'char tshul dag /so so'i rkyen gyi bsam pa thibs po la/ /gnas 'cha' nyes ba'i rnam pa de dang de/ /'gro la phan don dam bcas shes rab can/ /shes rab chen pos ma lus yongs
264b5(mdo 'grel): su sel/ /skyon bral brtan zhing dang nges de mkhyen nas/ /dga' bde skyid phyir lags par de gzigs shing/ /dbang bskur bdud rtsi shin tu sim byed pas/ /thub dbang rnams kyis de ni dbang yang bskur/ /bde gshegs mdzod spu mtshan rab
264b6(mdo 'grel): mthon pa yi/ /'od tshan zla ba gsal gzhin sim byed pas/ /rgyal sras de yi mgo nas dbang bskur na/ /mchod sbyin me la mang khus blugs ltang mdzes/ /chos rgyal rgyal tshab thabs de thob gyur nas/ /phyogs bcu kun tu sprul pa'i lus
264b7(mdo 'grel): skye zhing/ /sprin chen char gyi rgyun gyis rdul bsal bzhin/ /'jig rten sdug bsngal lhun gyis grub par sel/ /rgyal sras mthu mchog de 'dra rmang byung dag /thams cad shes rab de yi mthu las byung/ /bu la byams pa'i ma 'dra shes rab las/
264b8(mdo 'grel): 265a
264b9(mdo 'grel): de 'dra'i phun sum tshogs 'byung ci mtshar gyi/ /bde gshags stobs bcu stobs kyi phul byung ba/ /mtshungs med mchog tu bya ba thams cad dang/ /yon tan tshogs gzhan ma rus thams cad kyang/ /de 'dra'i shes
264b10(mdo 'grel): rab rgyu las rten cing 'byung/ /'jig rten dag na sgyu rtsal gter mchog dang/ /gtsug lag mig 'dra ci snyed yod pa dang/ /yongs su skyabs byed blo dang sngags la sogs/ /rnam bkod chos kyi khyad par tha dad dang/ /rnam grangs rnam
264b11(mdo 'grel): mang rnam thar sgo dag dang/ /'jig rten phan pa'i rnam pa de dang des/ rgyal sras mthu chen rnam par ston byed pa/ /de dag thams cad shes rab mthu las byung/ /dbang po yul rnams lha rdzas 'dra bdag pa'i/ /rgyal srid che ldan byang chub seMs
264b12(mdo 'grel): dpa' dag/ rang bzhin tshul min 'gyur ba med pa yang/ /shes rab yon tan blon po ldan pa'i mthu/ /gzhan la phan byed ro? gcig byams pa la/ /'dod chags 'go ba yongs su spangs pa dang/ /gzhan gyi sdug bsngal mi bzod snying rje la//
264b13(mdo 'grel): mya ngan khur gyi le los mi dma' dang/ /dga' mchog dang ldan yang dag g.yed med dang/ /'gro don mi g.yel btang snyoms chen po dang/ /yon tan de dang de dag gnyen po'i lam/ /shes rab chen pos bkag pas rnam par mdzes/ /bsam
264b14(mdo 'grel): pa bag la nyal la bka' btsan pa'i/ /shes rab nyi 'od 'par? lta de med na/ /su zhig yun ring 'jig rten rkyen 'byung pa'i/ /rang bzhin tshul gyur mun nag sel nus yod/ /brtan 'os bla ma rim gro bsnyen bkur te/ /shes rab sgrub
264b15(mdo 'grel): phyir thos pa btsal bar bya/ /rnam pa sum cu gnyis kyis shes bya ste/ /yang dag mnyam gzhag yid kyis rnam par sel/ /thos nyung dmus long bsgoms pa'i tshul mi shes/ /de med des ka ci zhig bsam par bya/ /de bas thos la
265b16(mdo 'grel): @265b
265b17(mdo 'grel): brtson bya de rgyu las/ /bsam bzhin bsgom pas shes rab yangs pa 'byung/ /dri ba rtsod med sgo dang brtan pa dang/ /don tshol rtogs pa'i mthu yang rtogs pa dang/ /bsam gtan de yi yon tan skyed pa bas/ /shes rab bsgrub la mngon? bar brtson
265b18(mdo 'grel): par bya/ /shes rab thob pa'i tshul la thabs kyi mdo/ /bsam gtan de don nges pa'i thos mang ba/ /yon tan tshogs rgyu shes rab snang ba ni/ /gnyis po de las gtsubs shing me ltar 'byung/ /mkhas pa'i skye bos spyod pa'i lam bsten te/ /gti mug
265b19(mdo 'grel): rgyur gyur thibs? po spang bar bya/ /de bsgribs gyur na zla ba shar gyur kyang/ /char sbyin cher? bsgribs mi snang mtshungs mi snang/ /le lo snyom dang rten ngan rten pa dang/ /gnyid kyi dbang gyur mi rtog dang tshul dang/ /thub pa'i ye shes mchog la
265b20(mdo 'grel): mes mod dang/ /log pa'i nga rgyal non pas don 'dri dang/ /dma' sems dag la zhen pas byung ba'i rgyus/ /mkhas pa'i skye bo bsten par ma dad dang/ /log pa'i rnam rtog dus tshe log lta dag /gti mug rgyu yin de bsal gnyen po ni//
265b21(mdo 'grel): phung po khams dang skye mched bden pa dang/ /rig ba dag dang rgyu byung tshul brtag dang/ /chos la mkhas pa'i rnam pa de dag ni/ /shes rab thabs kyi yul brgyad rnam pa yin/ /gzugs rnams dbu ba'i tshogs 'dra snying po med/ /tshor ba
265b22(mdo 'grel): rnam gsum chu yi chu bur tshul/ /'du shes 'dod pa'i yon tan zhugs pa ni/ /smig rgyus ri dags slu bzhin byis pa slu/ /'du byed rnam pa chu shing rang bzhin 'dra/ /sgyu ma'i tshul las rnam shes gtang ba med/ /de la rten cing ra
265b23(mdo 'grel): 'dra'i lus 'di nyid/ /rnam mang bskyod cing lam rgyud kun du 'khyam/ /bdag dad bdag gi 'di la gang yang med/ /mi gtsang sna tshogs 'dus pa'i tshogs 'di ste/ /rang dbang yod ltar 'khrul 'khor byas ba bzhin/ /sems can 'du shes
266a1(mdo 'grel): byis pa slu ba byed/ /mig 'di skad cig 'jig ste bdag ma yin/ /mig ldan de min mig la bdag kyang med/ /bdag la mig med skye mched ltag ma yang/ /de dang tshul 'dra gtang med bdag gi med/ /lus
266a2(mdo 'grel): la gnas pa'i khams dang phyi rol khams/ /mtshan nyid mi mtshungs 'gal ba gang yang med/ /rnam shes khams kyang mi rtag bdag ma yin/ /de las gzhan yang nam mkha' i me tog bzhin/ /de ltar 'di ni sred rmongs yid ldan la/ /sdug
266a3(mdo 'grel): bsngal 'ba' zhig byung bar gyur pa yin/ /sred dang bral na zhi ba'i mchog thob ste/ /tshul khrims ting 'dzin sred sel lam yang 'thob/ /de dang de dag rten 'brel byung ba zhes/ /lta ba rnam dag yod med gnyis mi dmigs/ /'gro ba 'di dag
266a4(mdo 'grel): de la sgyu ltar snang/ /de phyir bde la sogs pas 'gyur med brtan/ /'das gyur byung gyur rtog pa log lta ste/ /byung gyur gang yin srid las bde 'gyur zhes/ /de ltar 'das pa'i yul la 'dod bral zhing/ /byung dang 'byung bar 'gyur la
266a5(mdo 'grel): smon pa med/ /sdug bsngal tshul gyis mngon par mi bde zhing/ /mi bzang mig phye mngon pa'i tshul yod na/ /de dag don bsgrubs phongs dor tshul bsams shing/ /shes ldan su zhig dgar gnas bla snyam sems/ /de ltar rnam grol
266a6(mdo 'grel): blo ldan snying rje can/ /'gro ba mgon med nyon mongs gzir mthong na/ /thams cad byang chub mchog la ma bkod du/ /dma' las byams btang mya ngan 'dar mi mos/ /'jig rten don sgrub tshul la mthu med pa'i/ /theg pa gnyis bo
266a7(mdo 'grel): gtan du spang byas shing/ /thub rgyal theg pa snying rjes bstan pa'i lam/ /gzhan phan ro gcig rang bzhin de dag 'jug /dma''os tshul la legs pa'i blo mi gzhol/ /cha la che min nam yang gnas mi 'gyur/ /gtsang ma'i rang bzhin
266b1(mdo 'grel): gtsang dang rtag tu 'brel/ /gzhan yang mthun dang mthun gyur chos nyid tshul/ /bde dang mi bde rmi lam 'drar 'drangs shing/ /gti mug skyon gyis dma' ba' i 'gro mthong na/ /las kyi dam pa gzhan don dga' bor zhing/ /rang gi don la de
266b2(mdo 'grel): ko ci ste brtson/ /gang zhig 'jig rten phan phyir kun spyod cing/ /mngon pa'i nga rgyal bdag lta yongs spangs te/ /kun la byams pas mi gnyis lam rgyu ba/ /de ni mya ngan 'das kyang 'jig rten spyod/ /shes rab rnam dag mngon sgrub theg pa'i
266b3(mdo 'grel): mchog /thub chen thams cad mkhyen nyid de las 'byung/ /de ni 'jig rten rnams kyi mig bzhin te/ /'od ldan nyi ma shar ba'i 'od dang 'dra/ /'khor ba'i skyon gyis khur gyis ngal chad kyang/ /shes rab rnam par dbye la skyon med pa/ /de ni
266b4(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas legs sgrub theg pa la/ /bdag nyid yongs su skyo bar 'gyur ba med/ /bde gshegs mthu can rmad byung mthong 'gyur bas/ /yan lag thams cad sbu g.yo dga' gyur cing/ /de sgrub theg pa'i dam pa spongs byed pa/ /g.yo rgyu spyod
266b5(mdo 'grel): min rgyu ni gzhan med do/ /bdud kyis 'khrugs bsam? non su zhig ko /dkon mchog gsum gyis 'byung gnas theg pa ste/ /gnod pa'i mda''byin bde gshegs theg ba la/ /smod par su byed de ni 'gro ba'i dgra/ /shes rab mig zums
266b6(mdo 'grel): 'gros 'khyar gyur pa la/ /'jig rten don sgrub rgyal ba'i rgyal rigs na/ /snying rje mi skyed skyes bu gang zhig yod/ /de dag rmongs gsal brtson 'grus su mi rtsom/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u'o// //
266b7(mdo 'grel): pha rol tu phyin pa bsdus pa Arya shU ras mdzad pa rdzogs so// //lo tsA ba a tsarya bai ro tsa na rakI tas bsgyur ba'o// /*/ /las dang po pa'i sa sbyang ba dgra las rgyal ba gsang bas mdzad pa bzhugs/ /
267a1(mdo 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ ya ti karmi b+hU mi ka ri pa ri/ bod skad du/ las dang po pa'i sa spyad pa/ sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nyi ma lta bur gzi ldan sku/ /sangs rgyas zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ /las ni dang
267a2(mdo 'grel): po ba yis/ /spyad pa 'dir ni bshad bar bya/ /lam ma sbyangs pa'i nyes pa dang/ /lam gyi sbyang ba gang zhe na/ /lam ma sbyangs pa'i skye bo dag / byes bgrod ngal dub tsha grang dang/ /lci dang rtsub dang skyo ba dang?/ /bkres skom gdungs shing
267a3(mdo 'grel): brnyas pa dang/ /'jigs dang yi mug nyams su myong/ /mya ngan 'tsher 'grib bcas pa dang/ /kha cig spyi'u tshugs dmyal ba dang/ /dud 'gro yi dags rnams su bsten/ /nor dang bza' btung grags pa dag /'dod pas byed bgrod sdug
267a4(mdo 'grel): bsngal can/ /de ba 'bras bu med pa dang/ /sdug dang bral dang mi sdug phrad/ /mi bzad na rgas 'joms bzhin du/ /'chi bdag drung du myur 'gro ba/ /ma tshor gzhad bcas shing rtse/ /tshe 'di don med myur du 'da' / /yang dang yang du skye ba mis
267a5(mdo 'grel): 'khor ba'i nyes pa grags med bsten/ /kyi hud lam las nyams pa yi/ /skye bo dag ni nyam dar gnas/ /mi bzad mya ngan 'bro dgon du/ /lam gol gyur pa dag dang mtshungs/ /mig ldan lam log 'gro ba ltar/ /lam las nyims?
267a6(mdo 'grel): ba'i skye bo smad/ /de la lam sbyang ba gang zhe na 'dir las dang po pa'i sa ni lam gyi dang po ste /de spyad ba ni dbye ba rnam pa du ma dang ldan pa'i dkon mchog gsum legs par shes nas phyag 'tshal ba dang/ rgya cher mchod pa dang /yon tan
267a7(mdo 'grel): brjod pas bstod pa dang/ /snying thag pa nas skyabs su 'gro ba dang/ /rjes su dran pa bsgoms pas bslab pa la slob pas skyabs phun sum tshogs pa yin /mi dge ba bcu'i nyes pa shes pa dang/ dge ba bcu'i yon tan shes pa dang/ dge ba bcu'i
267b1(mdo 'grel): sdom pa len pa dang/ blangs pa slar mi gtong ba dang/ lan 'ga' nyams na yang chos bzhin du /slar 'chos pas sdom pa la gnas pa yin/ byang chub sems kyi phan yon legs par shes pa dang /de skye ba'i rgyu la gnas pa dang/
267b2(mdo 'grel): /sems de yang dag par bskyed pa dang/ bskyed ba'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs ring du spong ba dang/ sems de 'phel zhing mi brjod pa'i chos la gnas pas byang chub kyi sems la gnas pa yin pas /de ltar chos
267b3(mdo 'grel): rnam pa gsum la rnam pa bco lngar phye ba 'di ni 'dir sa sbyang ba'i gzhi dang/ rten dang/ gnas zhes bya'o/ /de gzhi de lta bu la brten nas /lam gyi dngos gzhi gang/ ji ltar sbyang zhe na/ gzhi de dag la legs par gnas pas
267b4(mdo 'grel): 'jug pa byang chub kyi sems blang ba byas nas /ji ltar blangs ba'i sdom pa las mi 'da' bar byams pa tshad med pa bsgom pa dang/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi bsgom zhing /yang dag par spong ba bzhi la gnas par bya ste /'di ni las
267b5(mdo 'grel): dang po ba'i sa'i dngos gzhi yid la bya bas/ rim gyis 'phags pa'i bden pa la 'jug par bya'o/ /de yang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi grub nas/ ting nge 'dzin gyi ngo bo rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang ba bzhi la gnas pa na/ sa de nyid
267b6(mdo 'grel): kyi khyad par thang ba'i cha dang mthun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa yin te/ bdag dang gzhan gyi 'byor pa dang/ /'dun dang tshul khrims dbang po dang/ /de bzhin zas dang mi nyel dang/ /shes bzhin du ni mi spyod dang/ /de bzhin dge ba'i bshes
267b7(mdo 'grel): gnyen dang/ /dam chos nyan dang sems pa dang/ /bar chad med dang gtong ba dang/ /dge spyod rgyan ni tha ma yin/ /dang ldan g.yo med nad nyung dang/ /brtson 'grus shes rab 'dod chung dang/ /cho ga shes gso slad gang sla dang/ /sbyangs dang mdzes
268a1(mdo 'grel): dang drod rig dang/ /skyes bu dam chos mkhas rtags dang/ /bzod dang des dang gya nom pa'o zhes bya ba'i yon tan dang ldan pa /de las gzhan pa theg pa chen pa'i tshogs lam gyi khyad par lus la dbang ba/
268a2(mdo 'grel): la sogs pa dang/ snying rje chen bo'i sgo sngon du gyur pas sdug bsngal ba mthong ba na rang dbang med par 'chi ma'i rgyun 'bab pa la sogs pa 'byung ngo/ /de ltar byang chub sems dpa' i sdom pa dang/ byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ dran pa nye
268a3(mdo 'grel): bar gzhag pa dang/ yang dag par spong pa dang/ rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa bzhi po/ snga ma'i rtan dang bcas pa 'di ni /tshogs kyi lam dang/ /las dang po pa'i sa dang/ dad pa'i sa zhes bya'o/ /de ni 'dir nyin mtshan gyi cha las yang dag
268a4(mdo 'grel): bar spong pa bzhi la gnas pas las la ma sbyang la brjod pa/ thor ngas mal nas lang nas ni/ /gzhi gsum dran pas brtul zhugs mchog/ bdag gzhan brje dang 'jig rten gyi/ /chos brgyad mnyam par mos pa bskyed/ /de nas
268a5(mdo 'grel): yid ni bsdus pa yis/ /kye ma sems can bde 'gyur bsam/ /de nas lus dang tshor ba dang/ /sems dang chos ni mi gtsang dang/ /sdug bsngal mi rtag bdag med ces/ /phyin ci log bzhi'i gnyen po bsgom/ /re re 'am yang na rim
268a6(mdo 'grel): gyis kyang/ /nam langs par du 'bad pas bsgom/ /gang gis lus can grol 'gyur ba'i/ /lam gyi dang po 'di nyid yin/ /de nas nam ni langs pa dang/ /ci rigs gtsang spra byas nas ni/ /mchod rten phyag 'tshal maN+Dal bya/
268a7(mdo 'grel): sdig bshags la sogs rgyas byas te/ /lhag par skyabs su 'gro ba dang/ /byang chub sems ni brtan po bskyed/ /ci rigs skor ba byas nas ni/ /bla ma dang ni rgan? po dang/ /chos smra ba la'ang phyag byas te/ /'dzum zhing stan par smra ba dang/
268b1(mdo 'grel): de dag dgos pa 'bad de bsgrub/ /bar deng dus ni nyed gnas na/ /chos bshad la sogs sems can don/ /rang bde btang la 'bad pas bsgrub/ /khyed du? sus? sogs zas la spyod/ /dkon mchog sprin las gsungs pa bzhin/ /cha bzhir
268b2(mdo 'grel): bgos te bza' bar bya/ /lhag par phongs la bza' btung bgo/ snga dro? yi ni dus dag tu/ /bri dang klog ba la sogs pa'i/ /chos spyod bcu la 'bad pa 'am/ /tsha tsha bya'am 'gro phan gdags/ /dus kyi dam pa snga dro ni/ /don med 'da' bar mi
268b3(mdo 'grel): bya'o// nyi ma'i gud la byams pa dang/ /dran pa nyer gzhag cung zad bsgom/ /de nas yang ni phyag 'tshal sogs/ /snga ma bzhin du rgyas par bya/ /phyi dro skye bo dam pa dang/ /'grogs shing ngal gso bden don la/ /spro? zhing srid las yid 'byung
268b4(mdo 'grel): ba'i/ /legs bshad ro ni myang bar bya/ /phyi 'phreng slar yang snga ma bzhin/ /zhi gnas lhag mthong bsgom pa dang/ /mchod rten phyag 'tshal la sogs bya/ /dmar thag chad nas mtshan mo ni/ /bla ma'i bsnyen bkur tshul bzhin bya/ /rang gi rkang
268b5(mdo 'grel): pa bkrus nas ni/ /zhi gnas lhag mthong bsgom pa 'am/ /don chen ldan pa'i kha ton bya/ /nam gyi cha stong 'das pa dang/ /tshul bzhin yid la byed pa yis/ /rigs pa bzhin du nyal bar bya/ /nyin par dad ni mtshan mo yang/ /lag bzangS

268b7(mdo 'grel): khyad par can spyang ngo/ /de las gong du bsgom pa las byed bas mos pas spyod pa'i sa dag la dbang po dang stobs kyi bden pa dag bsgoms pa'i sa spyad pa ni dkon mchog sprin pa sogs par blta zhing/ rab tu dga' ba la sogs pa'i sa

268b9(mdo 'grel): sbyang ba ni sa bcu ba'i le'u las bstan te /rgyal ba'i sras kyis yi dang po pa/ /tshogs kyis ste de sbyang mdor bsdus pa/ /cung zad bshad las dge ba gang thob pa/ /nges ni 'gro rnams dag pa'i sa thob shog/
268b10(mdo 'grel): las dang po pa'i sa spyad ba zhes bya ba slob dpon mkhas pa chen po byang chub sems dpa' dgra las rgyal gsang ba'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po kriSh+Na pa dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong chos kyi shes
268b11(mdo 'grel): rab kyis bsgyur cig gus te gtan la phab pa'o// ShU b+ha?//*/ /rgya gar skad du /bo d+hi satwa tsarya sU dri kra? ta ba bA ra/ bod skad du/ byang chub sems dpa' i spyod pa mdo tsam gdams ngag tu byas pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang/

268b13(mdo 'grel): ldan pa'i spyod pa yis/ /rang gi sems nyid dang por gdul/ /dang po rang nyid ma dul bar/ /gzhan dag gdul bar ji ltar nus/ /ji ltar 'dab gshog mtshang ba'i/ /bya yis mkha' la phur mi nus/ /de bzhin lta spyod med? pa yi/ /gang zag

268b15(mdo 'grel): te/ /shes rab gsum la gzha? bcas nas/ /go 'phang mchog tu 'gro ba yi/ /lta ba nyid la gcor sbyangs te/ /tshul khrims gtsang ma'i gos gyon? nas/ /sgrub la nan tan ces su bya/ /chos kyi rjes su bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /dus dang gnas

269b17(mdo 'grel): skabs kun tu yang/ /sbyor ba dngos gzhi rjes gsum gyi/ /las rnams dran pas zin par bya/ /skyon spangs legs sgrub don yod bya/ /spyod laM don med du mi gnaS/ /rtag tu rang gi yon tan? sbyang/ /dge ba'i phyoD gyi sbyor ba la/ /spro bya zhum dang sems mi gsad/ /nyes
269b18(mdo 'grel): spong yon tan dge 'phel ba'i/ /grogs btsal mthun pas de sems gzung/ /yon tan can la gus phyag bya/ /nyon mongs skye grogs thabs kyis spang/ /mtho dman zogs? kun dag la yang/ /chu las 'o ma len pa bzhin/ /nyes pa dor la/
